Mu me gumbe waya, “Nasaret apan Iesu uwag aivi.”
Me kwaruwane, “Iesu, Devid Usiwa, ano nega!”
Iyayapan ebu namu yoiyoi emewa me gae yankwetan oya dig waya. Megara me kwat kokavit gerave gerave wane, “Devid Usiwa, ano nega!”
Iesu tumag yoine, apan yan me nenan aug onamtan oya wane. Me Iesu megiyave uwanewa, Iesu me singui ane,
“Ge imugap ne dimbae genan atna?” Me gara wane, “Ayapan, ne yautan anoeni.”
Iesu me gumbe wane, “Yangagwa auwa. Anotumat geuma warinam genne.”
Me yangawa tatevit oraimina ane, sira God waiya waiya ake Iesu amave aine. Iyayapan undag mame yauyawa, mu mina God gumbe waiya waiya aya.
Iesu at Jeriko unig uwag aivi.
Me apa apan da wakene, me iviwa Jakies. Me takesi tamemewa me kokawa muma da, me tawara abnawa.
Me imive yaupe Iesu aninin, megara me apan pipi, meoya oma den ane yaupe. Kuiyawa iyayapan obiren tobot tobot eme.
Meoya me namu kintog aine, me yautan oya yoma inaru mina dodne, kuiyawa Iesu ebu me apa onivi.
Iesu at me apa uwanewa, me yangut wan ag yaune. Sira me gumbe wane, “Jakies, tatevit yan aiga. Ne gare gwe geuma apa waketan di eni.”
Meoya me tate yan aigne, degadegaepam me gumbe kaiwa kaiwa wanne.
Iyayapan undag mame yauyawa, amatog diguragut ag waya, “Apan me kukaeba aiviwa gweyawa aine sira me amdau abnawa meuma ane.”
Megara Jakies wan yoig Ayapan gumbe wane, “Yawa, Ayapan! Gare mame di ne tawara neuma undag gambenwa pukpuk wagawag igiyawa muntna, sira da bira wape me gumbe ne ugauga anawa, ne matai koni duwam ge duwam garawa wantna.”
Iesu me gumbe wane, “Kum mame gare, God waita meuma gwe mame uwane, kuiyawa apan mame mina me Ebraam usiwa.
Apan Usiwa uwanewa bira da inanadnewa me didimama atan oya sira me waita wantan oya uwane.”
Mu mame anoemewa gumbe, me gae waiviwa maibe da mu gumbo wane, kuiyawa me Jerusarem ug maneve, sira iyayapan anoya me God toimuwawa meuma pungi den ape taibe uwape.
Me wane, “Apan me painauvit dam me gumbe yainewa at da aramawa aine. Me membovit kin tum yupe atan sira taig ongetan oya.
Meoya me nau usitainawa undag 10 auwane, sira mu gumbo anmaga 10 minas munne. Me wane, ‘Anmaga mame gumbe nau aya, nau aigimiya ne sira taig uwatna.’
Megara me iyayapan meuma me topayaya, meoya ivi umum igiyawa teya amiya sira waya, ‘Nu imunup apan mame kin den ape.’
Megara me baraune kin ane, sira taig gwe uwane. Meve me nau meuma waremewa me anmaga munnewa oya umum baraune me gumbe yaug anope mu anmaga munnewa gumbe anintom auya.
Apan namuirenwa uwag wane, ‘Apan, anmaga neganawa 1 minas gumbe 10 minas gerave sira auna.’
Me kokawa meuma garawa wane, ‘Nau oraimina ana, nau neuma wariviwa oraiwa! Dividivi kusikarenwa oya ge anotumat geuma gaibu, meoya gwetoimu kokawa undag 10 amara.’
Apan duwameba uwag wane, ‘Apan, ge anmaga geuma 1 minas gumbe 5 minas gerave sira auna.’
Me kokawa meuma garawa wane, ‘Ge gwetoimu kokawa undag 5 amara.’
Meve nau meuma wariviwa dawa uwag wane, ‘Apan, mame ge anmaga geumawa. Ne yumnadna wape kwetawa gumbe benam tog barauna wakene.
Ne ge gungap a ana, kuiyawa ge apan yaigipama. Ge divi da den barauwanawa atan auwa, sira divi da den veranawa sig tama.’
Kokawa meuma garawa wane, ‘Ne gae geumawa gumbe pui yugempna. Ge nauwaruwat kukaeba. Ge nenan mamaib vege? Ge yaug anoana ne apan yaigipama, divi da den baraunawa me atan avieni, divi da den vednawa me sig tameni?
Divi oya ge ne anmaga neuma anmaga gweyawa bank danave den barauwana? Ge meib apa ipawa, ne sira taig uwanawa, ne anmaga usiwa gaibu ibiyapopo.’
Meve me iyayapan megiyowo yokeyawa gumbo wane, ‘1 minas meuma me gumbe atan auya, sira apan 10 minas aunewa me waniya.’
Mu waya, ‘Apan, me 10 minas wait me gumbe!’
Me garawa wane, ‘Ne ye diruitna. Da bira kokavit aunewa me sira gerave wampe. Megara da bira den aunewa sira kusida me gumbe wakenewa me atan aupe.
Megara iyayapan mu anavi neuma imuwo ne kin muma den atna anoemewa tam mawa oneya, sira ne namunap guriya boriruwape.’”
Iesu mame wanewa, ivi meve Jerusarem oya dog aine.
Mu at Jerusarem uweme tui kusi vemewa tui Orivu kuiyave at Betepage ge at Betani uwayawa, Iesu aigowawa duwam dirumne tene amiya,
“Gwetoimu da namuyep aisiya. Ye me unigiyawa, eme apa mae donki mataiwa me gerave bira da den dauwanewa murap gumbe tuya wakene ye yauya. Murap atan vesiya, sira aug mame oneya.
Da bira ye guniyap singui aib wapewa, ‘Ye divi oya mae donki mataiwa murap tuyawa vetene?’ me gumbe aib waya, ‘Ayapan imive wakene.’”
Mu namu tene amiyawa, Iesu dirumnewa me mina di yauya.
Mu mae donki mataiwa murap vetemewa, mae me mamawa mu singui munne, “Ye divi oya mae donki mataiwa murap tuyawa vetene?”
Mu garawa waya, “Ayapan imive wakene.”
Mu Iesu gumbe aug onamiya, sira wape muma donki mataiwa gerave emeya, sira Iesu gerave barauya.
Iesu aiviwa, iyayapan wape ebu taibe yayabeyaya.
Me tui Orivu amave obmaniviwa, aigowawa agoniyayawa undag amatog degadegaepam waiya waiya God gumbe veme, kuiyawa dividivi undag me anewa pawanewa mu yauya:
“Kin me Ayapan iviwa gumbe uwapewa, me gumbe waribiya wakeigimpe! Yum kwimin apa sira eyawa at painauiren danave!”
Parisi upeba agonagon gumbo wakeyawa Iesu gumbe waya, “Toewanewan, aigowagwa diruma.”
Me garawa wane, “Ne ye diruitna, mu gae yankwepe ipewa, an matai noiwa kwaruwape.”
Iesu Jerusarem obmaniviwa at kokawa yaug, Iesu Jerusarem oya iruwane.
Sira wane, “Ge kum mame yum oya yaug anopa ipawa. Megara gare ge yangagwa gumbe guwave wakene.
Me kumiwa anavi geuma ge gungap uwape. Mu piyu beyan watpe, sira yenan oya birorot pampe, gamben gamben uwagempe.
Ge danagap, mu ge usitainagwa gaibu tog aoregempe, em gempe, piyu gerave aigiya. Mu ape an desirom da mapa dawa egave den wakepe. Kuiyawa God kum divi genan oniviwa ge den yaug anoana.”
Meve Iesu temporu arawa unigne, sira amatog iyayapan gwiruwaremewa atatai imune dauwag amiya.
Sira me mu gumbo wane, “Me tenewa, ‘Ne gwe neuma me nun gweyawa di. Megara ye ayana me yuaore toaore dagup muma mina ane.’”
Kum evedni Iesu temporu arawa danave toyau munivi. Megara pirisi koukawa, Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa, iyayapan yapowo namu yoiyoi igiyawa, mu Iesu tope boatan oya ebu didimama eme.
Megara mu me atan oya oma den ane ebuwawa da yauya. Kuiyawa iyayapan undag gae meuma anotan oya anoeme.
Kum da Iesu iyayapan temporu arawa apa toyau munivi, sira gae oraiwa opata waivi. Pirisi koukawa, Gwangwan toewanewan ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa gaibu agoniyaya sira amog Iesu gumbe uwaya.
Mu waya, “Nu didnuna. Ano yusiwa divi gumbe mame ege? Bira ano yusiwa mame genne?”
Me garawa wane, “Ne mina ye singui da diruitna. Ne didnegiya.
Jon babataito meuma me kwimin apa onne, go iyayapan gumbo onne?”
Mu mumbovit gae wageyau aya, sira waya, “Nu aib watawa ipewa, ‘Kwimin apa onne’, me matai singui aib wape, ‘Divi oya me gumbe anotumat den ene?’
Megara nu aib wata ipewa, ‘Iyayapan gumbo onne,’ iyayapan undag matai an gumbe gutnumpe, kuiyawa mu anotumat eme Jon me propeta di.”
Meoya mu garawa waya, “Nu den yaug anotu me ampa onne.”
Iesu wane, “Ne mina den diruitna divi ano yusiwa gumbe ne dividivi mame eni.”
Iesu iyayapan gae maibe mame amatog dirumne: “Apan da yoma greip vedne, sira nauwareme igiyawa upeba wane nau ape, sira me kum yobenut yankwem aine.
Maura kumiwa uwanewa me nau meuma aiviwa baraune onne nau wareme igiyawa gumbo, yoma greip kwerawa mu upeba wantan oya. Megara nau wareme igiyawa me toya sira yankweya naniwa ingui barauya aine.
Me menan nau aiviwa dawa sira baraune onne. Megara mu apan me sira toya, sira gwambe me gumbe ubmamepam aya, sira yankweya naniwa ingui taig aine.
Me sira duwamdesiyawa baraune onne, sira meib tog aoreya.
Meve greip nauwawa kuiya abnawa wane, ‘Ne anin atna? Ne ud neuma me gumbe baigan eniwa barautna aipe. Anten mu matai me gumbe ebnotu wampe!’
Megara nau wareme igiyawa me yauya gae garawa waya, ‘Mame me kwan autan usirenwa, me toengutta, sira dividivi meuma undag me numawa ape.’
Meve mu greip nauwawa daieve yumeg aug amiya sira me toya boane. Greip nauwawa kuiya abnawa matai mu gumbo anin ape?
Me matai taig uwape sira mu nau wareme igiyawa gutpe boriruwape sira greip nauwawa igiyawa upeba mumpe.” Iyayapan mame anoyawa, mu waya, “Mame matai meib den di ape!”
Iesu mu temtemtem yawam singui munne, “Mame tenewa me natawa divi: ‘An me gwe sisi igiyawa topayayawa me an natawa oraivitwa me visidonawa apa teyawa ane.’
Da bira an mame gerave aikpewa me dumetpe musimusi ape. Sira an mame me apan da egaven aikpewa me toengutpe musimusi ape.”
Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa ge pirisi koukawa Iesu tatevit yumtan oya ebu yobatan oya waya, kuiyawa mu yaug anoya me maibe mu gumbo wane. Megara mu iyayapan munan a aya.
Me gumbe mu kaipat yaimoyai eme. Mu karap igiyawa waen kwimiya amiya, mu natawa eme mina ugauga eme. Mu anog ieme Iesu gae da gwambe wapewa, me gumbe mu yum aug ampe amaraivi abnawa yusiwa ge ano yusipam gumbe.
Meoya karap igiyawa me singui aya, “Toewanewan, nu yaug anotu ge gae vegewa toyautoyau egewa me natawa gumbe. Sira ge den iyayapan gumbo yan umege, megara God ebuwawa gumbe toyautoyau ege gae natawa anin wanewa gumbe.
Nu Siisa gumbe takesi garawa ata me bainda go onan?”
Iesu ugauga muma gumbe yawamne, mu gumbo wane,
“Anmaga denari toyau negiya yautna. Bira ginangawa ge iviwa egave wakene?”
Mu garawa waya, “Siisa ginangawa.” Sira mu gumbo wane, “Meve Siisa meuma me Siisa waniya, sira God meuma me God waniya.”
Iyayapan obiren yangowo mu oma den ane Iesu gae meuma aupe. Sira me garawa wanewa mu anog arag teya sira mu nouwa iyagisia.
Sadusi igiyawa veme, bo gumbe sira den inaig yoig wanekpe. Mu upeba singui muma aug omog Iesu gumbe uwaya.
Mu waya, “Toewanewan, Mosisi nunan oya aib tene. ‘Apan da tatawa me vesin aune botone usiwa da onan ipewa, gwaneba me kwapura aupe tatawa oya ud tepe yave atanit di.’
Sira tatagwanepam 7 wakeya. Tatawa namuwa vesin aug me boane, ud onan boane.
Me duwameba mina meib.
Sira duwamdesiyawa kwapura me aune. Ebu me desiroma naningambenit gamben duwameba yaveg boane sira ud onan di.
Oieba vesin mina boane.
Gare, sira mu yoipewa kumiwa apa, vesin me apan undag 7 danave bira biviwa ape, kuiyawa mu undag vesin me auya?”
Iesu garawa mu gumbo wane, “Iyayapan kum mame garewa apan vesin aupe sira vesin apan aupe.
Megara iyayapan oraivitwa mu piyu mataiwa aupe, mu bo gumbe sira yoipe. Mu apan vesin den aupe, vesin apan den aupe.
Mu oma den ane sira bo ape, kuiyawa mu aneya mina ape. Mu God usitainawa, mu bo gumbe sira inaig yoig usitainawa ape.
Bo igiyawa sira yoig inaipewa, me gumbe Mosisi mundana apa taibe di yaug anone. Me Ayapan aib auwane, ‘Ebraam God meuma, Aisak God meuma ge Jekob God meuma.’
Me bo igiyawa God muma onan, megara me kaninga wakeemewa God muma. Kuiyawa iyayapan undag God gumbe inaig wakeya.”
Gwangwan toewanewan upeba garawa waya, “Toewanewan, bainda di wana!”
Me ivi, bira da Iesu gumbe singui da watan den anone.
Meve Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Mu aninin Keriso me Devid usiwa waya?
Buka Sam danave Devid membo wane: ‘Ayapan me Ayapan neuma gumbe wane: “Nanin yutanwa apa wakeigima, ivi ne anavi geuma amagwa ankwatave tetna em nategewa ape.” ’
<range>
Meoya Devid me gumbe ‘Ayapan’ wanewa, aninin me Devid usiven ape?”
Iyayapan undag anoemewa, Iesu aigowawa gumbo wane,
“Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa gumbo yaukape. Mu imuwo wape muma yobu tam a gigeme, sira mu imuwo baigan en gaun gumbe gwiruwaremewa arawa apa autan anoeme, sira mu imuwo sinagogu danave at oraiwa apa waketan anoeme, sira buyunai nemewa ayamat arawa waketan anoeme.
Mu kwapura gweyowa dividivi undag naboreme, sira iyayapan yawampe oya nun yobutaren wape. Iyayapan meiba me matai ibnawa kokavit mumpe.”
Iesu yangut wan yaunewa, tawara igiyawa puyo muma temporu puyo teemewa danave teeme yaune.
Me yaune kwapura tawara onanwa da anmaga kopa kusiwa reputa duwam teivi yaune.
Me wane, “Ne ye natawa diruitna. Kwapura gwandakwaeba mame me puyo obiren tene, iyayapan upeba undag mina onan.
Iyayapan mu tawara obiren muma gerave em yoig puyo muma teya. Megara vesin mame kusi gumbe wakeg aigimtanwa meme tene.”
Aigo meuma upeba temporu an oraimumu gumbe ge puyo gumbe beniyayawa me gaiyawa veme. Iesu wane,
“Ye mame apa yavene. Ne diruitna kum me uwapewa an desirom da mapa dawa egave den wakepe; an undag gwiriruwag aikpe.”
Mu singui waya, “Toewanewan, kum divi dividivi mame pawape? Sira dividivi mame pawatan aigimpewa irakoniwa aninin?”
Me wane, “Yaukape. Iyayapan da den kwemiya uga yempe. Kuiyawa obiren matai ne ivunwa gumbe uwape waigimpe, ‘Ne me mame,’ sira ‘Kum koni di aivi.’ Mu amowo den di aisiya.
Wanampa mut gaiyawa ge dividivi tobiyaigimpewa oya anoyawa, me den teraya. Dividivi mame pawatanit di, go oieba den uwape, me matai.”
Meve me mu gumbo wane, “Iyayapan mu iyayapan dawa gaibu matai yoig mut watpe, sira at kokawa me at kokawa dawa gaibu matai yoig mut watpe.
Me apa matai pinunu kokavit ipunapun ape, nakwai gambenwa iyagon uwape, yuwat kukaeba at ubeube danave kep tepe, uyaeba ape, sira irakoniwa kokavit kwimin apa pawape.
Megara dividivi undag mame ivi pawape. Namu mu nanuwo ye guniyap aorepe ye diruig edawai yempe. Sira mu ye au yen sinagogu ge nog eme yempe. Sira ye tamiyem kin ge amareme igiyawanamuwo ye yoiya. Dividivi undag mame ne ivunwa oya ye guniyap pawape.
Me ye natawa yeuma mu gumbo taibe ape.
Megara aninin yembovit gae gumbe ayun wariyawa, namuiren kwiyewa imug den anoya.
Kuiyawa ne matai ye gae ge ano oraiwa yentna. Meoya anavi yeuma undag matai oma den ane gae gumbe ayun go topayape.
Ye matai inemamewa, tatewaiwa, iyai desiroma sira yairewaiwa ye omin yeuma tepe. Sira matai mu ape ye upeba boriruwaya.
Iyayapan undag ye matai topai yempe kuiyawa ne ivunwa oya.
Megara kwiye gumawa desirom da den pukwag aikpe.
Yaiyai yokeigimiya gumbe ye matai inaiinai auya.
Megara mut igiyawa Jerusarem yurempe yauyawa, ye me yaug anoya kukaig wakukamtan kumiwa me koni aivi.
Meve iyayapan at Judia apa wakeyawa dirumiya tui gumbe a ampe, at kokawa apa wakeyawa dirumiya dauwag ampe, sira at piyu gambenwa apa wakeyawa dirumiya at kokawa danave den unikpe.
Kuiyawa mame me garawa atanwa kumiwa, sira wait undag tenewa me taibe ape.
Me kumiwa apa vesin bug ayawa ge inanaiwa ud am munemewa mu matai danadawai koka aupe. Me apa matai piyu gerave danadawai koka uwape sira iyayapan mame gumbo God danapiriwape.
Mu matai benesi gumbe gutpe aikpe, sira matai ankwatave nau eme igiyawa ape, at da apa undag tepe wakepe, matai Ju onan igiyawa Jerusarem gerave em wakukam aigimpe meve Ju onan igiyawa kum muma onanape.
Sira me apa matai kum gumbe, dud ge marantun gumbo irakoniwa pawape, sira piyu gerave poeman noiwa uyaeba ape sira tui kokavit dog aoregimpe, meoya iyayapan uiwa a ape.
Iyayapan matai piyu undag gerave dividivi uwapewa anog a gumbe bototo ape. Kwimin yusiwa ipunapun ape.
Me kumive matai Apan Usiwa irikup danave wakeg yusiwa ge eyawa koka gaibu uwape mu yaupe.
Dividivi mame amatog aigimpewa, wan yoiya sira kuiewa enagasiya. Kuiyawa ye sira gwiruwaremtan kumiwa koni aivi.”
Sira me maibe mame dirum wane; “Yoma inaru ge yoma undag yawamiya.
Mu kwayawa duwaigimpewa, me ye yaug anoya bodu kumiwa koni aivi.
Ebu me desiroma, ye me dividivi mame undag yauyawa, Apan Usiwa me ankwin noive koni aivi yaug anoya.
Ne natawa diruitna. Namu dividivi undag mame veniyape, ivi matai kum garewa uwag aipe.
Kwimin ge piyu mame matai onanape, megara ne gae neumawa den onanape.
Vesin ge apan inaiiani kukaeba oya, yoinanan oya, inaiinai anogugut gumbe oya ye nonemagewa emiyempewa, me kumiwa uwayempe, ye matai nama mina emiyempe. Meoya yembovit yaukape.
Kuiyawa me kumiwa iyayapan undag piyu gerave wakeyawa gumbo uwape.
Megara ye kum evedni amat ag nun waigimiya. Me gumbe dividivi undag mame pawapewa, ye oma ape ayun wariya, sira me gumbe ye oma ape Apan Usiwa namive yoiya.”
Kum desirom desirom Iesu temporu arawa danave toyau toyau aivi, sira aram desirom desirom me dauwag aig tui Orivu apa vinivi.
Sira iyayapan undag mumbevit gae wape anotan oya temporu arawa danave onamiya.
Gare me Bredi Iist Onanwa Buyunaeba, me iyayapan wayawa Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba, me di koni aivi.
Pirisi koukawa ge Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa mu Iesu tope boatan oya ebu upeba yobareme, kuiyawa mu iyayapan ayowa eme.
Meve iviwa waya Isukariot Judas, me aigowawa 12 me danowa da. Seitan me danave unigne.
Sira Judas me pirisi koukawa ge temporu porisu igiyawa koukawa aine mu gaibu gae waya aninin me Iesu ominawa tepe.
Mu degadega aya sira anmaga me wantan oya bainda waya.
Me bainda wane, sira iyayapan den wakeyave Iesu avig mu muntan oya me kumiwa yob warivi.
Meve Iist Onanwa Bredi Buyunaeba kumiwa uwane, me apa Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba sip usiwa me tog puyo ape.
Sira Iesu me Pita ge Jon wain kwimun waivi, “Aisiya, sira dividivi Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba nu natan oya tamibarip aya.”
Sira mu Iesu gumbe waya, “Imugap ampa nu tamibarip ata?”
Iesu garawa mu gumbo wane, “Ye at koka me unigiyawa apan da irut aug aivi me nuntosa yempe, me amave aisiya, gwe me unikpewa me unigiya.
Ye gwe abnawa gumbe aib diya, ‘Toewanewan abnawa ge dirugivi. Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba ne aigo neumawa gaibu natna. Meoya amdau pantut me ampa?’
Pantut koka painauwa undag waribiyayawa me toyau yempe. Me apa tamibarip aya.”
Mu amiya. Sira dividivi yauyawa me wait Iesu dirumne mina di. Meve mu Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba oya tamibarip aya.
Me kumiwa uwanewa, Iesu ge apasoro mu teboro apa parau wakeya.
Me mu gumbo wane, “Ne imunap kokavit, Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba mame ye gaibu natna. Meve edawai autna.
Kuiyawa ne ye diruiyeniwa, ne matai Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba me sira den natna. Me wakepe aipe God toimuwawa danave Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba natawa uwapeve, meve natna.”
Me ap aug gaun wanne, meve wane, “Mame auya sira yembovit kebaya.
Ne ye diruiyeni. Ne matai yoma greip magawa yoiba sira den natna wakeg aigimpe God toimuwawa uwapeve, meve natna.”
Me bredi aug gaun wanne, meve wasine mu munne wane, “Mame ne kwapunwa ye yeneni. Mame aya imug teg ano negigimiya.”
Nakwai naya onanane, meve ebu desiroma Iesu ap aug wane, “Ap mame me agi neuma mataiwa di neuma gumbe. Me yenan oya ururuwak aikpe.
Megara yauya, ne omin neuma tetanwa abnawa naniwa teboro gumbe ne gaibu waketu.
Baiboru gumbe nenan tenewa mina Apan Usiwa me matai kweg aipe. Apan Usiwa gumbe omin meuma tepewa me gumbe ano kukaeba wakeigimpe!”
Mu amatog mumbovit singui veme, mu gumbo bira ebu mame ape.
Mina ebu da kukaeba yaigiyoine, bira mu gumbo yaug anope kokawa bira ape.
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Ju onan igiyawa kin mumawa iyayapan egave yutuwa gumbe nau eme, sira yutuwa gumbe namu yoiyoi igiyawa gumbo iyayapan waya mu amaremewa.
Megara ye meib onan. Kokawa ye guniyap me ud mataiwa mina ape, sira amaraiviwa me nau wariviwa mina ape.
Kokawa me teboro apa wakene go nau warivi go? Me teboro apa wakene. Megara ne ye guniyap nau wariviwa mina nau wareni.
Ye ne danadawai aueniwa megiyanap yoiyana igiyawa.
Maman toimuwawa amaratan oya yusiwa nedne mina, ne ye yusiwa yentna.
Meoya ye toimu neuma danave teboro neuma apa yoi ge nakwai naya, sira kin seyaiba egave wakeg Isuraeru dam mumawa 12 amaraigimiya.
Saimon, Saimon, anoa. Seitan imive nakwai wiit natawa ge mutat ubeube tetan mina ye undag amaorot ape. Seitan imive ye undag nakwai wiit natawa ge mutat mina viyaviya atan aivi.
Megara ne genan oya nun wana. Kuiyawa ne imunap ge anotumat geuma yan den aikpe. Ge sira taigawa, tatagaiwa geuma wad tuwama.”
Megara me garawa wane, “Ayapan, ne ge gaibu nog anektan sira bo atan oya tamibarip ana.”
Iesu garawa wane, “Pita, ne ge dirukna. Kum gare ge koni duwamdesi wa den yauneg anoana, meve kumkum wape.”
Meve Iesu mu gumbo singui wane, “Ne anmaga ikwaeba, ikwai go sandoro den te yenna aisiyanawa, ye divi da oma den ane go onan?” Mu garawa waya, “Onan di.”
Me mu gumbo wane, “Megara ye anmaga ikwaeba da auyawa me auya, ikwai gaibu auya. Ye benesi da den auyawa, wape yeuma gwiruwat anmaga aug, me gumbe benesi gwiruwat auya.
Ne ye diruitna. ‘Me kukaeba igiyawa gaibu basiyaya.’ Mame ne gunap tenewa di matatpe. Ne gunap tenewa me di koni matatpe.”
Mu waya, “Ayapan yawa, mapa benesi duwam wakeya,” me garawa wane, “Me oma ane.”
Iesu tui Orivu dauwag aine. Me kum evedni meib aivi. Sira aigowawa amave amiya.
At me uwayawa, me mu dirum wane, “Ye matai kukaeba gumbe uyug den aigiya, meoya nun waigimiya.”
Me yankwem an vereme aig aigiviwa me mina aine, sira koniwa yug nun wane.
“Maman, ge ano geumawa ipewa, ap mame ne gunap atan auwa. Me ne ano neumawa onan, megara ge ano geumawa veniyape.”
Sira aneya kwimin apa me gumbe uwane, me waita wan yusiwa wanne.
Me danadawai koka aunewa, me nun gerave yaiyai wane. Me amun wadnewa, di mina piyu gerave aigne.
Me nun wane onanane wan yoine sira aigowawa oya uwanewa, mu danadawai muma gumbe kubvineme yawamne.
Me mu gumbo wane, “Ye divi oya kubvinene? Wan yoiya, nun waigimiya, me gumbe ye matai kukaeba gumbe uyug den aigiya.”
Iesu ande gae waiviwa, iyayapan me gumbe uwaya. Apan da me iviwa waya Judas, me aigowawa 12 danavewa da. Me namuyoiyoi aivi. Me uwa totan oya Iesu gumbe obmanne.
Megara Iesu me gumbe wane, “Judas, ge Apan Usiwa uwa toto gumbe ominawa teege?”
Iesu gaibu birorot wakeyawa divi me pawatan aivi yauya. Mu waya, “Ayapan, nu benesi numa gaibu mut ata?”
Sira mu da benesi viyane pirisi painauvitwa me nauwawa aiviwa da naunawa yutanwa kwagomiyane aigne.
Megara Iesu wane, “Mame mina sira den aya.” Me apan naunawa yumne warinamne.
Meve Iesu pirisi painauvitwa, temporu porisu igiyawa koukawa sira namuyoiyoi igiyawa menan onamiyawa dirum wane, “Ne ub igiyawa tam namuyoiyoi eni go? Meoya ye deba ge seri gumbe ne yumnektan uwayana?
Kum evedni ne ye gaibu temporu arawa apa wakeete, sira ye naniwa da den ne gunap barauyana. Megara kum mame me yeumawa. Me sisip yusiwa.”
Meve mu me auya. Mu me aug, pirisi painauvitwa gweyawa amiya. Pita painau utupa mu amowo aivi.
Sira mu pirisi painauvitwa gweyawa danave panki yapave me apa iyam okereg undag yan wakeya. Pita mu gaibu yan wakeya.
Vesin nau aiviwa da iyam okeriya eyave Pita yan wakene yaune. Vesin me keni tog yaug wane, “Apan mame me gaibu wakenewa.”
Megara Pita onan di wane, “Vesin, ne me den yaug anona.”
Kusi pungi wanewa, apan da me yaug sira wane, “Ge mina mu desiroma da.” Megara Pita gara wane, “Apan, ne onan.”
Kum koniwa desirom onanane mina, apan da sira gae yusipam wane, “Natawa di, apan mame me gaibu wakeyawa da, kuiyawa me Gariri abnawa.”
Pita wane, “Apan, ne den yaug anona ge divi oya vege.” Me koni me apa gae waiviwa kumkum wane.
Ayapan tobiyag Pita yangut siwavit yaune, meve Pita me watavit Ayapan me gumbe gae wanewa imug anone, “Kum gare, namu koni duwamdesi ge ne topai negawa, ivi kumkum wape.”
Sira me dauwag aig it kokavit wane.
Iyayapan Iesu amaremewa amatog iyagau okereme sira me toeme.
Sira me yangawa toboriya, me gumbe ayag singui waya, “Ge propeta, ge bira toadne?”
Sira mu gae kukaeba obiren me gumbe waya.
Wantenewa, dam namuyoiyoi igiyawa, pirisi koukawa ge Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa onam agoniyaya. Mu Iesu aug Daiboru Painauvitwa gumbe amiya.
Mu waya, “Ge Keriso ipewa, me diruna.” Megara Iesu wane, “Ne Keriso ye diruitnawa, ye matai anotumat den anegiya.
Sira ne ye singui yempnawa, ye matai garawa den waya.
Megara mame apa utan aipewa, Apan Usiwa matai God me yusipamit naniyutanwa apa wakepe.”
Mu undag waya, “Ge me God Usiwa?” Iesu garawa wane, “Ye natawa vene. Ne meme di.”
Meve mu waya, “Nu divi oya taibe watan igiyawa da yobaton? Nu membo noive meme anotu.”
Meve iyayapan undag wan yoig Pairat gumbe Iesu aug amiya.
Mu Iesu gumbe amatog kukaeba diyag veme, “Nu yautu apan mame iyayapan numa kuiyowa watpipam munivi. Me Siisa gumbe takesi den tepe me iyayapan dirumivi, sira ne kin Keriso waivi.”
Pairat singui ane, “Ge Ju igiyawa kin mumawa?” Iesu garawa wane, “Ge natawa vege, ne meme di.”
Pairat me tobiyag pirisi koukawa ge iyayapan gumbo dirum wane, “Ne yauna, apan mame danave kukaeba da onan.”
Megara mu gae yusipamit diyag waya, “Apan mame toyau meuma at Judia undag iyayapan danowa undag aune. Gariri apa amatog on mame uwane.”
Pairat mame anonewa singui ane, “Apan mame Gariri apan?”
Me yaug anone me Erod yusiwa ankwatave wakenewa. Sira tate me baraune Erod oya aine. Kuiyawa kum me kumiwa apa Erod Jerusarem apa wakene.
Erod Iesu yaunewa degadega kokavit ane. Kuiyawa me gaiyawa anone, kum yobutatae me imive me yautan anoivi, sira me irayauyau meuma yautan anoivi.
Meoya me gumbe singui obiren ane, megara Iesu garawa den wane.
Pirisi koukawa ge Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa mu yokek gae kukaeba me gumbe yusipamit diyag veme.
Meve Erod ge mut igiyawa meumawa me iviwa aug yan barauya iyagau waniya. Meve wape oraimina en waniya barauya Pairat oya taig aine.
Oiyat me, Erod ge Pairat yaire aya. Namu mu anavi eme.
Pairat me pirisi koukawa, namuyoiyoi igiyawa ge iyayapan auwane mu onamiya.
Mu dirumne, “Ye apan mame nenan aug onekke sira aib wayana. Apan mame namuyoiyoi gwambe aivi. Ne gare ye namuyap epinawa yobana, megara me kukaeba meuma kuiyawa da den yaug anona.
Erod me meib. Me sira me baraune nunan onne. Yauya, me kukaeba da den ane bo atan oya.
Meoya ne murap gumbe tog meve kwetna aipe.”
(-)
Iyayapan undagit nouwa desiromit kwaruwaya, “Apan mame toengura, ge Barabas aropa dauwag nunan ompe.”
(Barabas me nog aig wakene, kuiyawa at kokawa danave me mut amatone sira iyayapan gudne oya.)
Pairat imive Iesu yankwepe aipe, meoya mu gumbo sira wane.
Megara mu kwaruwaya, “Me korosi gumbe toya! Korosi gumbe toya!”
Sira me mu gumbo koni duwamdesiyawa wane, “Megara me kukaeba divi da ane? Ne kukaeba meuma bo totanwa me ne da den yauna. Meoya ne aug murap gumbe totna meve kwetna aipe.”
Megara mu kwat wansin ande veme. Mu imuwo me yoma korosi gumbe tope botope. Mu kwat mumawa natawa matadne.
Meoya Pairat iyayapan noiwa aune sira yoig wane mu imuwo gumbe ape.
Sira Pairat Barabas kwene aine, mu imuwo gumbe. Apan me mut amatone sira iyayapan gudne oya nog aigne wakene. Pairat Iesu mu nanuwo baraune sira mu Iesu gumbe anoano muma gumbe aya.
Mu me auwag amomewa, Sairin apan iviwa Saimon me at meuma apa oniviwa mu auya. Mu yoma korosi oieve baraug diyag waya. Me aug Iesu amave yoine.
Iyayapan obiren Iesu amave amiya, sira vesin obiren gaibu danadawai auwag it menan wag amome.
Megara Iesu munan tobiyag wane, “Jerusarem gwaitawaiwa, it nenan den waya, go yembo yenan ge ud yeuma oya iruwaya.
Kuiyawa, yauya, kum me onivi iyayapan aib wapewa, ‘Agara vesin, danowo ud onanwa, sira ud am den munemewa, mu gumbo waribiya wakeigimpe!’
Kum me kumiwa, iyayapan tui gumbe amatog wape, ‘Egunup aiga,’ sira tui kusikaren gumbe wape, ‘Um nuna.’
Mu yoma kaninga gumbe dividivi mame apewa, yoma toyainewa gumbe aninin ape?”
Kukaeba igiyawa duwam gaibu me gaibu bo atan oya tam amiya.
Mu amog at iviwa Kuiyamarednawa vemewa uwaya. Meve Iesu yoma korosi gumbe toya sira apan kukaeba duwam gaibu guriya. Dawa naniyutanwa dawa naniketaiwa apa.
Iesu wane, “Maman, kukaeba muma anog yankwema. Mu den yawag anoya mu divi eme.” Mu kae kusida aya wape meuma keptetan oya.
Iyayapan yokeg yangureme. Namuyoiyoi igiyawa iyagau me gumbe waya, “Me iyayapan upeba waita munne. Apan mame God wagomiyanewa Keriso ipewa, me membovit warinampe.”
Mut igiyawa uwake iyagau me gumbe aya, sira omoke wain sisipama waniya.
Mu waya, “Ge Ju igiyawa kin mumawa ipewa, ge gembovit inaigita.”
Me egave gae mame teya: MAME JU IGIYAWA KIN MUMAWA.
Apan kukaeba desirom yoma korosi gumbe toyawa Iesu gumbe iyagau wane, “Ge Keriso ipewa, ge gembovit ge nu gaibu warinam nuna.”
Go apan kukaeba dawa garawa wane aib diengudne. “Ge God aeba den ege? Ge ibnawa gina desirom auege.
Nu ibnawa nuniyawa me bainda. Kuiyawa garawa me atuwa nu aviete. Go apan mame kukaeba da den ane.”
Meve kukaeba abnawa da dig wane, “Iesu, toimu geuma danave unig Ayapan awa kumiwa apa, nenan imug anoa.”
Iesu menan aib garawa wane, “Ne ge natawa dirugeni. Gare ge ne gaibu paradais danave waketa.”
Kum kuiyunup mina aune. Sisip at undag umne aine augoi adne kum koniwa duwamdesi aune.
Kum tobiroriyane sisip uwag onne. Temporu danave wape gwarapama, me yapave viyodne aigne duwam ane.
Iesu au kokavit wane, “Maman, ge nanigap ne guwanwa barautna.” Meib wag gaup meuma oieba pukuwane.
Senturion yaune divi matadne. God watdegawan wane, “Natawa di, Apan mame oraivit di abnawa.”
Iyayapan undag yanguratan oya onam agoniyayawa, mu undag yauya divi matadne. Mu danadawai gaibu togewo toya sira taig amiya.
Megara Iesu yaug anoyawa igiyawa ge vesin mu at Gariri apa amave onamiyawa, at painau yoike dividivi undag mame yangureme.
Gare apan iviwa Josep wakene, me Daiboru Painauvitwa igiyawa intum anewa, me apan oraiwa sira ano kukaeba den anoiviwa.
Apan mame kansoru igiyawa nouwa ge mu atan ayawa gumbe den kiniyane. Me at Arimataya abnawa, at me Ju igiyawa gwetoimu mumawa. Me God toimuwawa yautan amaraivi.
Apan mame Pairat gumbe aine, sira imive Iesu kwapiwa autan oya wane.
Meve me aug aigne. Me wape gumbe panke sira aug aig dagup me buinunu kwapiya apa baraune. Me apa iragi numan da den barauya.
Kum me Tamibarip Kumiwa, sira Sabat Kumiwa koni uwatan aivi.
Vesin gaibu me amowo onamiya. Mu at Gariri apa Iesu amave onamiyawa. Mu dagup yauya, me kwapiwa aninin barauyawa yauya.
Meve mu sira taig amiya, gegura ge oira tayapama tamibarip aya. Megara mu Sabat Kumiwa oya gwangwan gumbe nonowa emiya.
Pura danave kum namuirenwa, mumbevit vesin mu gegura me kwapiwa barautan oya mu tamibarip ag tam dagup amiya.
Mu yauya an dagup gumbe wait itari aya.
Meve mu unigiyawa, Ayapan Iesu kwapiwa den wakene yauya.
Mu ano pimpanum emewa, apan duwam wape pupuyu esiviwa enke namuwo yoiya.
Mu a ake kwanowa yan piyu gumbe siya. Megara mu mu gumbo waya, “Divi oya ye wakeiviwa abnawa oya bo danowo yobene?
Me mapa onan. Me sira inaig yoine. Me ande at Gariri apa wakenewa kumiwa apa, me ye diruinewa imug teg anoya.
Me aib wane, ‘Apan Usiwa me aug kukaeba igiyawa nanuwo baraupe. Yoma korosi gumbe tope botope. Kum duwamdesiyawa apa me sira inaig yoipe.’”
Meve mu gae meuma sira imug teg anoya.
Mu sira dagup gumbe taigiyawa, aigowawa 11 ge iyayapan upeba undag dividivi mame undag dirumiya.
Vesin mu ivuwa me Magdara vesin Meri, Joanna ge Meri me Jemus inawa. Sira vesin upeba mu gaibu wakeyawa apasoro igiyawa dividivi mame undag dirumiya anoya.
Megara apasoro igiyawa anoya gae mumawa natawa mina onan. Meoya vesin gumbo anotumat den aya.
Megara Pita wan yoig dagup oya kintog aine, me kwanawa sig dagup danave yaunewa, wape rinen mekut wakene. Me mame gumbe terag gwe sira taig aine.
Sira kum me desirom danave, mu duwam gwetoimu iviwa Emaus amome. Me Jerusarem gumbe yobu meuma 11 kiromitas mina.
Mu dividivi undag pawanewa oya gae garawa eme.
Mu gae wag yugeyau ag amomewa, Iesu membo me apa uwane mu gaibu amiya.
Mu yaimoyai den yaveme, meoya Iesu irawa yaiyai den yauya.
Me singui munne, “Ye divi oya gae garawa ano ag aisiene?” Mu anogugut ag tum ag yokeya.
Apan dawa iviwa Kreopas garawa wane, “Ge Jerusarem apa wakeyana. Megara me apa kum me kumiwa dividivi pawanewa gekut den anoana?”
Me singui wane, “Me divi?” Mu me gumbe waya, “Nasaret Apan Iesu oya. Me propeta. Me God ge iyayapan undag namuwo gae wag anewa me yusiatatu.
Pirisi koukawa ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa numawa boatan gaiyawa oya wag barauya. Sira mu yoma korosi gumbe toya botone.
Megara nu anotu me Isuraeru waita wampe. Sira dividivi undag mame gaibu, dividivi mame pawanewa gare mame kum duwamdesiyawa.
Megara nu vesin numa upeba waya, nu teratu. Mu gare mumbevit babat amiya.
Megara me kwapiwa den yauya. Mu sira taig onam didnuniya, mu aneya guwaguwawa yauya. Sira mu waya me sira inaig wakene.
Kum me kumiwa apa, iyayapan numa upeba dagup amiya. Sira yauyawa me aninin vesin waya mina yauya, go mu me den yauya.”
Me munan wane, “Ye kuiyewa onan. Dividivi propeta wayawa undag anotumat den ene kusi da mapa di. Ye nonemagewa yaigiwane oya den anoene.
Keriso dividivi edawai mame auke, meve eyawa meuma danave unikpe.”
Meve me namu Mosisi ge propeta gigirumawa undag gumbo amatog, Baiboru danave aninin membo mu teyawa toyau munne.
Mu gwetoimu me oya amomewa koni uwatan emewa, megara Iesu yauyawa me namuwo aivi.
Mu me yusipamit wataig waya, “Gunup wakeya. Kuiyawa kum aigivi, aram uwatan aivi.” Meoya Iesu unig aine mu gaibu wakeya.
Iesu nakwai oya mu gaibu yanwakeya. Me bredi auke, gaun wag warensine mu munne.
Sira mu yangowo watabnewa, mu apan me Iesu yaug anoya. Megara me mu yapowo inanadne.
Mu garawa ano aya. “Me epin taibe didnuniviwa, sira me Baiboru didnuniviwa, nonunwa idne. Natawa di.”
Tatevit mu wan yoike Jerusarem taig amiya. Me apa apasoro 11 ge iyayapan mu agoniemewa mu yawamiya.
Sira mu veme, “Keriso sira inaine me natawa di. Me Saimon gumbe uwane.”
Mu dirumiya aninin epin taibe pawane. Sira me bredi warensinewa, kum me kumiwa mepe Iesu yaug anoya.
Mu gae mame ande vemewa, Iesu membo mu yapowo yoine. Sira me mu gumbo wane, “Yum ye guniyap.”
Mu terake a aya, sira mu anoya guwawa yaveme.
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Ye divi oya daneyap anoene? Divi oya pimpangitene?
Naninwa amanwa yauya. Ne meme. Yumneg yauya. Kuiyawa guwawa me mame mina kwapiwa ge marednawa gaibu onan. Ye yavene ne kwapunwa ge marednanwa gau.”
Me gae mame onananewa naniwa ge amawa toyau munne.
Mu degadega kokavit ag teraya, meoya mu ande anotumat den aya. Me dirumne, “Gare mapa ye divi da wakene, ne natna?”
Mu gwambui idnewa simiwa waniya.
Me aug mu namuwo nane.
Me mu gumbo wane, “Ne ande guniyap wakenawa mame diruina. Mosisi Gwangwaneba, propeta bukaeba ge Sam bukaeba danave nenan teyawa dividivi undag matatpe.”
Meve mu Baiboru natawa yaug anotan oya Iesu nono magowa watabne.
Mu dirumne, “Mapa aib tene. Keriso edawai aupe, bo ape sira kum duwamdesiyawa apa boriruwayawa igiyawa gumbo sira inaig yoipe.
Nonenmagowa biroriyatanwa ge kukaeba anog yankwetanwa oya Iesu iviwa gumbe at undag opata wape. Jerusarem apa amatope.
Ye dividivi undag mame yauyanawa igiyawa.
Maman agi wanewa yenan barautna aikpe. Megara gare gwetoimu kokawa danave wakeya, ivi yusiwa painauwa opa aigon ye wape mina en yempe yusiwa auya.”
Iesu mu tamne at Betani visive dauwag amiyawa, me naniwa enagadne, mu waribiya munne.
Me waribiya mun, mu kwem kwimin danave dog aine.
Mu degadega koka gumbe at Jerusarem taig amiya.
Mu temporu arawa danave evedni wakeeme. God watdega waneme.
Namuiren amatonewa me apa Gae wakene, sira Gae me God gaibu, sira Gae me God.
Namuiren amatonewa me apa me God gaibu wait wakene.
Me gumbe dividivi undag waramne. Dividivi undag waramnewa yapowo me gumbe den wadnewa divi da den wakene.
Me danave inaiinai wakene, sira inaiinai mame me eyawa iyayapan munan.
Eyawa me sisip danave esivi, megara sisip me den yaug anone.
Apan da God baraunewa me uwane; me iviwa Jon.
Me taibe watan oya uwane. Me eyawa oya taibe watan oya, sira iyayapan undag me gumbe anotumat atan oya.
Me eyawa onan, megara me eyawa oya taibe watan oya uwane.
Eyawa natawa me iyayapan undag gumbo esipewa me piyu mame uwatan aivi.
Me piyu mame apa wakene, sira piyu mame me gumbe wadne, megara piyu mame me den yaug anone.
Me at meuma uwane, megara iyayapan meuma me den auya.
Megara bira bira undag me auyawa sira me iviwa gumbe anotumat ayawa, God usitainawa atan oya yusiwa munne:
Mu diyawa mumawa go kwapiwa anoanowawa go iyayapan ano mumawa gumbe den yaiya, megara God gumbe yaiya.
Gae me kwapiven ane, sira me gunup wakene. Nu me eyawa meuma yautu. Eyawa mame me Usiwa desiromiren eyawa. Me Mamawa gumbe onne. Eyawa me ano oraiwa ge ano natawa gumbe noidauwane.
Jon me me oya taibe wane. Me kwaruwag wane, “‘Apan da ne amanap uwapewa ne minan onan me yusipama, kuiyawa me ne namunap wakene,’ ne wait wanawa, me apan mame oya wana.”
Me gumbe ano oraiwa noidauwane. Me gumbe nu undag ano oraiwa egave noidauwanewa autu.
Kuiyawa Gwangwan Mosisi gumbe nunne, megara ano oraiwa ge ano natawa Iesu Keriso gumbe uwane.
Bira da God den yaune. Megara Usiwa Desiromiren mekut me Mamawa gumbe wakenewa me taibe wag toyau nunne.
Jon taibe wanewa me mamaib. Ju igiyawa mu pirisi ge Rivai igiyawa teya amiya, Jerusarem apa me gumbe singui ag yautan oya amiya. Mu singui ag waya, “Ge bira?”
Me den yan umune. Me garawa taibe di wane, “Ne Keriso onan.”
Sira mu me gumbe singui aya, “Meve, ge bira? Ge Eraija, go?” Me wane, “Ne me onan.” “Ge propeta da?” Megara wane, “Onan.”
Meve mu waya, “Ge bira? Gae natawa didnuna. Nu tenuniya onantuwa igiyawa gumbo nu wata anope. Ge gembo anin wamon?”
Me gara wane, “Propeta Aisaya gae meuma gumbe wane mina, ne at inguiwa arawa danave, ‘Ayapan oya ebu siwavit waribiya,’ auwaiviwa abnawa noiwa.”
Mu Parisi igiyawa gumbo temuniya onamiya.
Mu me singui aya, “Ge Keriso onan, go Eraija onan, go propeta onan ipewa, divi oya ge babataito ege?”
Jon gara wane, “Ne yoi gumbe babataito eni. Megara desirom da den yaug anoyanawa me guniyap yokene.
Apan me ne amanap uwapewa, ne oma den ane sandoro murap meuma vetna.”
Dividivi mame yoi Jodan gambenwa apa at Betani apa pawane. Me apa Jon babataito aivi.
Umaipa, Jon me Iesu me gumbe onivi yaug wane, “Yauya, God Sip Usiwa, me piyu undag kukaeba muma tam aipe!
‘Apan me ne amanap uwape. Me koka ne kudnausiren. Kuiyawa me ne namunaba,’ ne meib wait veniwa, apan mame oya.
Ne nembo me den yaug anona. Megara apan mame matai iyai Isuraeru gumbo taibe atan oya ne uwag yoi gumbe babataito eni!”
Meve Jon taibe dirumne. “Ne Guwawa me umug mina kwimin apa aig onne sira me egave wakene yauna.
Ne nembo me den yaug anona. Megara God me ne yoi gumbe babataito atan oya baraunednewa wag didnedne, ‘Guwawa apan da egave aig on wakepe yawawa, me Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gumbe babataito ape.’
Ne yauna, meoya ne taibe veni apan mame me God Usiwa.”
Umaipa, Jon me aigowawa duwam gaibu yokeya.
Me Iesu uwag aivi yaune, me wane, “Yauya, God Sip Usiwa!”
Aigowawa duwam me meib wane anoyawa, mu Iesu amave amiya.
Iesu tobiyag mu amave amomewa yawam dirumne, “Ye imuyep dimbae?” Mu waya, “Rabai, (Me tobiyak tenewa, toewanewan), ge ampa wakeege?”
Me gara wane, “Oneg yauya.” Meve mu amiya sira me wakeiviwa arawa yauya. Sira kum me, me gaibu wakeya. Kum koniwa me augoi 4 mina.
Jon aigowawa duwam mu Jon wanewa anoyawa Iesu amave amiya. Desirom da me Andru, me Saimon Pita gwaneba.
Me namu tatawa Saimon didimama ag yaug dine, “Nu Mesaiya yautu.” (Mesaiya tobiyak tenewa me Keriso).
Sira me Iesu gumbe Saimon aug onne. Iesu me yaune sira wane, “Ge Saimon, Jon usiwa. Ge ivugwa Kepas dirugeni.” (Me tobiyak tenewa me Pita).
Umaipa Iesu me Gariri aitan anone. Pirip yaunewa me gumbe wane, “Amanap onaga.”
Andru ge Pita mina, Pirip me Betuseida apa onnewa. Mu gwetoimu desirom.
Pirip me Natanieru didimama aigin yaune sira dig wane, “Nu apan da yautu. Menan oya Mosisi Gwangwan danave tene sira propeta teya. Me Nasaret apan Iesu, Josep usiwa.”
Natanieru wane, “At Nasaret apa oma ane divi da oraiwa uwape, go?” Pirip wane, “Onag yawa.”
Iesu Natanieru me gumbe ob maniviwa yaune wane, “Mame me Isuraeru apan di, me gumbe uga onan.”
Natanieru Iesu gumbe wane, “Ge aninin ne yauneg anoege?” Iesu gara wane, “Ge yoma inaru ankwatave wakeege yawagna. Meve ivi Pirip genan auwane.”
Meve Natanieru gara wane, “Rabai, ge God Usiwa. Ge Isuraeru kin mumawa.”
Iesu gara wane, “Ge yoma inaru ankwatave wakeege yawagna ne ge dirugna, meoya ge anotumat ana? Ge dividivi kokawa matai yawa.”
Meve me gumbe wane, “Ne natawa di dirugeni. Kwimin watappe, sira God aneya meuma Apan Usiwa egave aig ge dauwa aigimpewa ge matai yawa.”
Kum duwamdesiyawa, Gariri dana at Keina apa memgebip eme, Iesu inawa me apa gaibu,
memgebip oya Iesu ge aigowawa gaibu munan eb teya uwaya.
Wain onananewa Iesu inawa me gumbe wane, “Mu wain onan.”
Iesu gara wane, “Vesin, ge dimbae oya ge gungap nau atna vege? Ne kum neuma den uwane, me matai.”
Iesu inawa naueme igiyawa gumbo dirum wane, “Me anin diruipewa undag me gumbe aya.”
Gare asimeve uinoum me an gumbe wariyawa 6 wakeya. Uinoum me Ju igiyawa inaiinai mumawa gumbe mu muintan oya wakeyawa. Uinoum desirom me yoi utpe noidauwapewa me 75 go 115 ritas mina.
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Uinoum yoi avenam waramiya noidauwape.” Mu yoi avenam waramiya uinoum noidauwaya.
Meve Iesu me mu dirum wane, “Gare mame di utamiya. Sira buyunai amaraiviwa kokawa gumbe tam aisiya.” Mu meib wanewa mina di aya.
Sira buyunai amaraiviwa kokawa yoi me tobiyane wain anewa nag anone. Me den yaug anone me ampa onne. Megara naueme igiyawa yoi usiyawa mu yaug anoya. Meve me memgebip abnawa menan auwag,
wane, “Bira bira da namu wain demtapama oraiwa tam onampe. Amdau igiyawa kokavit nape onanapewa meve wain demta onanwa tam onampe. Megara ge di wain oraiwa barauwana wakene gare mame di.”
Iesu mame irayauyau namuirenwa Gariri dana at Keina apa ane. Me eyawa meuma taibe ane, sira aigowawa anotumat muma me gumbe aya.
Meve ivi Iesu inawa, gwanebaviwa ge aigowawa gaibu Kapenaum aig amiya. Me apa kum koni kusida wakeya.
Ju igiyawa Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba muma di koni aiviwa Iesu Jerusarem dog aine.
Temporu arawa danave iyayapan burumakau, sip ge umug gwiruwareme yawamne. Sira anmaga garawa tobieme igiyawa wakeeme yawamne.
Meoya me murap kusi wariyawa me gumbe temporu arawa apa undag gud atatai imne. Iesu sip ge burumakau atatai imne, sira anmaga garawa tobieme igiyawa anmaga mumawa tam egamne sira teboro muma tam tobiyane.
Iyayapan mu umug gwiruwaremewa gumbo me wane, “Dividivi mapa tam dauwag aisiya! Maman gweyawa den tobiyaya gwiruwareme gweyawa den ape!
Me aigowawa mu imug anoya me wait Baiboru gumbe aninin teg wanewa, “Ge gwe geuma oya anoeniwa nonenmagawa danave iyam mina igivi.”
Meoya Ju igiyawa me gumbe gara waya, “Divi divi mame ge ana oya, irayauyau divi da nu gunup toyau nuna yauton ge yutugwa toyau nuntan oya?”
Iesu gara mu gumbo wane, “Temporu mame yayag wakukamiyawa, ne kum duwamdesi danave sira sitna.”
Ju igiyawa gara waya, “Temporu mame sieme bairawan 46 aune. Sira ge kum duwamdesi danave oma ane sira siya?”
Megara temporu me Iesu wanewa me membo kwapiwa oya wane.
Me ivi boane sira inainewa, aigowawa me wait meib wanewa imug teg anoya. Meve Baiboru ge gae Iesu wanewa gumbe mu anotumat aya.
Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba oya Iesu Jerusarem apa wakenewa, Iesu irayauyau aivi iyayapan obiren yauya, sira me iviwa gumbe anotumat aya.
Megara Iesu membo anotumat den munne. Kuiyawa iyayapan undag nonomagowa me yaug anone.
Me apan gumbe bira bira taibe watanwa me anotan den anoivi, kuiyawa iyayapan nonomagowa danave divi wakenewa me membo yaug anone.
Parisi apan da iviwa Nikodemas wakene. Me Ju namuyoiyoi abnawa da.
Me Iesu gumbe arampuna onne, sira me gumbe wane, “Rabai, nu yaugem anotu ge toewanewan abnawa God gumbe onaganawa. Kuiyawa God me gumbe den wakenewa, bira da oma den ane ape irayauyau ge egewa.”
Iesu gara me gumbe wane, “Ne ge natawa di dirugeni. Bira da sira den yaipewa me oma den ane God toimuwawa yaupe.”
Nikodemas wane, “Megara aninin oma ape apan me wait tayawa anewa sira yai yoipe? Natawa di, me oma den ane inawa dana sira unikpe sira yaig yoipe.”
Iesu gara wane, “Ne ge natawa di dirugeni. Bira da yoi ge Guwawa gumbe sira den yaipewa, oma den ane God toimuwawa unikpe.
Kwapiwa gumbe yaipewa me kwapiwa, megara Guwawa gumbe yaipewa me guwawa.
Ne wana, ye sira di yaiya. Megara gae neuma veniwa gumbe den anopipanum a.
Taig me anoiviwa gumbe viyaivi, sira ge noiwa anoa. Megara ge den yaug anoana me ampa onivi go ampa aivi. Iyayapan guwawa gumbe yaiyawa me mina di.”
Nikodemas gara wane, “Mame me aninin?”
Iesu gara wane, “Ge Isuraeru toewanewan mumawa, megara mame ge den yaug anoege?
Ne natawa di dirugeni. Nu yaug anotuwa gae vete, sira nu yautuwa taibe vete. Megara ye nu vetewa ande den yaug anoene.
Ne dividivi at piyu mame danavewa oya ye guniyap wanawa ye den anotumat ayanawa, ne dividivi kwimin danavewa oya watna ipewa me aninin anotumat aya?
Bira da kwimin den dog aine, megara desirom me kwimin apa aeg onnewa wakene. Me Apan Usiwa.
Mosisi at inguiwa arawa apa mokare enagadne mina di, Apan Usiwa me enagappe.
Iyayapan undag mu Apan Usiwa gumbe anotumat emewa mu inaiinai yaibobot aupe.”
God baigan meuma kokavit at piyu mame gumbe, meoya me Usiwa Desiromiren munne. Bira da me gumbe anotumat apewa me bo den ape inaiinai yaibobot aupe.
God piyu mame pui yutan oya Usiwa den baraune onne, me piyu mame me gumbe waita muntan oya.
Bira da Usiwa gumbe anotumat apewa, me gumbe pui den yupe. Megara bira da anotumat den anewa, me gumbe wait pui aune. Kuiyawa me God Usiwa Desiromiren iviwa gumbe anotumat den ane.
Puiyuyu me mame mina. Eyawa piyu mame uwane. Megara iyayapan eyawa gumbe topai aya sisip gumbe baigan aya, kuiyawa dividivi muma emewa me kukaeba.
Bira da kukaeba aiviwa me eyawa topai aivi, sira matai eyawa gumbe den ompe, kuiyawa me divi anewa matai taibe ape oya a aivi.
Megara bira da natawa gumbe aiviwa me eyawa gumbe ompe. Kuiyawa dividivi me aiviwa God gumbe aivi, sira me di taibe ape yautanwa oya.
Mame ivi, Iesu aigowawa gaibu at Judia apa amiya, sira me apa mu gaibu wakeya. Sira me babataito amunivi.
Jon me mina at Sarim megiyave at Aenon apa babataito amunivi. Kuiyawa me apa yoi koka. Sira iyayapan kum evedni babataito atan oya omome.
Kuiyawa kum mame apa, Jon nog danave den barauyave.
Meoya wat muintanwa oya, garawa ano atanwa pawane Jon aigowawa ge Ju igiyawa mu yapowo.
Mu Jon gumbe onam waya, “Rabai, apan me ge gaibu yoi Jodan gambenwa apa wakeyanawa, me gumbe ge taibe wanawa, me babataito amunivi, sira iyayapan undag me gumbe omome.”
Jon gara wane, “Apan oma den ane divi da aupe, kwimin apa wannewa mekut aupe.
Ye yembovit ne divi wanawa yauneg anoyanawa igiyawa, ‘Ne Keriso onan, ne baraunedne me namiven onednawa.’
Memgebip vesinawa aupewa me memgebip abnawa. Eveba me memgebip abnawa oya wakeg me gaiyawa anoivi. Sira memgebip abnawa noiwa anoiviwa, me degadega kokavit aivi. Ne gaibu degadega gumbe noidauwane.
Me uwag kokavit di ape, ne kudnausiren di atna.”
“Apan bira painau uwanewa me iyayapan undag egowo wakene. Apan piyu mame apa uwanewa me piyu mame wakene, sira gae wapewa me piyu mame oya wape. Apan me kwimin apa uwanewa me iyayapan undag egowo.
Me yaunewa ge anonewa oya gae wape, megara bira da me taibe wanewa den aune.
Bira da me taibe wanewa aunewa me bainda wag kiniyane God me natawa di.
Kuiyawa apan me God baraune onnewa God gae meuma waivi. God me Guwawa wanivi om gumbe onan.
Mamawa me Usiwa gumbe baigan niyaivi sira dividivi undag me nanive tene.
Bira da Usiwa gumbe anotumat aigimpewa me inaiinai yaibobot aupe, megara bira da Usiwa topayaiviwa matai inaiinai den yaupe, sira God danapiriwa me gumbe wakene.”
Parisi igiyawa anoya Iesu me aigowawa obiren tamivi sira babataito amunivi. Jon tamnewa mina onan. Ayapan me yaug anonewa,
—go Iesu membo babataito den amunivi, aigowawa eme.—
me Judia kweg sira Gariri taig aine.
Megara me at Samaria danave di dauwag aitanit di.
Meve me at Samaria danave gwetoimu iviwa waya Sikaya uwane. At me Jekob me usiwa Josep oya piyu wannewa me megiyave.
Jekob yoi dukup meuma me apa. Iesu aramavit onne uiwa topayadne oya yoi dukup visive yan wakene. Kum koniwa me kum kuiyunup mina.
Samaria vesin da yoi uttan oya uwane. Iesu me gumbe wane, “Garawapa yoi nega?”
Me aigowawa nakwai gwiruwattan oya gwetoimu da amiya.
Samaria vesin me gumbe wane, “Ge Ju apan, sira ne Samaria vesin. Dimbae oya ne gunap yoi oya vege?” (Kuiyawa Ju igiyawa ge Samaria igiyawa yapowo baigan onan.)
Iesu me gumbe gara wane, “Ge God ano puyo meuma yaug anoa ipewa, sira bira yoi oya dirugiviwa anoa ipewa, ge ne didnekpawa, ne inaiinai yoiba gempopo.”
Vesin wane, “Kokawa, ge yoi uttanwa da den auwana, sira yoi dukup mame me epampa. Ge inaiinai yoiba me ampa aumon?
Ge kokavitwa? Nu mamunwa Jekob mina onan? Jekob yoi dukup mame nunne, sira me membo, me usitainawa ge mae bui meuma undag yoi dukup mame gumbe naya.”
Iesu gara wane, “Bira da yoi mame napewa me sira meyawa toyaipe.
Megara bira da yoi ne wantnawa me napewa, matai meyawa sira den di toyaipe. Natawa di. Yoi me ne wantnawa me apan danave yamarogu ape sira yoi inaiinai yaibobot me apa dauwaigimpe.”
Vesin me gumbe wane, “Kokawa, yoi me nega. Me gumbe ne meyanwa den toyaipe sira evedni yoi uttan oya mapa den onigimpna.”
Iesu vesin dine, “Aga, memag aug mapa taig oneya.”
“Ne memanwa onan,” vesin gara wane. Iesu vesin gumbe wane, “Ne memanwa onan ge meib wanawa me natawa.
Kuiyawa ge memagwa nanin gambenit tamana, sira ge gare apan auwanawa me ge memagwa onan. Ge wanawa me natawa di.”
Vesin wane, “Kokawa, ne gaitom yaugen anoeni ge propeta.
Nu mamanaiwa tui mame egave waiya eme. Megara ye vene at me waiya atanwa me Jerusarem apa di.”
Iesu me gumbe wane, “Vesin, anotumat gunap a. Ye matai Maman gumbe waiya ayawa tui mame egave onan sira Jerusarem apa onan. Kum meiba matai onivi.
Waita me Ju igiyawa gumbo ompe. Nu yaug anotuwa gumbe waiya ete. Ye den yaug anoyanawa gumbe waiya ene.
Megara kumiwa me onivi. Me kumive, waiya natawa eme igiyawa mu guwawa ge natawa gumbe Mamanwa waiya ape. Gare me kumiwa. Kuiyawa Maman waiya meiba eme igiyawa didi mama aivi.
God me Guwawa, meoya me gumbe waiya eme igiyawa mu guwawa ge natawa gumbe waiya di ape.”
Vesin me gumbe wane, “Ne anona Mesaiya (Me iyayapan veme Keriso) onivi. Me uwapewa, dividivi undag nu gunup yaug ano numpe esipe.”
Meve Iesu me gumbe wane, “Gae ge gungap veniwa ne me.”
Pungi den wane, aigowawa sira taig uwaya. Mu me vesin gaibu gae waiviwa yaug anopipanum aya. Megara bira da den wane, “Ge imugap dimbae?” go “Ge dimbae oya vesin gaibu gae vege?”
Meve vesin me yoi uinoum, yan baraug sira taig gwetoimu aine, iyayapan gumbo wane.
“Oneg yauya. Apan da me dividivi ne anawa undag gunap wanewa wakene. Anten apan mame me Keriso go?”
Meve mu gwetoimu apa dauwag me gumbe onamiya.
Dividivi mame pawaivi kumiwa apa, aigowawa me ayag waya, “Rabai, divi da nave.”
Megara me mu gumbo wane, “Nakwai da ye den yaug anoyanawa me ne gunap.”
Meve aigowawa gae garawa ano aya, “Bira da nakwai meuma tam uwane?”
Me mu gumbo wane, “Ne nakwai neuma me ne baraunedne onednawa me anoiviwa atna sira me nau meumawa oieba watpukiyatna onanape.
Ye aib vene, go onan? ‘Dud 4 wakeya, meve maura kumiwa uwape.’ Ne ye diruitna. Yangewa meram nau wan yauya! Mu wait kweraimusia maura oya.
Maura enivi abnawa me garawa meumawa wait amatog avivi, sira inaiinai yaibobot oya natawa agoniyaivi. Kuiyawa yawa veriviwa ge maura eniviwa maun degadega atan oya.
Meib, gae me natawa, ‘Da me yawa verivi sira dawa me agoniyaivi.’
Ye yembo nau kokavit den ayanawa agoniyag tamtan oya ne ye te yenna aisiyana. Upeba nau kokavit aya, sira nau mumawa gumbe ye natawa agoniyag tamiyana.”
Samaria igiyawa obiren gwetoimu me apa vesin taibe wanewa gaiyawa oya me gumbe anotumat aya. Kuiyawa vesin me wane, “Dividivi undag ne anawa me gunap wane.”
Meoya Samaria igiyawa me gumbe uwayawa, me mu gumbo waketan oya nun waya. Me oiyat duwam wakene.
Sira me gaiyawa gumbe iyayapan obiren upeba gaibu anotumat me gumbe aya.
Mu vesin gumbe waya, “Nu gare ge wanawa oya anotumat den atu. Kuiyawa nu numbovit anoete, sira nu yaug anotu apan mame natawa di piyu mame Waita Abnawa.”
Kum duwam onananewa me kweg Gariri oya aine.
Iesu membo taibe wane, “Iyayapan mu propeta gumbo arowo den ayamat a muneme.”
Meoya me Gariri apa uwanewa, Gariri igiyawa kaiwa kaiwa gumbe baigan niyaya. Kuiyawa mu mina Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba oya amiya, sira Jerusarem danave Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba apa anewa undag mu yauya.
Me at Keina Gariri danave sira aine. At asime apa me yoi tobiyane wain ane. Sira at Kapenaum apa kin nau meuma aiviwa wakene, me usiwa yuwat ane.
Apan mame Iesu Judia apa on Gariri uwane anonewa me Iesu oya aine. Me gumbe aig on usiwa warinamtan oya nun wane. Kuiyawa me usiwa bo koni atan aivi.
Iesu me gumbe wane, “Ye irayauyau ge anopipanum den yauya ipewa, ye matai anotumat den di aya.”
Kin nau meuma aiviwa wane, “Kokawa, aig onaga, ne utunwa bo atan aivi.”
Iesu me gumbe wane, “Ge aga. Utugwa inaipe.” Apan me Iesu gae meuma me gumbe wanewa anotumat ane, sira kweg aine.
Apan me ebu taibe, me nauwawa emewa yawamne. Mu dieg waya, “Utugwa inaine.”
Meoya me singui wane, “Kum divi ud neuma inaine?” Mu me gumbe waya, “Kwapiwa amun watau augoi kum koniwa 1 mina apa kwene.”
Mamawa meve anone kum me desirom apa Iesu me gunap wane, “Utugwa inaipe.” Meoya me membo ge biviusitainawa gaibu undag anotumat aya.
Mame Iesu Judia kweg Gariri uwanewa irayauyau meuma duwameba ane.
Kum da ivi, Ju igiyawa Buyunai muma wakene, meoya Iesu Jerusarem dauwag aine.
Jerusarem apa, Ankwin Iviwa Sip wakene. Me megiyave paurum wakene. Paurum me gae Ibru gumbe me iviwa Betuseida waya. Sira me apa, ebu gwanob gaibu 5 wakeya.
Mame mu danowo, yuwat igiyawa—yangaboredmusiawa amogegeraimusiawa iruwaru enamiyawa—obiren parau vineme. Mu yoi aitanwa oya amareme.
(-)
Mu danowo apan da yuwaranewa wakene, bairawan 38 onanane.
Iesu apan mame parau vinivi yaune, sira yaug anone me danadawai gumbe wakenewa kum yobtaren. Me dig wane, “Ge imugap inaigittan anoege?”
Yuwat abnawa gara wane, “Kokawa, yoi avit wariviwa kumiwa, paurum danave uniktan oya bira da den waita negivi. Ne uniktan eniwa, apan da me namunap aigivi.”
Meve Iesu me gumbe wane, “Wan yoig goma geuma aug aga.”
Koni desirom apan me inaine. Me goma meuma aug aine. Megara kum me Sabat Kumiwa.
Meoya Ju igiyawa apan me inainewa gumbe waya, “Gare me Sabat Kumiwa. Meoya Gwangwan tobodne ge goma geuma den aug aga.”
Megara me gara wane, “Apan me ne warinam nednewa ne gunap wane, ‘Goma geuma aug aga.’”
Mu me gumbe singui waya, “Apan me bira ge dirug wanewa, ‘aug aga?’”
Apan me inainewa me den yaug anone me bira. Kuiyawa Iesu at me apa iyayapan obiren danowo tobiyag aine.
Me ivi Iesu apan me temporu arawa danave yaune, sira me gumbe wane, “Yawa, ge sira inaigitana. Kukaeba egewa yankweya, kuiyawa divi da kukaeba ibnapama matai gungap pawapetan.”
Apan me aine. Ju igiyawa dirum wane, “Apan me ne warinamnednewa me Iesu.”
Meoya Ju igiyawa Iesu edawai waniya. Me dividivi mame Sabat Kumiwa apa ane oya.
Me mu gumbo wane, “Ne Maman evedni nau meuma wat onne kum mame gare di, meoya ne mina meib nau wareni.”
Mame oya, Ju igiyawa yusiyusi ag Iesu tope bo atan oya ageyau aya. Kuiyawa me Sabat Kumiwa togomiyaiviwa me mekut onan, me God Mamawa waivi, sira me membo God mina omaoma ane waivi oya.
Meoya Iesu gara mu gumbo wane, “Ne ye natawa diruieni. Usiwa oma den ane divi da mekut ape. Me oma ane dividivi Mamawa aiviwa me yaviviwa me ape. Kuiyawa dividivi undag Mamawa aiviwa Usiwa mina meib ape.
Kuiyawa Mamawa me baigan ane Usiwa gumbe, sira me aiviwa undag Usiwa toyau wanne. Sira Mamawa matai dividivi koukawa Usiwa toyau wampe kusi mame mina onan. Me gumbe ye teratan oya.
Mamawa iyayapan boriruwayawa sira inaiinai mumpe. Me mina di, Usiwa me mina mu me imive wakenewa gumbo inaiinai mumpe.
Sira gerave Mamawa bira da den kep tepe, megara keptete yusiwa undag me Usiwa gumbe wanne.
Kuiyawa iyayapan undag Mamawa gumbe mu ayamat eme mina di mu Usiwa gumbe ayamat atanit di. Bira da Usiwa gumbe ayamat den apewa, me Mamawa bira Usiwa baraune onnewa gumbe mina ayamat den ape.
Ne ye natawa diruieni. Bira da gae neuma anope sira ne baraunedne onednawa gumbe anotumat apewa, me inaiinai yaibobot aupe. Sira me matai pui den yuwampe, sira me wait bo painau tuiyaug aine inaiinai aune.
Ne ye natawa diruieni. Kum uwaivi, iyayapan boriruwayawa me God Usiwa noiwa anope. Kum garewa me me. Sira iyayapan mu anopewa mu matai wakeigimpe.
Kuiyawa Mamawa me membo gumbe inaiinai wakene, me mina Mamawa wane Usiwa me membo gumbe inaiinai wakene.
Meve me keptete oya me gumbe yusipamit wanne, kuiyawa me Apan Usiwa.
Mame gumbe den teraya. Kuiyawa kum onivi yampot danave wakeyawa matai Usiwa noiwa anope dauwag onampe.
Dividivi oraimina ayawa mu matai yoig inaiinai aupe. Dividivi kukaeba ayawa mu matai yoig pui yumumpe.
Ne nembovit oma den ane divi da atna. Ne anonawa gumbe keptena. Sira ne keptete neuma me oraimina. Kuiyawa ne nembovit imunap atan oya den anoeni, ne baraunedne onednawa ano meumawa atan eni.
Ne nembovit nembo oya taibe watnawa ipewa, ne taibe watanwa me natawa onan.
Apan da me nenan oya taibe waiviwa wakene. Ne yaug anona me nenan oya taibe waiviwa me natawa.
Ye Jon oya iyayapan teyana amiya, sira me natawa gumbe taibe wane.
Megara iyayapan taibe watanwa ne matai den autna. Ye waita autan oya ne dividivi mame veni.
Jon me damempa ig esiviwa. Sira ye imuyep me eyawa meuma danave koni kusida degadega atan anoyana.
Megara taibe watanwa ne gunap me oraiminavit, sira Jon taibe watanwa mina onan. Maman nau nedne. Ne me wapukiyatna undag onanape, sira ne nau mame wareni. Nau mame di me ne Maman baraunedne onednawa oya taibe waivi.
Maman baraunedne onedna, sira me membo nenan oya taibe waivi. Ye me noiwa da den di anoyana, sira me irawa aninin mina den di yauyana.
Sira gae meuma ye daneyep den wakene. Kuiyawa me baraune onnewa gumbe ye anotumat den ene.
Ye Baiboru basiyag yobene, kuiyawa ye anoene me danave inaiinai yaibobot wakene. Megara Baiboru me nenan oya taibe waivi.
Megara ye ne gunap oneg inaiinai autan oya topai ene.
Ne iyayapan gumbo ayamat den autna.
Ne ye yaug anoyenna. God baigan meuma noneyep den wakene.
Ne Maman iviwa gumbe uwana, megara ye ne den aunegiyana. Apan da me iviwa gumbe uwapopo ipawa, ye me matai aupono.
Ye garagara ayamat auene. Megara ayamat me God desiromiren gumbe ompewa ye den auyawa, aninin ye akape anotumat aya?
Ye den anoya ne matai yenan Mamanwa namive pui yuentna. Yenan puiyuyu atanwa me Mosisi, me gumbe ye owaniyag barauyanawa.
Ye Mosisi gumbe anotumat aponowa, ye ne gunap anotumat apono. Kuiyawa me nenan tene.
Megara tenewa ye anotumat den aya ipewa, gae neumawa ye aninin anotumat aya?”
Kum da mame ivi, Iesu poeman Gariri, me iviwa poeman Tiberias, togomiyag visi gambenwa dauwag aine.
Sira iyayapan obiren amave amiya. Kuiyawa irakoniwa Iesu yuwat igiyawa gumbo anewa mu yauya.
Meve Iesu tui dog aine, sira aigowawa gaibu yan wakeya.
Ju igiyawa Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba me koni aivi.
Iesu yangut wan ag yawamnewa iyayapan obiren menan omome. Me Pirip gumbe wane, “Bredi me iyayapan mame natan oya nu ampa gwiruwatton?”
Me singui mame wanewa me di amawa toreyag yaune. Kuiyawa Iesu wait yaug anone me divi atan aivi.
Pirip me gumbe gara wane, “Anmaga 200 denari gumbe bredi gwiruwatta sira iyayapan desirom desirom musi musi napewa, matai oma den ape.”
Aigowawa desirom da, Saimon Pita gwaneba Andru me gumbe wane,
“Bredi baari gumbe okeriyawa 5 ge gwambui kusikusi duwam ud apan mame gumbe wakeya. Megara iyayapan obiren, meoya mame oma ape go?”
Iesu wane, “Iyayapan dirumiya yan wakepe.” At me apa wayo arawa. Meve apan undag yan wakeya. Undag 5,000 mina.
Iesu meve bredi aug gaun wane, sira yan wakeyawa peyam kep ag munne. Me gwambui gumbe mina meib ane. Natan anoemewa mu munne.
Mu undag naya oma anewa, me aigo meumawa gumbo wane, “Nakwai naya upeba wakeyawa tamiya. Undag tamiya da den yankweya.”
Meve mu tam agoniyaya, sira bredi baari 5 nayawa, musimusiwa tam agoniyag pot undag 12 danave enamiya noidauwaya.
Irakoniwa Iesu anewa iyayapan yauya, sira mu waya, “Natawa di, mame me propeta di me piyu mame uwatanwa.”
Iesu yaug anone mu onam wape me kin atanwa oya. Meoya sira yankweg mekut unig dauwag tui aine.
Augoi uwanewa, aigowawa poeman visi aig amiya.
Me apa mu wa danave dauwaya, sira poeman togomiyag Kapenaum oya amome. Gare sisip wait uwag onne, megara Iesu ande mu gumbo den uwane.
Taig yusipamit toivi, poeman yawarat koka aivi.
Mu barauwag 4 go 5 kiromitas mina amomewa, Iesu poeman egave on wa obmanivi. Mu me yaveg a aya.
Megara me mu gumbo wane, “Ma ne. A den aya.”
Meve mu degadegaepam me aug wa danave barauya, pungi den waneve wa at me oya mu amomewa uwaya.
Wantenewa iyayapan obiren poeman visi gambenwa apa wakeyawa yaug anoyawa, wa desirom mekut me apa wakene, Iesu me aigowawa gaibu den unigiya, aigowawa mukut me yankweg amiya.
Ayapan gaun wane sira iyayapan bredi nayawa arawa megiyave apa wa upeba Tiberias apa onam unigiya.
Iyayapan yaug anoya Iesu ge aigowawa at me apa den wakeya. Mu wa danave dauwag Iesu didimama atan oya Kapenaum uwaya.
Poeman visi gambenwa apa Iesu me yaveg waya, “Rabai, ge aniyau at mame apa uwana?”
Iesu gara wane, “Ne natawa ye diruieni. Ye nenan didimama ene. Me ye irayauyau ge irakoniwa yauyanawa oya onan, ye bredi nayana oma ane oya.
Nakwai me matai watkukampewa oya nau den aya. Nakwai me wakeigimtanwa ge inaiinai yaibobot avigimtanwa oya nau aya. Apan Usiwa yempewa me me. Me gumbe God Mamanwa bainda wag kiniyane.”
Meve me gumbe waya, “God nauwawa atan oya nu divi aton?”
Iesu gara mu gumbo wane, “God nauwawa me mame. Me baraune onnewa gumbe ye anotumat ayawa.”
Meve mu me gumbe waya, “Nu yaug ge gungap anotumat atan oya dimbae irakoniwa nuna? Matai dimbae a?
Nu wagonaiwa at inguiwa arawa apa manna naya. Me meib tene, ‘Me bredi kwimin apa onnewa munne naya.’”
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Ne gae natawa ye diruieni. Bredi kwimin apa onne sira ye yennewa me Mosisi onan. Megara Mamanwa bredi natawa kwimin apa ye yempe.
Kuiyawa God bredi meuma me kwimin apa uwag at piyu gumbe inaiinai wampe.”
Meve waya, “Kokawa, kum evedni bredi mame nunigima.”
Meve Iesu taibe wane, “Ne me inaiinai bredi meuma. Da bira nenan ompewa me matai iyagon den atpe. Bira da nenan anotumat aiviwa meyawa matai den toyaipe.
Megara ne wait diruina. Ye ne yaunegiyana, megara ye ande anotumat den ene.
Maman negnewa undag nenan onampe. Bira da nenan ompewa ne matai den di yankwetna aipe.
Kuiyawa ne kwimin apa aig onednawa me ne anoeniwa atan oya onan, megara me ne baraunedne onednawa me anoiviwa atan oya.
Ne baraunedne onednawa me anoiviwa me mamaib. Me nednewa undag yapowo desirom da den waropiyatna, sira ne kum oieba apa mu enagat muntna wan yoipe.
Maman anoiviwa me mamaib. Me iyayapan undag Usiwa yaug me gumbe anotumat apewa mu matai inaiinai yaibobot aupe. Sira ne kum oieba apa mu enagat muntna wan yoipe.”
Me wane, “Ne bredi kwimin apa aig onednawa.” Meoya Ju igiyawa me gumbe diguragut aya.
Mu waya, “Mame me Iesu onan? Me Josep usiwa, sira mamawa ge inawa nu yaug anomuntu. Aninin oma ane me gare wane, ‘Ne kwimin apa aig onedna.’”
Iesu gara wane, “Ye yembovit gara di enewa yankweya.
Maman ne baraunedne onedna. Me den auwapewa, da bira oma den ane nenan ompe. Sira ne kum oieba apa me enagatna wan yoipe.
Propeta buka muma danave teya, ‘God mu undag toyau mumpe.’ Iyayapan undag Mamawa gumbe anopewa sira me gumbe gigirum yaug anopewa nenan onampe.
Da bira Mamawa den yaune. Megara God gumbe onnewa me mekut Mamawa yaune.
Ne gae natawa diruieni. Da bira anotumat apewa me inaiinai yaibobot aupe.
Ne inaiinai bredi meuma.
Ye isimureiwa manna at inguiwa arawa apa naya, megara mu boriruwaya.
Megara bredi mame kwimin apa aig onnewa, da bira me napewa, den boape.
Ne bredi me evedni wakeiviwa sira kwimin apa aig onnewa. Bira da bredi mame nape ipewa, me wakepe yaibobot tunano. Sira bredi me wantnawa ne kwapunwa, me piyu mame inaiinaiba oya.”
Meve Ju igiyawa mumbovit garagara diguragut eme waya, “Aninin oma ane apan mame kwapiwa numpe nata?”
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Ne gae natawa diruieni. Ye Apan Usiwa me kwapiwa ge diyawa meuma den nayawa, ye matai inaiinai den auya.
Da bira ne kwapunwa ge diyanwa napewa me inaiinai yaibobot aupe. Sira kum oieba apa ne matai me enagatna wan yoipe.
Kuiyawa kwapunwa me nakwai natawa di, ne diyanwa me mina yoi natawa di.
Da bira kwapunwa ge diyanwa napewa me ne gunap wakepe, sira ne me gumbe wakeigimpna.
Maman wakeiviwa ne baraunedne onedna, sira Maman gumbe ne wakena. Ebu me mina di. Da bira ne nanekpewa me matai ne gunap wakeigimpe.
Mame me bredi kwimin apa aig onne. Mame ye isimureiwa manna naya sira boriruwayawa me mina onan. Da bira bredi mame napewa me matai wakeigimpe yaibobot tunano.”
Kapenaum apa sinagogu danave, me toyau munivi kumiwa apa gae mame wane.
Aigowawa obiren me anog waya, “Gae mame me yaigiwa. Bira oma ane anog aupe?”
Iesu yaug anone me aigowawa me gumbe kwavieme, mu gumbo wane, “Mame ye anopipanum ag vene?
Apan Usiwa namu wakenewa arawa dog aipe me ye yauyawa ye aninin anomon?
Inaiinai waniviwa me Guwawa. Kwapiwa oma den ane divi da ape. Gae ne ye guniyap wanawa me Guwawa, sira me inaiinai.
Megara ye upeba anotumat den ene.” Kuiyawa Iesu wait namuiren apa yaug anone, bira bira anotumat den eme sira bira matai me ominawa tepe.
Sira wane, “Meoya ne ye diruina, ‘Mamawa bainda den wapewa, bira da oma den ane ne gunap ompe.’”
Kum mame apa, aigowawa obiren me gumbe yankweg taigiya, me amave sira den amiya.
Iesu me aigowawa 12 gumbo wane, “Ye mina imuyep yankweg aisetan anoene?”
Saimon Pita me gumbe gara wane, “Ayapan, nu bira oya anta? Inaiinai yaibobot gaiyawa me ge gungap.
Nu anotumat ag yaug anotu, ge me iyakaisi abnawa God meuma.”
Meve Iesu gara mu gumbo wane, “Ne ye aigowawa 12 gomiyenna. Megara ye daneyap desirom me airapu kukaeba.”
(Me Saimon Isukariot usiwa Judas oya wane. Me aigowawa 12 danave da, megara ivi me ominawa barautan aivi.)
Meve Iesu Gariri apa birorot guidne. Me imive Judia apa den waketan anoivi, kuiyawa Ju igiyawa imuwo me totan oya eme.
Megara Ju igiyawa buyunaeba iviwa Gwe Gopad Buyunaeba me koni aivi.
Iesu gwanebaviwa me gumbe waya, “Ge at mame yankweg Judia aga. Me gumbe aigo geumawa mu ge divi egewa yaupe.
Bira da me imive membo iyayapan undag namuwo taibe wakepe ipewa, divi da den guwave ape. Ge dividivi mame egewa, gembovit at piyu mame toewan muna yaupe.”
Gwanebaviwa mu mina gaibu me gumbe anotumat den eme.
Meoya Iesu mu dirumne, “Ne kum neuma oraiwa ande den uwane. Megara ye kum yeuma evedni wait uwag mapa wakene.
Piyu mame oma den ane ye topai yempe. Megara ne topai nekpe. Kuiyawa mu kukaeba emewa ne taibe wana.
Ye buyunai oya dog aisiya. Ne buyunai mame oya den anekna. Kuiyawa ne kum neuma oraiwa ande den uwane.”
Me mameib wag Gariri apa wakene.
Megara gwanebaviwa buyunai oya amiyawa, me mina guwave aine, taibe onan.
Buyunai apa Ju igiyawa menan didimama ag, singui veme, “Apan me ampa?”
Iyayapan obiren yapowo mu menan kigemug veme. Upeba waya, “Me apan oraimina.” Iyayapan upeba gara waya, “Onan, me iyayapan gwambe namuyoiyoi ag munivi.”
Megara bira da menan oya divi da taibe den wane. Kuiyawa Ju igiyawa munan a aya.
Buyunai emewa yapave wait uwaiviwa, Iesu temporu arawa dog aig amatog toyau munivi.
Ju igiyawa mu terag waya, “Apan mame gigirum da den tene. Me aninin dividivi kokawa meiba yaug anone.”
Iesu gara gumbo wane, “Ne toyau muneniwa me neumawa onan. Apan me ne baraunedne onednawa me meumawa.
Bira da imive God anoiviwa atan anope ipewa, me matai yaug anope, ne toyau muneniwa God gumbe onne go, ne nembo imunap veni go?
Bira da membovit wapewa membovit oya waiya autan anope. Megara me baraune onnewa oya waiya autan anopewa me natawa. Sira me gumbe ugauga da den wakene.
Mosisi Gwangwan meuma ye yenne go onan? Megara ye gwangwan den yumnasiyana. Divi oya ye ne tonektan oya ene?”
Iyayapan obiren gara waya, “Ge airapu kukaeba gungap. Bira ge toattan oya aivi?”
Iesu gumbo wane, “Ne irayauyau da ana, sira ye undag terayana.
Mosisi kwapituitui ye yenne. (Megara me Mosisi gumbe den onne, isimuranaiwa gumbo onne,) sira ye Sabat Kumiwa apa kwapituitui ene.
Mosisi Gwangwan meuma amaratan oya, ye Sabat Kumiwa apa kwapituitui enewa, divi oya apan kwapiwa undag meuma Sabat Kumiwa apa ne warinameni oya ye ne gunap danewa piriwaivi?
Yautanwa gumbe puiyuyu yankweya, sira natawa gumbe puiyuyu aigimiya.”
Meve Jerusarem igiyawa upeba waya, “Apan mame mu tope boatan aiviwa go?
Yauya, apan mame me iyayapan yangowo taibe waivi, megara mu gae da den me gumbe veme. Amareme igiyawa yaiyai yaug anoya me Keriso?
Megara apan mame ampa onnewa nu yaug anotu. Keriso uwapewa bira da den yaug anope me ampa onne.”
Iesu temporu arawa danave toyau munivi gumbe noiwa kokavit wane, “Ye ne yauneg anoyana, sira ye yaug anoyana ne ampa onedna. Ne nembo anoano neuma oya mapa den uwana. Ne baraunedne onednawa me natawa. Ye me den yaug anoyana.
Ne me yaug anona, kuiyawa ne me gumbe onedna, me ne baraunedne onedna.”
Meve mu amatog me yumiya, megara da bira den naniwa me gumbe tone. Kuiyawa kum meuma den uwane, matai.
Iyayapan obiren mu me gumbe anotumat eme, sira waya, “Keriso uwapewa irakoniwa me matai kokavit ape, megara apan mame mina ape go?”
Parisi igiyawa anoya iyayapan obiren anoano meiba me oya kigemug veme. Meve pirisi koukawa ge Parisi igiyawa mu temporu amaremewa teya me tutan oya amiya.
Iesu wane, “Ne kum kusida ande ye gaibu waketna. Meve ne baraunedne onednawa gumbe anekna.
Ye matai nenan oya didimama aya, megara ye ne den yaunegiya. Sira ampa ne waketnawa ye oma den ane oneya.”
Ju igiyawa gae garawano aya, “Me wane, ‘Nu oma den ane me yauta.’ Apan mame ampa aitan aivi? Iyayapan numawa Griisu igiyawa yapowo wakeg ampa ampa vineme. Me aig mu toyau mumpe?
Me aib wane, ‘Nenanwa didimama aya, megara ye ne den yaunegiya,’ sira ‘Ne ampa waketnawa ye oma den ane oneya.’ Me natawa aninin?”
Buyunai oieba kumiwa me kum muma kokawa. Me kumive, Iesu wan yoig sira noiwa kokavit wane, “Da bira meyawa toyaigimpewa me kweya nenan ompe sira yoi nape.
Da bira anotumat ne gunap apewa, Baiboru waiviwa mina, yamarogu yoi inaiinai gaibuwa matai me danave noidauwag egamigimpe.”
Mame me wane. Me bira da me gumbe anotumat emewa matai Guwawa autan oya wane. Kum me apa Guwawa ande den munne, kuiyawa Iesu eyawa ande den aune.
Iyayapan gae meuma anoemewa, upeba waya, “Natawa di, apan mame me propeta,”
sira upeba waya, “Me Keriso.” Upeba waya, “Aninin oma ane Keriso Gariri apa ontan?
Keriso Devid dam meuma gumbe ompe, sira Betureem at kokawa Devid wakenewa apa ompe. Meib Baiboru waivi go onan?”
Iyayapan meiba Iesu oya gomiyag ge yoig aya.
Mu yapowo upeba me totan oya anoeme, megara bira da me gumbe nanuwa da den yumiya.
Meve temporu amaremewa mu pirisi koukawa ge Parisi igiyawa munan sira taig amiya. Mu waya, “Diwan ye me den aug oniyana?”
Amaremewa mu gara waya, “Apan mame gae waivi minawa bira da den wane.”
Parisi igiyawa gara waya, “Ye mina uga yemne?
Namuyoiyoi igiyawa go Parisi igiyawa daneyap bira da me gumbe anotumat eme?
Megara iyayapan obiren mame mu Gwangwan da den yaug anoya. Mu anokukam gumbe wakeya.”
Nikodemas wag dirumne. Me namu Iesu oya onne, sira me mu desirom.
“Gwangwan numawa gumbe, namu me divi anewa yaug anotanwa oya me gumbe anoigimpe, meve pui yupe keptete ape, go onan?”
Mu gara waya, “Ge mina Gariri apa onagana, go? Baiboru gumbe yaug anoa, propeta me Gariri apa den dauwag ompe.” [Baiboru Namu tenewa obiren danave Jon 7:53–8:11 den wakene.]
Meve mu desirom desirom taig gweyowon amiya.
Megara Iesu tui Orivu aine.
Wanteivine mumbevit me temporu arawa dana sira unig aine. Me apa iyayapan undag me gumbe birorot agoniyaya. Me yan wakeg amatog toewan munivi.
Gwangwan toewanewan igiyawa ge Parisi igiyawa mu vesin me uinantaraki aiviwa aug uwaya. Mu vesin yapowo barauya wan yokene.
Sira me gumbe waya, “Toewanewan, vesin mame uinantaraki aiviwa yumiya.
Gwangwan danave Mosisi wag did nunne, vesin meiba an gumbe tota. Gare ge anin wamon?”
Mu singui mame vemewa me gumbe amatoriyag yautanwa oya veme. Kuiyawa me gumbe pui yutan oya. Megara Iesu kwana sig, naniguriwa gumbe piyu egave amatog teivi.
Mu me gumbe singui ande vemewa, me siwavit wan yoig gumbo wane, “Ye daneyap da kukaeba meuma onan ipewa, me namu an aug me tope.”
Me sira kwana sig piyu egave tene.
Kum me apa, mu anoyawa, iyayapan tayawa namu amatog desirom desirom amiya, sira Iesu mekut kweya. Vesin me gaibu ande me apa yokene.
Iesu wan siwavit yoig gumbe wane, “Vesin, mu ampa? Da bira ge gungap kukaeba den wane?”
Me gara wane, “Ayapan, bira da den wane.” Iesu wane, “Ne gaibu ge kukaeba den watna. Gare mame aga, kukaeba den a.”
Iesu mu gumbo gae sira wane, “Ne piyu mame eyawa meuma. Da bira ne amanap ompewa matai sisip gumbe den aipe, sira inaiinai eyawa meuma aupe.”
Parisi igiyawa me gumbe waya, “Ge gembo genan taibe vege, meoya gae geuma me natawa onan.”
Iesu gara mu gumbo wane, “Ne nembovit oya ne nekut yaug anotanwa ipewa gae neuma me natawa. Kuiyawa ne yaug anona ne ampa onedna sira ne ampa angeni. Megara ye den yaug anoyana ne ampa onedna sira ne ampa angetan eni.
Ye iyayapan anoemewa ebuwawa gumbe pui yuwamene. Ne bira da den pui yutna.
Megara ne pui yutna ipewa, ne puiyuyu neumawa me natawa. Kuiyawa ne nekuriren onan, ne ge ne baraunedne onednawa gaibu yokena.
Gwangwan yeumawa tene, me apan duwam taibe watanwa me natawa.
Ne desirom me nembovit oya taibe veni. Sira Maman me ne baraunedne onednawa gaibu nenan taibe waivi.”
Meve mu me gumbe singui waya, “Ge Mamag ampa?” Iesu gara wane, “Ye ne ge Maman nu den yaunun anoyana. Ye ne yauneg anoyawa ipewa, ye Maman gaibu yaug anopono.”
Me temporu arawa danave puyo teemewa apa, gae mame toyau munivi gumbe me gae mame wane. Megara da bira me yumtan oya den aya. Kuiyawa kum meuma ande den uwane.
Iesu mu gumbo sira wane, “Ne angeni. Sira ye matai nenan oya didimama aya, sira ye matai kukaeba yeumawa gumbe boriruwaya. At me ne aneknawa ye oma den ane oneya.”
Meoya Ju igiyawa waya, “Me wane, ‘At me ne aneknawa ye oma den ane oneya?’ Me membovit tog boape go?”
Sira me mu gumbo wane, “Ye ankwatau oneyana. Ne painau onedna. Ye piyu mame igiyawa, sira ne piyu mame abnawa onan.
Meoya ne ye diruina me ye kukaeba yeumawa gumbe boriruwaya. Sira ye ne gunap anotumat den ayawa ipewa, ye kukaeba yeuma gumbe boriruwaya.”
Mu me gumbe waya, “Ge bira?” Iesu gara wane, “Amatonewa apa wag ongeniwa me me.
Ne yenan oya watanwa me obiren, sira yenan pui yutanwa me obiren. Megara me ne baraunedne onednawa me natawa. Sira ne dividivi me gumbe anonawa piyu mame gumbe veni.”
Me Mamawa oya dirumiviwa mu den yaug anoya.
Iesu wane, “Ye Apan Usiwa enagasiyawa, meve yaug anoya ne divi. Sira ye matai yaug anoya ne nembovit oya da den ana. Maman toyau nednewa mina di ne dividivi mame diruieni.
Ne baraunedne onednawa me ne gaibu. Me ne den kwenedne. Kuiyawa ne kum evedni me gumbe degadega aiviwa me eni.”
Me dividivi mame waiviwa, iyayapan obiren anotumat me gumbe aya.
Meoya Ju igiyawa mu me gumbe anotumat ayawa, mu gumbo Iesu wane, “Ye toewanewan neumawa yumnasiyawa ipewa, ye natawa di ne aigowanwa.
Meve ye natawa yaug anoya, sira natawa me matai ye ui onan barau yempe.”
Mu me gumbe gara waya, “Nu Ebraam wagobaviwa. Sira da bira gumbe ankwatave nau eme igiyawa meib da den di atu. Ge aninin oya aib wana, “Matai ui onan barau yempe?”
Iesu mu gumbo gara wane, “Ne gae natawa ye diruieni. Da bira kukaeba aiviwa me kukaeba ankwatave nau aivi abnawa.
Sira ankwatave nau aivi abnawa me gwe danave yaibobot den wakeigimpe. Megara usiwa me apa yaibobot wakeigimpe.
Meoya Usiwa me ye ui onan yai waketan barau yempe ipewa, ye ui onan yai wakeya, me natawa di.
Ne yaug anona ye Ebraam wagobaviwa. Megara ye ne tonegiya boatan oya ene. Kuiyawa gae neumawa ye guniyap den wakene.
Ne Maman gumbe yaunawa ne ye diruieni. Megara ye mameaiwa gumbo anoyanawa ye ene.”
Mu gara waya, “Ebraam nu mamunwa.” Iesu wane, “Ye Ebraam usitainawa ipewa, me dividivi aninin anewa ye aigimiya.
Gae natawa ne God gumbe anonawa ye diruieni, megara ye ne tonektan oya anoene. Ebraam divi da meib den ane.
Ye dividivi me mameiwa ayawa ye ene.” Mu waya, “Nu ebu taibe usitainawa onan. Nu mamunwa desiromiren me God mekut.”
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “God ye mameiwa ipewa, ye ne gunap baigan aigimpono. Kuiyawa ne God gumbe onedna sira gare ne mapa wakena. Ne nembo ano neuma gumbe den onedna. Megara me ne baraunedne onedna.
Divi oya gae neuma ye oma den ane yaug anoene? Kuiyawa ye guniyap oma den ane ne veniwa auya.
Ye mamewa Seitan, ye me usitainawa. Ye imuyep mamewa anoiviwa atan anoene. Me amatog onnewa apa iyayapan gurivi abnawa. Natawa da den yumnasivi. Kuiyawa me gumbe natawa den wakene. Me uga uga pednave waivi. Kuiyawa me ugaepama sira ugauga mamawa.
Megara ne natawa ye diruieni, meoya ye ne gunap anotumat den ene!
Ye guniyap da bira oma ane ne kukaeba neuma taibe waya? Ne natawa diruigimpnawa ipewa, divi oya anotumat ne gunap den ene?
Apan da bira me God meumawa ipewa, me God aninin waiviwa anog aupe. Megara ye God aninin waiviwa den anog auyana, kuiyawa ye God meumawa onan.”
Ju igiyawa me gumbe gara waya, “Ge Samaria apan sira airapu kukaeba danagap wakene. Nu bainda vete.”
Iesu gara wane, “Ne dananap airapu kukaeba den wakene, megara ne Maman gumbe ayamat eni, sira ye ne yan yaunegene.
Megara ne eyawa neuma den anoeni. Eyawa anoiviwa sira keptete abnawa wakene.
Ne gae natawa diruieni. Da bira gae neumawa yumnatpewa, me bo den di ape.”
Ju igiyawa me gumbe waya, “Gare nu yaug anotu airapu kukaeba danagap wakene. Ebraam botone sira propeta mina boriruwaya. Megara ge wana, ‘Da bira gae neuma yumnatpewa me bo den di tope.’
Ge koka? Nu mamunwa Ebraam kusi? Me botone sira propeta mu mina boriruwaya. Ge bira vege?”
Iesu gara wane, “Ne ayamat nembovit oya autnawa ipewa, ayamat neumawa me natawa onan. Ayamat ne negnewa me Maman. Sira me gumbe ye vene, ‘Me God numawa.’
Ye me den yaug anoyana, megara ne me yaug anona. Ne me den yaug anona watna ipewa, ne matai ye mina ugaen atatu. Megara ne me yaug anona, sira gae meumawa amareni.
Ye mamewa Ebraam me kum neumawa yautan oya anone, degadega ane. Sira me yaug degadega ane.”
Ju igiyawa me gumbe waya, “Ge bairawan geuma ande gare 50 ankwatave, megara ge Ebraam yawana?”
Iesu mu gumbo wane, “Ne gae natawa di diruieni. Namu ne wakenave, meve Ebraam yaine!”
Mame gumbe, mu an tam me totan oya aya. Megara Iesu guwave unig temporu arawa apa yankweg aine.
Me ebu taibe aiviwa, apan da yangawa boredneve yainewa yaune.
Aigowawa meuma me gumbe singui aya, “Rabai, me yangawa boredneve yainewa me kukaeba bira ane? Apan mame ane go inamamawa aya go?”
Iesu gara wane, “Apan mame me kukaeba den ane, inamamawa mu mina kukaeba den aya. Megara mame pawanewa me gumbe God nau meumawa taibe atanwa oya.
Kum, nu ne baraunedne onednawa nauwawa atanit di. Aram uwaivi, bira da oma den ane nau ape.
Ne piyu mame apa wakeeniwa, ne piyu mame eyawa meuma.”
Me gae mame wanewa, me gwitup piyu egave emne, me gumbe piyu wadne kawait ane. Meve me yangave wadne.
Me gumbe wane, “Aga, condowin Sairoam apa muina.” (Gae mame natawa me bira baraune aine abnawa.) Meve me aig muinne. Yangawa oraimina ane, gwe aine.
Me megiyave wakeeme igiyawa ge iyayapan mu nungan me nun waivi yauyawa waya, “Apan mame desiroma me yan wakeg nun waiviwa go?”
Upeba waya, “Apan mame me me.” Sira iyayapan upeba waya, “Onan, me apan me desiroma mina.” Me membo wane, “Ne apan me.”
Mu waya, “Aninin yangagwa watabne?”
Me gara wane, “Apan iviwa Iesu mu vemewa me kawait gumbe wadne sira tam yanganap wadne. Me didneg wane, ‘Sairoam ag muina.’ Meoya ne aneg yanganwa muinna, oraimina ane oma ane yauna.”
Mu me gumbe waya, “Apan me gare ampa?” Me wane, “Ne den yaug anona.”
Mu apan nungan yangabored me aug Parisi igiyawa gumbo uwaya.
Iesu kawait wadne yangawa watabnewa me Sabat Kumiwa apa.
Meoya Parisi igiyawa mina me gumbe singui sira waya, “Aninin ge yangagwa oraimina ane?” Me wane, “Me kawait yanganap wadnewa ne sira muinna. Gare ne oma ane yaveni.”
Parisi igiyawa upeba waya, “Apan me God gumbe den onne. Kuiyawa me Sabat Kumiwa den amaraivi.” Megara upeba waya, “Aninin iyayapan kukaeba oma ane dividivi meiba irakoniwa ape pawape?” Mu yapowo kep teya.
Meoya mu sira apan yangabored gumbe waya, “Yangagwa me watabne, gare ge aninin me oya wamon?” Me wane, “Me propeta.”
Apan yangaboredne sira oraimina anewa gumbe Ju igiyawa anotumat den aya. Meoya mu apan me inamamawa tam onamtan oya waya, mu onamiya.
Mu singui ag waya, “Mame ye ud yeumawa? Mame me yangaboredneve yaine ye wayanawa? Aninin oma ane gare me yavivi?”
Me inamamawa gara waya, “Nu yaug anotu me nu ud numawa. Sira nu yaug anotu me yangawa boredneve yaine.
Megara nu den yaug anotu me aninin oma ane gare yavivi, sira nu den yaug anotu me yangawa bira watabne. Me gumbe ye singui ag yauya. Me wait koka ane, oma ane membovit wape.”
Me inamamawa meib waya. Kuiyawa mu Ju igiyawa gumbo a aya. Ju igiyawa bainda wayawa, da bira Iesu me Keriso wapewa, me sinagogu apa atataipe.
Meoya me inamamawa waya, “Me wait koka ane. Membo singui aya.”
Mu apan yangawa borednewa sira ontan oya waya me onne. Mu waya, “Eyawa God gumbe wana. Nu yaug anotu apan me kukaeba aiviwa.”
Me gara wane, “Anten, me kukaeba aiviwa go onan ne den yaug anona. Desirom ne yaug anona. Ne yanganwa boredneve yaina, megara gare ne oma ane yaveni!”
Meve mu me gumbe waya, “Me ge gungap dimbae ane? Me aninin yangagwa watabne?”
Me mu gumbo gara wane, “Ne ye wait diruina. Megara ye den anoyana. Divi oya ye sira anotan oya ene? Ye imuyep gaibu me aigowawa atan anoene?”
Mu me gumbe danowa piriwane sira waya, “Ge apan me aigowawa! Nu Mosisi aigo meumawa!
Nu yaug anotu God me Mosisi gumbe wanewa. Megara nu den di yaug anotu apan me ampa onne.”
Apan me gara wag dirumne, “Mame terana! Ye den yaug anoyana me ampa onne. Megara me ne yanganwa watabne.
