Ivi kin da me Josep gumbe den anonewa Ejipt danave kin ane.
Kin mame iyayapan numa gumbo ano gwambe ag ibnawa munne, isimuranaiwa mu dirumne kikiyan muma matai yaiyawa boriruwatan oya epa emeya.
Me kumiwa apa Mosisi yaine. Me usiren onan God yautanwa me oraimina. Dud duwamdesi danave me mamawa gweyave amaraya koka ane.
Me daieve barauya, Parao gwaitawa me aune sira me usiven atan oya amarane dog koka ane.
Ejipt ano muma painauwa undag Mosisi toyau waniya yaug anone, sira gaiyawa atan ge yusiatatu.
Sira Mosisi bairawan meuma 40 mina aune Isuraeru usitainawa me owowaiwa munan danadawai aune.
Me Ejipt apan da me owawaiwa desirom da gumbe gwambe aivi yaune. Me waitawan apan me egaven me yoig garawa Ejipt apan toen gudne.
Mosisi anone owawaiwa yaug anoya God Mosisi naniwa gumbe waita waita mumpe, megara owawaviwa den yaug anoya.
Kum umae Mosisi owawaiwa gumbo uwane mu mut eme. Me wasiwamuntan oya dirum wane, ‘Apan, ye tatangwanen. Dimbae oya ye yembovit gara toene?’
Megara apan me eveba gwambe aiviwa Mosisi itarag atan barauk wane, ‘Bira namuyoiyoi ge keptete numa barau genne?
Watau ge Ejipt apan toen gurana mina ge imugap ne toen gudnettan anoege?’
Mosisi mame anonewa me Midian piyuwawa a aine. Asime noi ubewa mina wakene ud duwam usitainawa yaiya.
Bairawan 40 mina onanane. Tui Sainai megiyave at inguiwa arawa apa yoma kusi yoiya. Me apa iyam meru igemewa me danave aneya Mosisi gumbe uwane.
Me mame yaunewa, me a ane. Me aig gumbe uwane yaimoyai yangut yaviviwa me Ayapan noiwa anone.
‘Ne ge mamagaiwa God muma, Ebraam ge Aisak ge Jekob God muma.’ Mosisi daram daram ge a kokavit ane, sira yaimoyai yangut den yaune.
Meve Ayapan me gumbe wane, ‘Sandoro atan boa. Ge yokeyana piyu me piyu iyakaisi.
Ne natawa di Ejipt danave iyayapan neuma gumbo gwambe eme yauna, sira ne mu awau muma anona. Meoya ne aig oneg mu waita mun naninwa gumbe muntna. Gare aga, ne barau gentna taig Ejipt aga.’
Iyayapan mu Mosisi mame gumbe topayag waya, ‘Bira ge namuyoiyoi abnawa ge keptete abnawa agenne?’ Apan mame God aneya nanive baraune aine, me namu yoiyoi abnawa ak iyayapan mu sira autan oya gwiruwadne. Aneya me yoma kusi dana me gumbe uwawannewa.
Apan mame at Ejipt apa mu tam tene dauwaya, sira at Ejipt apa, Poeman Diapama apa sira bairawan 40 danave at inguiwa arawa apa anopipanumawa ge irakoniwa ane.
Mame Mosisi me Isuraeru igiyawa dirumne, ‘God ye tateaiwa gumbo propeta da ne minan yenan wagomiyape yoipe.’
Apan mame at inguiwa arawa apa daiboru danave aneya ge mamanaiwa gaibu wakeya. Aneya me tui Sainai apa dine. Sira apan mame inaiinai gaiyawa aug ye yenne.
Megara nu mamanaiwa me noiwa den autan anoeme. Sira mu me topayag sira mu nibdanowa tobiroriyag at Ejipt taiktan anoeme.
Mu Aaron gumbe diya, ‘Nunan god wara, me nu namunup aipewa. Kuiyawa Mosisi me at Ejipt apa tam nun onnewa, nu den yaug anotu dimbae me gumbe matadne.’
Kum me apa mu burumakau usiwa wariya ugauga god gumbe puyo barauya. Sira mu nanuwa gumbe wariyawa degadega eme.
God mu gumbo daiewa taine, sira kwiminau ugauga god meuma gumbe waieme God den tobod munne. Me propeta bukaeba danave tenewa. ‘Isuraeru gwe mumawa. At inguiwa arawa apa bairawan 40 danave puyo maeba ge puyo yeuma gunap barauyana? Ye den di barauya.
Ye Moreku nun gweyawa ge god Repan marantun meuma yotuene. Ye waiyatan oya ugauga god wariyana. Meoya ne ye tam aneg Babiron utunban aramavit teyentna.’
Nu isimuranaiwa at inguiwa arawa danave tabenako gaibu. Mu God yangowo yauyawa. Me Mosisi dine ge yawanawa irawa gina desirom meib siya, meoya God gae meuma amave me siya.
Nu isimuranaiwa tabenako mame meib di sig amome. God nu isimuranaiwa namuwo Ju onan igiyawa atatai imne, sira mu arowa nu isimuranaiwa munne. Me kumive Josiya mu gaibu me aug onamiya. Onam Devid kumive uwane.
Devid God namive God ano oraiwa meuma aune, sira me Jekob God meuma oya gwe sitan oya nun wane.
Megara Soromon God oya gwe sine.
Megara God Painauvitwa apan nanuwo gwe siyawa oma den ane danave vinpe. Propeta mamaib waivi.
‘Ayapan wane, kwimin me ne kin wakeeniwa arawa, sira piyu me ne amanwa egave baraunawa. Sira gwe gina ube ambuwa ye nenan simon? Sira ne nonenwa emigimtanwa arawa me ampa?
Ne naninwa dividivi undag mame den wadna?’
Ye nonewa yaigipam, sira ye nonewa ge naunewa kwapituitui gumbe onan. Ye mameaiwa mina Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gumbe ebnotu onan kum evedni ene.
Propeta da ye mameaiwa den edawai muniya? Numan, Oraivitwa uwaivi gaiyawa vemewa mu guriya. Gare ye me Oraivitwa ominawa teyake me toen guriyana.
Ye aneya amat muma gumbe Gwangwan auyana, megara ye Gwangwan aninin wanewa amave den aisiyana.”
Mu mame anoyawa, mu danowa piripiri wane sira me gumbe donowa ikimikim aya.
Megara Stepen me Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gumbe noidauwanewa, yangut owan kwimin yaug sira God eyawa meuma ge Iesu God naniyutanwa apa yokene yaune.
Me wane, “Yauya. Kwimin watabne Apan Usiwa me God naniyutanwa apa yokeivine ne yaveni.”
Iyayapan mu naunowa tobot wansin kwaruwag Stepen oya kintog amiya.
Mu me oreriyag gwe daieve aoreya an gumbe me toya botone. Koni me apa yangowo yauyawa igiyawa wape muma apan mataiwa iviwa Sauru amave teya.
Mu Stepen an gumbe toemewa, me noive nun wane, “Ayapan Iesu, ne guwanwa auwa.”
Meve me konive popoyam aig yune sira kwaruwane, “Ayapan, kukaeba mame mu gumbo den anoa.” Me meib wag utan vinne.
Sauru ung wane Stepen toya. Me kumiwa apa at Jerusarem apa siosi oya edawai koka kumiwa uwane. Sira iyayapan undag at dada Judia ge Samaria danave marewan amiya. Apasoro mukut Jerusarem apa wakeya.
Anotumat epampa igiyawa Stepen sig umiya sira menan it kokavit wag danadawai auya.
Go, Sauru amatog siosi wakukamivi. Me gwe gwe aivi vesin ge apan bog oreriyag nog dana temunivi.
Marewan ampa ampa amiya igiyawa gae opata wag gigeme.
Pirip at Samaria aig aine sira Keriso opataeba me apa wane.
Iyayapan obiren agoniyayawa mu Pirip gaiyawa anoya sira irakoniwa me ane yauya. Mu undag me wanewa naunowa taiya anoya.
Airapu kukaeba iyayapan obiren gumbo kwat gaibu wag dauwag amiya. Naniwa gegeraimusia ge amowa gegeraimusia mu obiren inaimusia.
Meoya degadega kokavit gwetoimu koka me danave pawane.
Megara gwetoimu mame danave apan da iviwa Saimon wakene. Me dum kwasisim numan amatog onne gwetoimu mame danave me ane. Samaria igiyawa teraya. Me membovit wane ne kokawa.
Sira iyayapan undag, kusiwa apa dog aig kokawa gumbo uwane, me gumbe yaimoyai yaug anoeme waya, “Apan mame me God yusiwa kokavitwa aune.”
Iyayapan mu me gumbe yaimoyai anoeme. Kuiyawa mu dum meuma oya bairawan obiren teraya.
Go, Pirip opata me God toimuwawa ge Iesu Keriso iviwa meuma oya waivi iyayapan anotumat aya, sira apan ge vesin babataito aya.
Saimon membo anotumat ag babataito ane. Me Pirip amave ampa ampa amiya. Sira irayauyau kokavit ge irakoniwa matadne me yaune terane.
Samaria igiyawa God gae meuma auya. Sira apasoro mu Jerusarem apa wakeyawa anoya. Mu Pita ge Jon mu gumbo temiya amiya.
Mu eme apa onam uwaya. Mu Samaria igiyawa munan nun waya mu matai Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama aupe.
Kuiyawa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama ande bira da egave den uwane. Mu Iesu Keriso iviwa gumbe babataito mekut auya.
Meve Pita ge Jon mu egowo nanuwa teyawa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama auya.
Apasoro nanuwa egowo teemewa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama aigne Saimon yaune. Me apasoro gumbo anmagawa aug on wan wane.
“Ne naninwa bira da egave barautnawa, me Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama aupe ne mina yusipama mame negiya autna.”
Pita me gumbe wane, “Anmagawa geuma ge gungap watkukampe. Kuiyawa ge God ano puyowawa meuma anmagawa gumbe gwiruwatan ege.
Ge mame gumbe den yunadne, sira ge mame den auwa. Kuiyawa ge nonegwa God namive oraimina onan.
Meoya ge nonegmagawa biroriya sira Ayapan gumbe nun wa. Anten danagap anoegewa me matai anog yankwepe.
Ne yaug anona ge ande sisiwa geuma koka danave wakeyana sira kukaeba geuma ande yumnat genivi wakeege.”
Saimon garawa wane, “Ayapan gumbe nenan nun waya. Ye meib ayawa ye divi da wayawa ne gunap den matatpe.”
Apasoro mu ginongowa yaigipam aya yangowa yauyawa waya. Sira Ayapan gaiyawa waya. Meve mu sira at Jerusarem taig amome. Samaria igiyawa gwetoimu obiren yapave opata wag amome.
Meoya Ayapan aneya meuma Pirip gumbe wane, “Wan yoig ebu asime sausu gambenwa apa aga. Ebu me aig Jerusarem uwag Gasa uwane. Gare at Gasa me at inguiwa arawa ane.”
Me amatog aine. Me epin taibe Etiopia apan me kin vesinawa ankwatave nau kokawa aiviwa nuntosane. Me apan kokawa da Etiopia kin vesinawa iviwa Kandasi anmaga undag amaraivi abnawa. Apan mame Jerusarem waiyatan oya dog aine.
Gare me gwe taig aivi. Me mae osi pui oreriyag aiviwa danave wakeg propeta Aisaya buka meuma tenewa basiyaivi.
Guwawa Pirip dine, “Ag mae osi pui oreriyag aiviwa gumbe ug man me gaibu aisia.”
Meve Pirip kin tog gumbe aig apan me propeta Aisaya bukaeba basiyaivi anone. Me wane, “Ge dimbae basiege yaug anoana?”
Me wane, “Bira da den toyaunekpewa ne aninin oma ane yaug anotna?” Me Pirip oya wane, “Dog onag megiyanap wakeya.”
Me Baiboru dana gigirum basiyaivi. Me aib tene, ‘Mae sip guremewa arawa apa veyag aivi mina, sira sip usiwa gumawa tuivi abnawa namive yokeivi mina me noiwa da den wane.
Me iviwa aug yan barauya sira me gumbe keptete den aya. Bira da oma den ane kum meuma oya wape. Inaiinai meuma piyuwawa atan aug aine.
Kin vesinawa ankwatave nau kokawa aiviwa me Pirip digwane, “Toyaunega. Propeta bira oya mame waivi, membo oya waivi go da bira oya waivi?”
Pirip noiwa watabne, sira gigirum mame gumbe amatog Iesu oya opata wane.
Meve mu ebu gumbe amog at yoi da gumbe uwaya. Kin vesinawa ankwatave nau kokawa aiviwa me wane, “Yawa. Yoi wakene. Dimbae oya ne babataito den aten? Babataito atanit di.”
(-)
Me mae osi pui oreriyag aiviwa tobodne yokene. Pirip ge kin vesinawa ankwatave nau kokawa aiviwa mu duwam yoi danave aigiya Pirip babataito awanne.
Mu yoi danave dauwayawa Ayapan Guwawa meuma me Pirip aug aine. Kin vesinawa ankwatave nau kokawa aiviwa me Pirip sira den yaune, megara me degadega gumbe sira taig aine.
Pirip at Asotas apa uwa wanne. Me gwetoimu undag aig gae oraiwa opata waivi meve Sesariya aine.
Sauru imive anoiviwa Ayapan aigowaiwa gumbo anavi ag ibnawa muntan ge guttan anoivi, sira me pirisi painauvitwa oya aine.
Me gigirum oya nun wane Damaskas sinagogu upeba munan. Me anotumat mame eme igiyawa, apan go vesin go, yawampewa, mu tam tuwam bog Jerusarem onampe.
Sira me aig Damaskas ob maniviwa, eyawa tatevit kwimin apa gumbe birorot esine.
Sira me piyu egave aignewa, meve noiwa anone, “Sauru Sauru, divi oya edawai negege?”
Sira me wane, “Ayapan, ge bira?” Sira Ayapan garawa wane, “Ne Iesu me ge edawai negegewa.
Gare wan yoig gwetoimu danave aga. Sira ge meve dirukpe divi ge amon.”
Iyayapan mu me gaibu amomewa noiwa anoya, go apan da den yauya, meoya divi da den waya mu di yokeya.
Sauru piyu egave wan yoine. Yangawa meramne, go divi da oma den ane yaune. Meoya iyayapan nanive auweg Damaskas amiya.
Me oiyat duwamdesi danave oma den ane divi da yaune, sira nakwai ge yoi den nane.
Aigowawa da iviwa Ananias Damaskas apa wakene. Ayapan irawa uyavi minawa danave wane, “Ananias,” me garawa wane, “Ayapan, ne mapa.”
Meve Ayapan wane, “Wan yoig ebu iviwa ‘Siwavit’ aga, sira Judas gweyawa apa Tarsas apan iviwa Sauru wakene. Menan ag yawa. Me nun waivi.
Me yaune irawa uyavi minawa danave, apan iviwa Ananias unig me kuiyave naniwa baraupe yangawa sira merampe.”
Megara Ananias garawa wane, “Ayapan, ne anona apan mame at Jerusarem apa iyayapan iyakaisi geumawa gumbo dividivi kukaeba obiren ane.”
Pirisi koukawa me yusiwa waniyawa, me gumbe me oma ane iyayapan mu ivugwa auvemewa mu tam tuwampe.”
Megara Ayapan mamaib wane, “Aga. Apan asime me uinoum neuma ne wagomiyanawa. Me ivunwa aug Ju onan igiyawa ge kin muma upeba ge Isuraeru wagobaviwa gumbo aipe.
Ne me toyau wantna ivunwa oya me anintom danadawai aupe.”
Meoya Ananias dauwag aine, sira gwe asime danave unig naniwa Sauru kuiyave baraug wane, “Evenwa Sauru. Ayapan Iesu me ebu taibe ge ongegewa apa uwagenne. Me ne baraunedne genan onedna. Ge sira oma ape yawa sira Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gungap noidauwape.”
Tatevit divi da me gwambui kwapi ganawa minawa Sauru yangave aigne, meve me oma ane sira yaune. Me wan yoig babataito ane,
sira nakwai nag yusiwa aune. Sauru me kum upeba aigowawa me Damaskas danave wakeyawa gaibu wakene.
Sira tatevit sinagogu upeba apa me amatog opata wane, “Iesu me God Usiwa.”
Iyayapan mu mame anoyawa, terag waya, “Apan mame me apan me Jerusarem apa iyayapan mu Iesu iviwa auwayawa wakukamnewa, go onan? Me mapa onnewa, me mu tam tuwam pirisi koukawa gumbo aipe go?”
Megara Sauru me yusiwa koka aivi, sira wag toewan munne Iesu me Keriso. Sira Ju igiyawa mu Damaskas apa wakeyawa terag anopipanum aya.
Oiyat obiren onanane, sira Ju igiyawa Sauru tope boatan oya gae waya,
megara Sauru me anoano muma yaug anone. Mu Sauru tope boatan oya kum ge aram gwetoimu ankwin meuma undag yaveme.
Meoya aigowawa mu arampuna me aug pot danave enag murap gumbe tuweg an gumbe siyawa daieve yukokoramiya aigne.
Sauru Jerusarem uwanewa, me Iesu aigowaiwa intum atan oya ageyau ane, megara mu den anotumat aya me aigowawa, sira mu a aya.
Megara Banabas me aune, sira me aug apasoro gumbo aine. Meve Banabas natawa mu dirumne. Sauru Damaskas aiviwa, ebu taibe aninin Ayapan yaune, sira divi Ayapan dine, sira me Damaskas apa Iesu iviwa oya iyayapan gumbo gae yusipamit wane, meib Banabas dirumne.
Meve Sauru aigowaiwa gaibu Jerusarem apa wakene, sira ingui uwag aine. Sira Ayapan iviwa gumbe gae yusipamit wane.
Me gae Griik veme Ju igiyawa mu gaibu gae veme sira gae garawa veme. Megara mu me bo totan oya ageyau eme.
Tatawaviwa anoano muma yaug anoya, meoya me aug Sesariya amiya, sira me barauya Tarsas aine.
Siosi me meib at Judia, at Gariri, at Samaria undag apa siya, sira yum amareme, sira Ayapan gumbe ebnotu aya. Sira Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama me amaraivi ge yusiwa wanivi meoya anotumat igiyawa obiren eme.
Pita at obiren amdau aine. Me anotumat igiyawa iyakaisi mu at Ridda wakeyawa gaibu munan amdau aig uwane.
Meapa, me apan iviwa Aeneas me yuwarane bairawan 8 deriyat egave wakenewa yaune. Me amananiwa buburuimusiawa aune.
Pita dine, “Aeneas, Iesu Keriso ge warinamgempe. Wan yoiya sira deriyat geuma aug onaga.” Meve tatevit me wan yoine.
Iyayapan mu at Ridda ge at Saron apa wakeyawa mu Aeneas yaug Ayapan gumbe sira taig amiya.
At Joppa apa, aigo vesinawa iviwa Tabita (Gae Griik gumbe me Dorukas.) wakene. Vesin mame anoano oraiwa obiren aivi sira dividivi munivi.
Megara me kumiwa apa, me yuwarag boane. Iyayapan kwapiwa muiniya sira me pantut painauwa gwe danave barauya.
At Ridda me at Joppa megiyave wakene. Aigowawa anoya Pita me at Ridda apa wakene, meoya mu apan duwam teya menan amiya, sira nun waya “Tatevit onaga.”
Meoya Pita wan yoig mu gaibu dauwag amiya. Pita uwanewa, mu me aug pantut painauwa amiya. Kwapura undag mu me gumbe yoig iruveme, mu wape ankwatavewa ge wape egavewa obiren mu Dorukas ainamenewa toewaniya.
Pita wane iyayapan undag dauwag amiya, koniwa yug nun wane. Sira tobiroriyag iragi kwapiwa yaug wane, “Tabita, wan yoiya.” Meve me yangawa meramne sira me Pita yaug wan yoine.
Pita nanive wan aug waita wanne, sira me amave wan yoine. Me anotumat igiyawa iyakaisi ge kwapura auwane mu onamiya, me toewamunne me inaine.
Gae mame at Joppa undag danave wateteyamne, sira iyayapan obiren Ayapan gumbe anotumat aya.
Sira Pita kum kusi da at Joppa apa, mae kwapiwa waribiyaivi oraimina eme abnawa Saimon gweyave wakene.
Apan da desirom at Sesariya apa wakene. Me iviwa Korunerias. Iyayapan waya at Itari mut igiyawa wakeya. Me danave me senturion aivi.
Me imi danawa undag God gumbe sira biviusitainawa undag gaibu God aeba ag ebnotu eme. Me puyo obiren Ju igiyawa gumbo munivi sira evedni nun waivi.
Kum da augoiyau kum koniwa 3 mina me irawa uyavi minawa yaune. Me danave me taibe God aneya meuma yaune. Me gumbe uwag wane, “Korunerias!”
Korunerias me aneya temtem yaug a ane. Me wane, “Ayapan, me divi?” Aneya me garawa wane, “Nun ge puyo geuma God namive dauwag yaugen anoivi.
Gare iyayapan teya at Joppa ampe Saimon aug oneya. Iviwa dawa iyayapan veme Pita.
Apan mame me iviwa Saimon me kwapiwa waribiyaivi oraimina eme abnawa gaibu wakene, me gweyawa poeman visive.”
Meve aneya me gumbe gae wag aine. Korunerias nau meuma emewa duwam ge mut abnawa desirom munan auwane. Mut abnawa me ankwatave wakene imi danawa undag God gumbe.
Me dividivi undag dig dirumne mu tene at Joppa amiya.
Kum umae mu amome gwetoimu ob manemewa, Pita nun watan oya at me gwe egave dog aine. Me kum kuiyunup mina.
Me iyagon adne nakwai natan anone. Nakwai meuma tamibarip emewa me yangawa gwengwen aivi den yaiyai anoivi.
Me yaune kwimin watabne kabum da me wape koka pepetu minawa noi bamawa duwam ge duwam bog piyu egave aig onivi.
Me danave piyuwau mae gina ubeube amowa duwam ge duwam gaibuwa, dararat piyuwau amomewa, kwimin nenipawa wakeya.
Meve, noiwa me dine, “Pita, wan yoiya. Gud na.”
Megara Pita wane, “Ayapan, onan di. Den netewa ge miyotapama desirom da numan den di nana.”
Noiwa duwameba sira me gumbe wane, “God waribiyanewa meib miyotapama den wa.”
Meiba koni duwamdesi matadnewa, tatevit kabum me kwimin danave aug dog aine.
Pita membo anopipanum aivi, irakoniwa me uyavi minawa yaunewa me natawa aninin. Apan upeba Korunerias tene amiyawa, Saimon gweyawa ampa yaug anoya. Meve ankwin daieve yokeya.
Mu auwag singui aya, “Saimon me iviwa dawa iyayapan veme Pita me mapa wakene?”
Pita irawa me uyavi minawa oya anoiviwa, God Guwawa meuma me wane, “Yawa. Iyayapan duwamdesi genan yobeme.
Wan yoig dauwag aiga. Sira mu gaibu aisiya anopipanum den a. Ne mu tena onamiya.”
Pita yan aig iyayapan dirum wane, “Ye Pita oya yobene. Me ne. Ye dimbae oya oniyana?”
Mu garawa waya, “Apan iviwa Korunerias wakene. Me senturion aiviwa sira apan oraiwa. Me God gumbe a aiviwa, me Ju igiyawa undag iviwa enagatemewa. Aneya iyakaisiyapama me dine, ‘Ge Pita aug gwe geuma oya onaga, gae wape anoa.’”
Meve Pita eb munan baraune gwe danave wakeg vimpe. Kum umae Pita wan yoig mu gaibu amiya. Sira tatawaiwa upeba at Joppa apa wakeyawa me gaibu amiya.
Kum umae mu Sesariya uwaya. Korunerias me di dam desiroma ge owawaiwa auwag onamiya munan amaraivi.
Pita uwanewa, Korunerias dauwag yaug, sira namive koniwa yune, sira watdega ane.
Meve Pita wane wan yoine, sira wane, “Wan yoiya. Ne apan di.”
Sira me Korunerias gaibu gae wag gwe danave unig amiya, me yaune iyayapan obiren iyameme.
Me mu dirumne, “Ye yaug anoyana mina, Ju igiyawa mu Ju onan igiyawa gaibu tobot eme go amdau emewa me Gwangwan gumbe bainda onan. Megara God ne toyau nedne oma den ane watna bira da gumbe iyakaisi onanwa go miyotawa.
Meoya ne eb yeumawa aunawa, ne den pimpangidna genan onedna. Ne singui gentna, dimbae oya ye aninin nenan eb teyana?”
Meve Korunerias wane, “Ne gwe neuma danave kum koniwa mame asinutuwa kum oiyat koni duwamdesiyawa nun veni. Yaunawa, apan da me wape eyawa ennewa namunap yoig
wane, ‘Korunerias, God me nun geuma anone, sira ge dividivi wantanwa me imug anone.
Meoya apan da barauwa at Joppa aipe, sira Saimon oya eb baraupe me ompe. Iviwa da Pita waya. Apan mame me Saimon mae kwapiwa waribiyaivi oraimina eme abnawa gweyave wakeivi. Gweyawa poeman visive wakene.’
Meoya tatevit ne apan da tena genan onamiya. Ge onagana, me oraimina. Nu undag God namive wakeetewa anoano undag me God genan wanewa anotan oya.”
Meve Pita amatog gae wane, “Mame gumbe ne yaug anona me taibe. God desirom desirom gumbe ubeube den ape,
bira da mu at kokawa ubeube wakeyawa God waiyaigimpe ipewa, sira oraiwa ape ipewa, God mu matai aupe.
God me Iesu Keriso gumbe yum baiganeba wag teteyamne, sira Isuraeru wagobabiwa gumbo gae meumawa baraune aine. Iesu Keriso mame me Ayapan iyayapan undag munan.
Namu babataito me Jon opata wanewa onne, ivi Gariri apa onne Judia undag danave aninin veniyanewa ye iyaiyai yaug anoyana.
Me Nasaret apan Iesu umumawa. God me apan mame gumbe Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama ge yusiwa egamne. Iesu mame gumbe God wakenewa, me aig anoano oraiwa ane, sira iyayapan undag mu airapu kukaeba gaibu wakeyawa warinamunne.
Sira nu dividivi undag mu Ju igiyawa arawa ge Jerusarem danave Iesu anewa yangnup yautune. Iyayapan mu apan mame korosi gumbe toya botone.
Megara God wane Iesu mame kum duwamdesiyawa sira inaig uwanunne gunup.
Megara me iyayapan undag gumbo onan, me nu gunup uwane. God wait numan nunan oya wagomiyane sira nu yangunup yautuwa ete. Namu Iesu sira inaine, ivi nu me gaibu nakwai natune.
God Iesu wat kiniyane. Iesu mame me keptete abnawa. Me bo igiyawa ge wakeemewa igiyawa kepte mumpe. Iesu nu didnunne iyayapan gumbo mame oya opata wata.
Iesu oya, propeta undag mu taibe waya bira da apan mame gumbe anotumat apewa iviwa gumbe me kukaeba meuma anog yankwepe.”
Pita gae mame waiviwa, Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama me iyayapan undag mu gaiyawa anoemewa gumbo aigne.
Anotumat igiyawa mu kwapiwa tuieme sira Pita gaibu onamiyawa mu teraya. Kuiyawa mu yauya Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama ano puyo Ju onan igiyawa gumbo aigne.
Mu anoya mu gae ubeube veme sira God degadega waneme. Meoya Pita garawa wane.
“Iyayapan mame mu Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama auya nu mina, bira da oma ane yoi tobotpe sira babataito den ape?”
Sira me dirumwane Iesu Keriso iviwa gumbe babataito ape. Mu Pita gumbe nun waya me kum upeba danave wakepe.
Apasoro ge tatawaiwa at Judia danave wakeyawa mu anoya. Ju onan igiyawa mu meib God gaiyawa auya.
Pita Jerusarem dog aine, kwapituitui igiyawa me gumbe yano waya,
“Ge kwapituitui onan igiyawa gumbo agana nakwai mu gaibu nana.”
Pita mu gumbo amatog gae konive konive natawa undag dirumne.
“Ne gwetoimu kokawa Joppa apa nun veniwa, ne yanganwa gwengwen aivi yaiyai den anoeni irawa uyavi minawa yauna. Kabun da me wape koka pepetu minawa noi bamawa duwam ge duwam bog kwimin apa aig on ne gunap uwane.
Ne yangut yaimoyai yauna. Piyuwau mae amowa duwam ge duwam gaibuwa, munnoga guguyanowa, dararat piyuwau amomewa, sira kwimin nenipawa mu yawamna.
Sira noiwa ne didnegivi anona, ‘Pita, wan yoig gud na.’
Ne wana, ‘Ayapan, onan di. Kuiyawa den netewa ge miyotapama desirom da numan den di nana.’
Noiwa duwameba kwimin apa sira wane anona, me garawa wane, ‘God muinewa divi da ne den neni den wa.’
Meiba koni duwamdesi matadne. Sira dividivi undag bog kwimin dog aine.
Kumive di apan duwamdesi gwe namive ne wakeeniwa apa yokeya. Mu Sesariya apa tene ne gunap uwaya.
Guwawa ne didnedne, “Ge mu gombo aisiya anopipanum den a. Ne tatanaiwa 6 mu gaibu antu, sira nu apan gweyawa uniktu.
Me nu didnunne. Me aneya yaune. Aneya me gweyawa danave yokeg wane, ‘Iyayapan teya at Joppa ampe Pita waya Saimon me aug onampe.
Apan Pita ge ge iyayapan geuma undag waitawaita amumpe gaiyawa wape.’
Gae amatog wanawa, amatonewa apa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama nu egunup aigne me mina meib mu egowo aigne.
Meapa Ayapan wanewa ne imug anona. Me wane, ‘Jon babataito yoi gumbe amunne, go ye Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gumbe babataito aya.’
Meoya nu Ayapan Iesu Keriso gumbe anotumat atuwa, God ano puyowawa nunne. God ano puyowawa meib desiroma meib God mumpe. Aninin ne oma ane God aiviwa tobotna?”
Mu dividivi mame anoyawa nouwa iyagisia. Sira God eyawa wai ag waya, “God me Ju onan igiyawa gaibu inaiinai natawa autan oya nonemagowa biroriyatanwa munne.”
Gare Stepen oya edawai amatone. Iyayapan marewaniya Penisiya, Saipras ge Antiok am uwaya, sira mu Ju igiyawa mukut gae waya bira da onan.
Megara mu danowa Penisiya ge Saipras igiyawa upeba wakeya. Mu Antiok uwayawa Griisu igiyawa gaibu dirumeme Ayapan Iesu gaiyawa opata veme.
Ayapan naniwa mu gumbo. Iyayapan tobod mumawa kokawa mu anotumat ag Ayapan gumbe tobiyaya.
Siosi me Jerusarem apa wakeyawa naunowa umum mame anoya. Meoya mu Banabas barauya Antiok aine.
Me uwanewa God ano oraiwa meuma yaug degadega ane. Danewa yaigipamit amarag Ayapan gaibu wakeigimtan dirum yusiwa munne.
Me apan oraimina sira Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama ge anotumat me gumbe noidauwane. Iyayapan obiren Ayapan gumbe onamiya.
Meve Banabas at Tarsas aine, sira Sauru oya yobag yaune.
Sira meve Banabas Sauru yaune me aug at Antiok onamiya. Bairawan desirom siosi danave agoniyaya iyayapan abototoi toyau muniya. Sira at Antiok apa aigowawa namuiren Kristian veme.
Kum mame danave propeta upeba Jerusarem apa aig onam at Antiok uwaya.
Mu danowo desirom me iviwa Agabas wan yoine Guwawa gumbe matai matatpewa dine. Matai kait kokawa kumiwa uwape piyu egave undag warumpe. (Mame Kraudias amaraivi kumiwa apa pawane.)
Meoya aigowawa desirom desirom yutuwa muma gumbe tatawaiwa at Judia apa wakeemewa waita a muntan oya anoya.
Mu me di aya. Banabas ge Sauru nanuwo puyo me waita muntan oya barauya namu yoiyoi igiyawa oya tam amiya.
Kum me apa kin Erod me iyayapan siosi danave wakeyawa edawai muntan oya naniwa baraune.
Me Jemus, Jon tatawa, deba donave botone.
Me yaug anone Ju igiyawa me gumbe degadega aya. Me Pita gaibu yumtan ane. Me Iist Onan Brediyawa Buyunaeba apa matadne.
Me Pita aug nog danave baraune. Me mut igiyawa agonagon 4 nanuwo barau munne amarape. Agonagon muma desirom danave mut igiyawa 4. Erod imive me Uwag Gaveya Buyunaeba onanapeve Pita aug iyayapan namuwo taibe dauwape.
Me mina, Pita nog danave yumnadne wakene. Megara siosi menan God gumbe nun evedni yaigipamit veme.
Erod imive Pita aug taibe dauwatan anoivi. Aram watauwa Pita mut igiyawa duwam yapowo kubvinivi. Me aiyan murapeba sein duwam gumbe tunasiya, sira mut igiyawa ankwin noive nog amareme.
Amta onan Ayapan aneya meuma uwane, sira eyawa nog danave esine. Aneya me Pita megiyave yug me wagwanamne yoine. Me wane, “Tatevit wan yoiya.” Meve aiyan murapeba sein me nanive geyot aigne.
Sira aneya me gumbe wane, “Berip geuma ena, sira sandoro ena.” Meoya Pita meib di ane. Meve aneya wane, “Wape egavewa ena sira ne amanap onaga.”
Sira me dauwag aneya amave aine. Aneya me gumbe aiviwa gare natawa di matasivi me yaimoyai den yaug anone. Me irawa uyavi minawa anone.
Mu ankwin namuwa ge duwameba gaveyag meve aiyan ankwinawa uwaya. Me ankwin daievenwa me gwetoimu koka aine. Sira ankwin me mu munan inganit watabne. Meve mu dauwag amiya, sira ebu taibe amomewa, aneya me tatevit yankweg aine.
Meve Pita membovit imiwa taig anog wane, “Gare mame di yaug anona. Ayapan me aneya meuma nenan baraune onne. Erod naniwa gumbe sira Ju igiyawa mu imug anoemewa yaigipamit undag gumbe Ayapan waita nedne.”
Pita mame yaug anonewa, Jon mu waya Mak, me inawa Meri gwe meuma aine. Asimeve iyayapan obiren agoniyag nun veme.
Pita ankwin papapak tonewa, nau warivi vesinawa iviwa Roda me garawa watan onne.
Sira me Pita noi irawa yaug anonewa, me degadega kokavit ane. Me ankwin wataptan imiwa atataine taig kintog gwe dana unig aine. Me kwaruwane, “Pita ankwin noive.”
Mu waya, “Kwiyagwa kukaine.” Megara me egave egave waivi, “Me natawa di.” Mu waya, “Me aneya meuma.”
Megara Pita papapak ande toivi. Mu ankwin watapke me yauya, sira mu tet koka aya.
Pita me munan naniwa viyane noiwa iyagisia, sira Ayapan aninin nog dana waita negne dauwag onedna dirumne. Pita dirum wane, “Jemes tatagwanebaiwa mame oya dirumiya anope.” Meve me at da oya aine.
Wantene, Pita gumbe divi matadne mut igiyawa garawano aya. Mut igiyawa wayug wayug kokavit aya.
Erod Pita menan yaimoyai yobadne, megara oma den ane yaune. Meoya me nog amaremewa singui munne, meve nog amaremewa guttan oya dirumne. Meve me Judia yankwek Sesariya aigke asime apa wakene.
Erod me Taiya ge Saidon igiyawa gumbo danawa piri wane. Meoya mu toborak kin gumbe amdau onamiya, sira mu yum oya Brastas me kin ankwatave amaraiviwa gumbe nun waya. Kwiyawa mu kin arawa apa nakwai muma boeme.
Erod gae watan kumiwa barauya. Me kumive Erod kin wapeyawa enamne sira kin arawa wakeg iyayapan gumbo gae wane.
Iyayapan kwat veme, “Mame God noiwa, apan noiwa onan.”
Tatevit, Ayapan aneya meuma Erod tone. Kuiyawa Erod God gumbe den waiyane. Nagam tune.
Ayapan gaiyawa me yoig koka aivi sira watete amne.
Banabas ge Sauru nau muma onanane, sira Mak waya Jon gaibu at Jerusarem taigiya.
Antiok siosi danave propeta ge toewanewan igiyawa wakeya. Mu Banabas, Naijer waya Simeon, Sairin apan Rukias, Manaen, me piyu mame namuyoiyoi abnawa Erod gaibu am naya, ge Sauru.
Mu Ayapan waieme sira kwit emewa, Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama wane, “Banabas ge Sauru nenan wagomiyak negiya. Ne nau neuma atan oya munan auwana nau ape.”
Mu kwit ake nun waya. Mu nanuwa egowo teya sira mu temiya amiya.
Mu duwam Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama temunne amiya. Mu Serukia amiya sira me apa Saipras oya wa gumbe amiya.
Meve mu at Saramis uwaya Ju sinagogu danave mu God gae meuma opata waya. Jon mu gaibu wakeg waitawaita muniya.
Mu ginayapawa undag birorot amiya meve at Papos uwaya. Asime apa mu ugauga propeta, Ju dum abnawa me iviwa Baru-Iesu nun tosaya.
Apan mame at me namuyoiyoi atan abnawa Serugio Poras gumbe wakene. Serugio Paurus me anoano abnawa sira Banabas ge Sauru munan auwane. Kuiyawa me God gae meuma anotan anoivi.
Sira kwasisim da Eraimas wakene. (Iviwa Eraimas me tobiroriyanewa natawa kwasisim.) Me mu duwam topai munne, sira me imive at me namuyoiyoi abnawa anotumat meuma biroriape.
Megara Sauru, iviwa da waya Poru, me Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama noidauwane yangut Eraimas temtemtem yaune wane,
“Ge uga ge gwambe undag ge gungap noidauwane, ge airapu kukaeba usiwa, sira oraiwa undag anavi ana. Ge Ayapan ebuwawa siwavitwa epin gwambe ege me den yankweege?
Gare yawa. Ayapan naniwa ge egagap wakene. Ge yangagwa muniwape koni pipi danave kum eyawa den yawa.” Tatevit igu ge aram me gumbe uwaya, meoya me pom ge pam aivi bira da me naniwa wattan oya.
Mame mataddnewa at me namuyoiyoi abnawa me yaune, me anotumat ane. Kuiyawa me Ayapan toewanewan meuma gumbe terane.
Papos apa Poru ge owawaiwa Pampuria danave at Perga oya wa gumbe amiya. Asimeve Jon mu kwem sira taig at Jerusarem aine.
Perga apa mu Pisidia danave at Antiok amiya. Sabat kumive mu sinagogu unig yan wakeya.
Gwangwan ge Propeta buka mumawa basiyaya onanane. Sinagogu namuyoiyoi igiyawa gae mu gumbo veme, “Tatangwanen, ye yapeyap bira da dega muntan gaiyawa wakepewa iyayapan mame oya wat dirumiya.”
Meve Poru wan yoik naniwa viyak wane, “Isuraeru igiyawa ge God gumbe aepam emewa, ne watna anoya.
Isuraeru igiyawa God mumawa. Me mamanaiwa wagomiyamunne. Iyayapan Ejipt danave wakeyawa me yusiwa munne obiren aya. Naniwa painau enagakke iyayapan namuwo yoik tam at me kweg dauwag onamiya.
At Inguiwa arawa danave bairawan 40 mina mu amat amunne.
At Keinan danave dam 7 me wakukamunne. Piyu me keb ag munne piyu kwan muma ane.
Undag mame bairawan 450 mina aune. Dividivi mame onanane me keptete igiyawa munne, meve propeta Samueru baraune onne.
Meve iyayapan kin oya autan anoeme. Meoya God dam Benjamin apan Kis usiwa Sauru munne. Me bairawan 40 amarane.
God Sauru itarane, meve Devid aug yudabne kin muma ane. Me Devid yaug natawa wane, ‘Ne Jesi usiwa Devid yauna. Me nonenwa, sira dividivi undag ne anoeniwa me ape.’
Apan mame yawa meuma gumbe, God me Waita Abnawa Iesu baraune. Me Isuraeru uwanewa agi wanewa gumbe.
Namu Jon nonemagowa biroriyatan ge babataito atan oya Isuraeru igiyawa undag gumbo opata wane, ivi Iesu uwane.
Jon inaiinai meuma onanaivi me wane, ‘Ye anoene ne bira? Ne apan me onan. Go, yauya. Me ivi amanap onivi. Ne oma den ane beyawa sandoro murapeba vetna.’
Tatangwanen, Ebraam wagobaviwa, sira ye yapeyap God gumbe aepam emewa. Waita waita gaiyawa mame nunan baraune onne.
Jerusarem igiyawa ge namuyoiyoi mumawa mu Iesu mame den yaug anoya, sira propeta gaiyawa Sabat Kumiwa evedni basieme go mu den yaug anoya. Mu Iesu kukaeba abnawa waya, me gumbe propeta gae mumawa natawa ane.
Mu Iesu gumbe toen guttan oya ibnawa da den yauya, megara mu Pairat me ayaya tope bototan.
Mu Iesu oya dividivi undag aya onananewa, sira yoma korosi gumbe aug aigeg dagup danave barauya.
Megara God ane boriruwayawa igiyawa gumbo Iesu sira inaine.
Iesu me gaibu Gariri dauwag Jerusarem onamiyawa oiyat obiren namuwo uwaivine. Gare mu yangowo yauyawa igiyawa iyayapan numawa gumbo.
God mamanaiwa gumbo agi wanewa nu opata ye guniyap vete.
God Iesu warinamne yoine. Me gumbe, agi meuma me natawa wagobabiwa gunup toyau nunne. Buka Sam duwameba danave mamaib tene. ‘Ge ne utunwa. Gare ne barau genna.’
God me Iesu bo gumbe warinamne yoine sira den di putaipe. Me gumbe me mamaib wane, ‘Ne Devid gumbe agi wanawa. Agi me iyakaisi ge natawa waribiya yentna.’
Meoya ampa da danave mamaib wane, ‘Ge Iyakaisi Abnawa geuma oma den ane kweya putaipe.’
Devid wakeivi kumive me God anoano meuma oya nauwawa ane. Sira me botone isimuranaiwa gumbo barauya kwapiwa putaine.
Megara God warinamne bo gumbe yoinewa me den putaine.
Meoya tatanaiwa, Apan mame gumbe, kukaeba anog yankwetan opataeba ye guniyap waivi ye yaiyai yaug anoya.
Mosisi Gwangwan gumbe iyayapan mu dividivi undag gumbe oma den ane oraimina aya, megara Apan mame gumbe iyayapan desirom desirom anotumat ape ipewa, dividivi undag gumbe oraimina ape God namive.
Ye yaimoyai yaukapa, propeta buka muma danave wayawa ye guniyap den matatpe.
‘Yauya. Ye, ae vene igiyawa. Anopipanum aya, onanaya. Ye kum yeuma apa divi da atna. Bira da ye guniyap natawa taibe diruipe, go ye anotumat den di aya.’”
Poru ge Banabas sinagogu kweg amomewa, iyayapan nun waya pura da umae Sabat Kumiwa gae mame sira didnuniya.
Sinagogu daiboruwawa onanane. Ju igiyawa obiren ge God noiwa aueme anotumat mumawa tobiroriyayawa mu Poru ge Banabas amowo amiya. Mu gumbo gae waya, sira mu dirumiya God ano oraiwa meuma danave wakeigimiya.
Pura da umae Sabat Kumiwa apa gwetoimu igiyawa koni undag God gaiyawa anotan oya agoniyaya.
Megara Ju igiyawa mu iyayapan agoniemewa yauyawa, anokukam muma nibdanowa noidauwane, sira Poru wanewa gumbe topayak gae kukaeba gumbe veme.
Me oya Poru ge Banabas garawa taibe mu gumbo waya, “Nu God gae meuma namu ye guniyap wapono go. Megara ye topayayana sira ye yembovit yaibobot inaiinaiba oya oma den ane yaug anog barauya. Yauya. Nu Ju onan igiyawa gumbo angetan anoete.
Kuiyawa mamaib Ayapan did nunne. ‘Ne ana ge Ju onan igiyawa eyawa muma ana. Me ge waitawaita aug piyu viripusiwa aitan oya.’”
Ju onan igiyawa mame anoyawa, mu degadega ake Ayapan gae meuma waiyaya. Yaibobot inaiinaiba oya wagomiyayawa munnewa undag anotumat aya.
At me apa undag Ayapan gae meuma wateteyamiya.
Megara Ju igiyawa God noiwa aueme ano wake wake painau vesinowa ge gwetoimu namu yoiyoi igiyawa danowa kwaikwai aya. Mu Poru ge Banabas edawai muniya mu imiya dauwag arowon amiya.
Mu duwam garawa amowa atapupu tog sira at Aikoniam amiya.
Aigowawa mu danowo degadega ge Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama gumbo noidauwane.
At Aikoniam apa, evedni mu amomewa mina, Poru ge Banabasi mu duwam toborak Ju sinagogu muma unigiya. Mu gae wayawa Ju ge Griisu igiyawa obiren anotumat aya.
Megara Ju igiyawa upeba anotumat den eme. Mu Ju onan igiyawa danowa dana kwaikwai aya, Ju onan igiyawa mu ano kukaeba tatawaiwa gumbo anoya.
Kum obiren mu asimeve wakeg Ayapan gumbe gae yusipamit waya. Ayapan mu nanuwa gumbe irakoniwa ge anopipanumawa aya. Sira Ayapan ano oraiwa meuma natawa toyau munne.
Megara gwetoimu danave iyayapan kep upeba gamben gamben teya. Gamben Ju igiyawa gaibu, dawa apasoro gaibu.
Ju onan igiyawa ge Ju igiyawa mu duwam namuyoiyoi igiyawa muma gaibu apasoro gumbo ubmamawa atanwa ge an gumbe guttanwa oya ano eme.
Mu duwam me yaug anoyawa, Rikakonia gwetoimuwawa Ristra ge Derube, sira gwetoimu megiyavewa oya a amiya.
Asimeve mu gae oraiwa sira evedni opata veme.
Ristra apa apan amawa gegerainewa asime yan wakene. Me meib yaine a den yoig aivi.
Apan mame Poru gae waivi naunawa taig anoivi. Poru me temtemtem yaune, sira me yaug anone apan me amawa oraimina atan oya anotumat gumbe wakene.
Me noiwa kokavit wane, “Amagap wan yoiya.” Meve me pisapisag amatog aine.
Iyayapan obiren Poru dimbae anewa yauyawa, Rikakonia gae muma gumbe nouwa owan kwaruwaya, “God me apaniren mina ane nu gunup aig onne.”
Mu Banabas me Seus veme, sira Poru me Erumes veme, kuiyawa Poru me gae abnawa.
Seus temporu meuma gwetoimu ankwin namive yokene. Seus pirisi meuma me burumakau apanit ge ben tam gwetoimu ankwin noiwa onne. Kuiyawa me ge iyayapan obiren imuwo puyo menan tepe.
Apasoro Poru ge Banabas mame anoyawa, mu wape muma viya iyayapan obiren danowo toen dum kwarapam unigiya.
Mu waya, “Iyayapan numa. Dimbae ye mame ene? Nu iyayapan ye mina di. Nu gae oraiwa yenan aug ongete. Dividivi mame oraimina onan. Ye mame yan kwem God yaibobot viniviwa gumbe tobiroriyaya oya. God kwimin ge piyu ge paurum ge mu danowo dividivi undag me wadne.
Watavit kumiwa apa God kwemne piyu egave iyayapan undag mu ebu muma minamina amiya.
Megara me membovit taibe aivinewa den yankwene. Me baigan meuma gumbe kwimin apa uvin ge maura kumiwa nunivi sira nakwai ge degadega gumbe nu danunup noidauwane.”
Mu gae mame natawa mina oya wa ge wa eme. Waigin oieba iyayapan obiren puyo muntan emewa me yan kweya.
Meve Ju igiyawa upeba Antiok ge Aikoniam apa onamiya. Mu iyayapan obiren niuo kaeya muniya, sira Poru agim gumbe toya. Mu anoya me wait botone sira gwetoimu daieve me oreriyag dauwag amiya.
Megara aigowawa agoniyag Poru birorot paniyawa, me wan yoike gwetoimu danave unig aine. Kum umae me Banabas gaibu Ristra kweg Derube amiya.
Mu gae oraiwa gwetoimu danave opata wag aigowawa obiren tamiya. Meve mu taig at Ristra, Aikoniam ge Antiok amiya.
Mu aigowawa guwowa gumbe yusiwa muniya. Anotumat kikikit yumnattan dirumeme. Mu waya, “God toimuwawa danave nu uniktanwa me yaigiwa obiren dadi danave unigtan ete.”
Poru ge Banabas siosi desirom desirom namuyoiyoi munan atan oya gomiya muniya. Sira mu munan nun waya kwit ag mu tam anotumat gumbe Ayapan gumbe teya.
Mu duwam Pisidia gaveyag uwag amiya meve Pampiria uwaya.
Meve mu Peruga danave gae opata waya sira aigeg at Ataria amiya.
Ataria apa mu wa egave taig Antiok onamiya. Antiok apa numan God oraiwa gumbe mu te muniya amiya, gare nau muma undag onanane. Sira Antiok taig onamiya.
Asime mu uwag siosi igiyawa mu desiromit toboraya. Dividivi undag God mu gumbo wakeg anewa sira anotumat ankwineba Ju onan igiyawa munan watabnewa umumawa waya.
Mu asime apa aigo igiyawa gaibu kum yobutatae wakeya.
Sira iyayapan upeba Judia apa aig onam tatawaiwa toewan muneme, “Mosisi Gwangwan meuma gumbe ye kwapiwa den tuiyawa, ye oma den ane waitawaita auya.”
Poru ge Banabas mu yapowo wan yoieg gae yaigipamit garawa eme. Poru ge Banabas ge upeba danowo wag gomiya muniya. Mu Jerusarem amotan eme. Me apa apasoro ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa gaibu gae watan oya.
Siosi igiyawa te muniya. Mu Penisiya ge Samaria gaveag amome. Mu epin taibe gae undag dirumiya. Ju onan igiyawa aninin nib danowo God gumbe tobiroriyaya. Tatawaiwa undag me anoya degadega kokavit aya.
Meve mu onam Jerusarem uwaya. Siosi igiyawa, apasoro namu yoiyoi igiyawa mu gaun muniya. Mu dividivi undag God mu gumbo wakeg anewa umum dirumiya.
Megara, numan Parisi intum aya gare anotumat emewa mu wan yoik waya, “Ju onan igiyawa kwapiwa mu tuitanit di. Sira Mosisi Gwangwaneba oya wag dirumta mu amaratanit di.”
Sira apasoro ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa singui mame yaug anotan oya toboraya.
Mu gae yusipamit garawa aya onanane. Pita wan yoik mu dirumne, “Tatangwanen, ye anoyana, kum mayabit apa God ye yapeyap wat gomiyane Ju onan igiyawa ne nonuwa gumbe gae oraiwa anok sira anotumat aya.
Sira God me iyayapan danowa yaug anonewa, Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama nu nunne mina Ju onan igiyawa munne. Mu gumbo meib taibe uwa munne.
Me nu ge Ju onan igiyawa yapave ube da den wadne. Kuiyawa me anotumat muma gumbe mu danowa muinne.
Megara ye dimbae oya aigowaiwa meyowa yoma tek ibnawa munag oya God gumbe ageyau ene? Isimuranaiwa ge nu oma den ane ibnawa mamaib autu.
Nu anotumat atu Ayapan numa Iesu ano oraiwa gumbe waitawaita autu. Sira mu mina meib.”
Meve iyayapan undag agoniyayawa nouwa iyagisia. Banabas ge Poru mu God Ju onan igiyawa yapowo mu gumbo irakoniwa ge anopipanumawa anewa gae waya. Gae vemewa, mu yaimoyai anoya.
Mu gae waya onanane meve Jemus garawa wane, “Tatangwanen, ne gunap anoigimiya.
God aninin namu Ju onan igiyawa gumbo kwayub a munne, sira me iviwa gumbe waya igiyawa mu yapowo iyayapan meuma bone, Simeon nu gunup wait gae wasiwamne.
Propeta gae mumawa gae mame desirom ane. Me meib di tene.
‘Dividivi mame onanapewa, ne sira taig Devid tabenako meuma gomag aignewa sitna. Undag gongamak aignewa sira sitna numanwa mina ape.
Me, iyayapan upeba, mu Ju onan igiyawa, mu ne ivunwa gumbe iyayapan vemewa sira mu undag Ayapan kinuni atan oya.
Ayapan me watavit ampa wag dirumnewa, me meib waivi.’
Meoya, oieba, ne ano neuma gumbe keptena. Ju onan igiyawa mu God gumbe nib danowa tobiroriyayawa den anopipanum amuniya.
Megara, nu gigirum munan mamaib teg dirumta. Ugauga goddeba namive tene miyotawa, uinantaraki, mae meyawa inoniyayawa ge ganigani mu yankwetanit di.
Kuiyawa watavit ampa gwetoimu desirom desirom danave Mosisi Gwangwaneba opata vemewa wakeya, sira Sabat Kumiwa apa evedni sinagogu danave mu basiyag omome.”
Meve apasoro, namuyoiyoi igiyawa ge siosi undag ung wayawa, siosi igiyawa mu yapowo apan upeba gomiya mumpe sira mu tepe Poru ge Banabas gaibu Antiok ampe. Mu Judas, (me iviwa veme Barusabas), ge Sairas gomiya muniya. Mu tatawaiwa yapowo namuyoiyoi igiyawa.
Mu gaibu gigirum baraueme aivi. Mu mamib teya. “Tateaiwa, apasoro ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa mu Antiok, Siria ge Sirisiya danave Ju onan tatawaiwa oya kaiwa kaiwa muma veme.
Nu amutan den watu, go nu yapunup iyayapan upeba mu gae waya gumbe ye anopipanum ayana sira ye nonemagewa yaimoyai den wakene. Nu meib anoete.
Nu danunwa undag desirom ane. Nu apan upeba gomiya muntu sira nu iyayapan numa nonunmagawa Poru ge Banabas gaibu yenan te muntu.
Poru ge Banabas mame mu Ayapan numa Iesu Keriso iviwa oya inaiinai muma topayaya.
Meoya nu Judas ge Sairas temete mu gae desiroma mu nouwa gumbe wape.
Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama ge nu dividivi mame amaratan anoetewa me mekut yempe. Ibnawa da den yempe.
Ugauga goddeba namive tenewa, ganigani, mae meyawa inoniyayawa ge uinantaraki yan kweya. Ye yaukapa dividivi mame gumbe painau wakeyawa me oma ane. Wakeya.”
Mu marewan dauwag Antiok aig amiya. Me apa mu siosi igiyawa toborak gigirum mu nanuwo barauya.
Iyayapan gigirum basiyag yusiwa muntan gaiyawa gumbe degadega aya.
Judas ge Sairas mu mina mumbovit propeta. Mu gae obiren waya tatawaiwa yusiwa munke degadega aya.
Mu oiyat upeba asime wakeya. Tatawaiwa yum gumbe temuniya. Mu at kweya at namu on temuniya amiyawa apa taig amiya.
(-)
Poru ge Banabas ande Antiok apa wakeya. Me apa mu iyayapan upeba obiren gaibu Ayapan gae meuma toewanewan ge opata amuniya.
Oiyat upeba onanane Poru me Banabas gumbe wane, “Nu numan Ayapan gae meuma opata atu. Asimeve sira taig gwetoimu desirom dada gumbe tatanaiwa gumbo amdau anta. Mu aninin emewa nu yauta.”
Banabas imive mu gaibu Jon aug ampe. Jon iviwa da Mak.
Megara Poru imive den anoivi, kuiyawa Jon me Pampiria apa yankwem aike nau mu gaibu den ane.
Mu daietaitai aya. Meoya mu ubeube amiya. Banabas me Mak aug wa gumbe Saipras oya amiya.
Poru me Sairas wagomiyane. Tatawaiwa mu Ayapan ano oraiwa gumbe anotumat yusipamit ag temuniya amiya. Mu kwem amiya.
Poru me Siria ge Sirisiya danave uwag aine. Me kumiwa apa siosi yusiwa munne.
Poru me Derube uwag meve Ristra aine. Me apa aigowawa iviwa Timoti wakene. Timoti me Ju anotumat vesinawa usiwa sira mamawa me Griisu apan.
Ristra ge Aikoniam apa tatawaiwa gae me oya oraivit veme.
Poru imive apan mame gaibu aitan anoivi. Meoya Poru Timoti kwapiwa tuine. Kuiyawa me Ju igiyawa at me apa vinemewa mu undag yaug anoya me mamawa Griisu apan.
Sira mu at kokawa uwage uwag amome. Jerusarem apa apasoro ge namuyoiyoi igiyawa gwangwan gaiyawa yuya. Meoya me noiwa autan oya mu umum barau ge barau amiya.
Meoya siosi anotumat gumbe yusiyusi aya sira iyayapan evedni tobod muma koka aivi.
Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama tobod munne Esia apa gae den waya, meoya mu Prigia ge Garatia uwag gaveyag amiya.
Mu Misia yumateba amog uwayawa, mu amatog Bitinia uniktan anoeme, go Iesu Guwawa bainda den wane.
Meoya mu Misia uwag Troas aigeg amiya.
Arampuna irawa uyavi minawa Poru gumbe uwane. Mesedonia apan da Poru namive yokeke me gumbe nun waivi, “Dauwag Mesedonia onag waita nuna.”
Poru irawa uyavi minawa yaune, tatevit nu Masedonia angetan tamibarip atu. God nunan auwane gae oraiwa opata gumbo watan ete meib taibe di yaug anotu.
Troas apa nu wa autu siwavit Samotrake antu. Kum umae nu Niaporis uwatu.
Meve nu Piripi antu. Me at kokawa Romu amaraivi, sira me at yumateba Masedonia danave namuiren gwetoimuwawa. Gwetoimu mame danave nu oiyat upeba waketu.
Sabat Kumiwa apa nu gwetoimu ankwin noiwa nu dauwag antu yoi gambenwa uwatu. Nu anoete at me nun arawa. Nu me apa uwag yan waketu, vesin agoniyayawa gumbo gae watu.
Vesin da me iviwa Ridia me Poru gae meuma anoivi. Me gwetoimu koka Taiataira danave wape me gamat diyapam ge burut yapavewa gwiruwarivi sira me God waiyaivi vesinawa. Ayapan Ridia nonemagawa watabne Poru gae waiviwa gumbe naunawa yaimoyai taig anoivi.
Me ge apan ud meumawa babataito aya. Me mu gumbo nun kokavit wane, “Ye yaug anoyana ipewa ne Ayapan gumbe anotumat eniwa, oneg ne gwe neuma apa wakeya.” Me kaeya munne.
Nu nun veme arawa oya angetewa, otau da airapu kukaeba danave wakenewa nuntosa atu. Me koukawa ankwatawo nau aivi. Me guwawa yaug anone ivi divi matatpe dum gumbe. Me dum ag, garawa kokavit aug koukawa meuma garawa tameme.
Otau mame Poru ge nu amunup on kwaruwaivi, “Iyayapan mame God Painauvitwa ankwatave nau eme igiyawa. Mu waitawaita ebuwawa ye diruieme.”
Me kum obiren mame aivi. Me gumbe Poru uiwa topayadne meve man tobiroriyak airapu kukaeba gumbe wane, “Iesu Keriso iviwa gumbe ne dirugeni. Me gumbe man dauwa.” Me apa airapu kukaeba me yankweg dauwag aine.
Me koukawa meumawa mu anmaga waremewa ebuwawa waropiyaya yauya, meoya mu Poru ge Sairas yumam tuwam orodmun amog gwiruwaremewa arawa unig uwaya.
Mu tam onam gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa namuwo uwag waya, “Iyayapan mame Ju igiyawa, sira gwetoimu numawa wakukameme.
Mu inaiinai taibe did nuneme. Inaiinai me nu Romu igiyawa auta go atawa me gwambe.”
Iyayapan obiren wan yoik toboraya mu duwam gumbo danowa piriwane. Gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa dirumiya wape muma vike murap gumbe guriya.
Koni obiren murap gumbe mu duwam guriya tam nog dana emeya. Mu nog amaraivi abnawa yaimoyai amat amuntan oya diya.
Nog amaraivi abnawa gae diyawa nouwa aune. Mu duwam nog dana bagive temuniya. Mu amowo kapet tuwamiya.
Nub danawa Poru ge Sairas God gumbe nun veme bererin tovemewa nog igiyawa upeba mu gumbo naunowa taig anoeme.
Amta onan pinunu koka uwane, nog nium barauyawa ipunapun ane. Meve nog ankwinawa undag inganit watabmusia sira murap undag amowo kapesiyawa tutakwag aigiya.
Nog amaraivi abnawa gwanad yoine yaune nog ankwinawa watabmusia. Me mureme tum meuma aug membo ingan yutan ane kuiyawa me anone nog igiyawa wait dauwag a amiya.
Megara Poru noiwa kokavit kwaruwane, “Ge gembovit den yuwa. Nu undag mapa.”
Nog amaraivi abnawa dun oya auwane. Tatevit unig daramdaram ag Poru ge Sairas namuwo uyug aigne.
Me mu tam dauwag aig dirumne, “Koukawa. Ne aninin aka waitawaita autna?”
Mu waya, “Ayapan Iesu gumbe anotumat a, me gumbe ge ge vesin ud geuma gaibu waitawaita auya.”
Mu God gaiyawa me ge iyayapan undag me gwe meuma danave wakeyawa dirumiya.
Aram me kumiwa apa nog amaraivi abnawa mu tam dauwag aik kamot muma muinne. Sira tatevit me ge vesin ud meuma undag babataito aya.
Meve me mu duwam tam gwe meuma unig amiya. Me nakwai munan namuwo tamibarip ane mu naya. Me vesin ud meuma undag gaibu God gumbe anotumat ayawa degadega aya.
Wantene gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa mu nouwa nau eme igiyawa temuniya uwak diya, “Iyayapan yan me kwemiya dauwag ampe.”
Nog amaraivi abnawa gae mame Poru dine, “Gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa mu nouwa nau eme igiyawa tenuniya waya ye duwam kweyempe dauwag aisiya. Meoya gare yum gumbe dauwag aisiya.”
Megara Poru noive nau eme igiyawa gumbo wane, “Gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa nu Romu igiyawa yai den kepte nuniya. Nu taibe murap gumbe gut nunke nog dana te nuniya. Gare nu guwave kwe nuntan eme. Onan di. Mu mumbo ingan onam kwe numpe dauwag anta.”
Nouwa nau eme igiyawa gabemant nau eme igiyawa koukawa gumbo gae mame umum waya. Poru ge Sairas mu Romu igiyawa mu anoya a aya.
Mu uwaya nonowa watmemeyam muniya. Sira mu nog daieve tam gwetoimu danave yankweg dauwag amtan oya waya.
Poru ge Sairas nog danave dauwaya. Mu Ridia gwe meumna unigiya. Meve mu tatawaiwa yawamiya ano yusiwa gaiyawa mu dirumiya. Sira kwem amiya.
Mu Ampiporis ge Aporonia gaveyag amome Tesaronika uwaya. Ju sinagogu muma asimeve wakene.
Poru evedni aiviwa mina me sinagogu danave unigne. Sabat Kumiwa duwamdesi Baiboru gumbe garawano aya.
Keriso dawai auke bo gumbe sira inaine me taibe wane sira gae mame natawa di wane. Me wane, “Iesu oya ye diruieni, Iesu mame me Keriso di.”
Ju igiyawa upeba mu yaug anoya Poru ge Sairas amowo amiya. God waiyawaiya veme Griisu obiren sira tawara vesinawa dodogu onan wakeya.
Go Ju igiyawa upeba watkukameya. Gwiruwareme arawa apa apan kukaeba upeba ui onan gigeme. Ju igiyawa tam desirom agoniya muniya. Mu gwetoimu danave wayug wayug muma noidauwane. Mu tatevit Jeson gweyawa dana unigak Poru ge Sairas tam agonagon namuwo tetan oya munan yobareme.
Megara mu da oma den ane yawamiya. Meoya mu Jeson ge tatawaiwa upeba orod mun gwetoimu namu yoiyoi munan onamiya mu kwat veme, “Iyayapan mu piyu undag egave wayug wayug eme mu at mame gumbe unig onamiya.
Jeson me gwe meuma dana mu tamne. Iyayapan mame undag mu kin da Iesu wakene veme, meoya mu Romu dana kokavit abnawa Siisa gwangwan meuma amave den amome.”
Me mina iyayapan obiren ge gwetoimu namuyoiyoi igiyawa mu gae mame anoya ui aepam eme.
Mu Jeson ge iyayapan upeba gumbo garawa auya meve kwemiya dauwag amiya.
Tatevit, tatawaiwa aram danave Poru ge Sairas temuniya dauwag at Berea amiya. Me apa uweme Ju sinagogu muma unig amiya.
Berea igiyawa mu iyayapan oraimina. Tesaronika igiyawa mina onan. Mu imuwa God gaiyawa yaug anotan oya anoeme. Sira gae Baiboru gumbe yumnasiya go onan oiyat evedni yaimoyai yaveme.
Meoya mu yapowo obiren anotumat aya. Mu anotumat igiyawa yapowo Griisu tawara vesinawa ge apan dodogu onan wakeya.
Megara Ju igiyawa Tesaronika apa wakeyawa mu anoya Poru Berea apa gaibu God gaiyawa opata waivi. Mu asime gaibu onamiya, sira iyayapan obiren anopipanum amuniya sira meve mu wayug wayug aya.
Meoya tatawaiwa tatevit Poru barauya me poeman aine, go Sairas ge Timoti Berea apa wakeya.
Poru aigoyaya gaibu amiyawa mu me aug Asen amiya. Sira Poru dirumne Sairas ge Timoti tatevit onam gumbe uwape. Mu gae me auwag amiya.
Poru Asen danave munan amaraivi. Gwetoimu me god ugaugaeba noidauwane yaune danawa piripiriwane.
Meoya Poru me sinagogu danave Ju igiyawa ge God waiya emewa gaibu gae garawa aya. Sira kum evedni gwiruwaremewa arawa apa asime iyayapan wakeemewa gaibu gae garawa aya.
Epikuros igiyawa ge Stoik igiyawa anoano anoemewa upeba me gaibu garawa aya. Epikuros upeba waya, “Apan mame dimbae watan aivi?” Sira upeba waya, “Ne anoeniwa at painauwa goddeba oya waivi.” Kuiyawa Poru me Iesu ge sira inainewa opata waivi.
Meve mu Poru daiboru arawa Areopagas aug amiya waya, “Mame toyautoyau mataiwa ge opata vege. Me dimbae toyau nuna?
Ge anoano gina ubewa nu naununwa gumbe tam ongege. Meoya nu imunup anotan me dimbae.”
Asen igiyawa ge at ubewa igiyawa me apa vinemewa undag mu kum muma gumbe divi da den ag wakeeme. Mu anoano mataiwa oya gaiyawa veme sira naunowa taieme.
Meve Poru me Areopagas bunangave wan yoik wane, “Asen igiyawa. Ne ebu undag gumbe yauyemna, ye anotumat kokavit ene igiyawa.
Ne a gigeni sira yangut yaimoyai ye waienewa yawameni. Ne yauna iyakaisi kem meuma gaibu wakene. Me egave ‘God me gumbe den yaug anotuwa oya,’ me tene. Ye den yaug anog sira waienewa me dimbae diruitna.
God piyu ge piyu danave dividivi undag wadne. Sira God mame kwimin ge piyu Ayapaneba. Meoya me iyayapan nanowa gumbe siyawa temporueba danave den vinivi.
Sira me divi da anoiviwa oya iyayapan nanowa gumbo waita wantan oya den anoivi. Kuiyawa God me membovit inaiinai, ge gaup ge dividivi undag iyayapan munne.
Sira me apan desirom gumbe iyayapan undag piyu egave wadne. Me piyu egave undag temunne mu vinag wakeeme. Me kumive kumive iyayapan tene sira mu vinag wakeeme yumateba baraune.
God mame ane iyayapan me gumbe kiniyatan oya. Sira mu me didimama apewa me yaupe. God nu desirom desirom gunup painau den wakene.
Kuiyawa nu God danave vinete, a gigete, wakeete. Me natawa di, ye yapeyap buka Sam me Baiboru danave wakenewa mina teeme igiyawa mu waya, ‘Nu gaibu dam desiroma gumbe yaig onnewa.’
Nu God usitainawa. Iyayapan upeba ano muma emewa gumbe oraimina, sira nanuwa gumbe nau eme oraimina. Mu gooru, siruva go an gumbe god guwawa wariya. Megara God me mina onan. Nu meib di anotanit di.
Watavit kumiwa apa iyayapan den yaug anog emewa God anog yankwemne, mu anoemewa eme. Megara gare God iyayapan undag ampa ampa wakeemewa dirumne nonemagowa biroriyaya.
Kuiyawa God me Apan da wagomiyane. Apan me natawa gumbe piyu keptetan oya God kum meuma baraune. Sira God boriruwayawa igiyawa gumbo me sira inaine meoya iyayapan undag mame natawa toyau munne.”
Bo gumbe inaipe mu anoyawa, upeba me iyagau eme. Sira upeba waya, “Nu mame gumbe kum da sira ge gungap anota.”
Poru iyayapan agoniyayawa danave kwem dauwag aine.
Megara iyayapan upeba Poru amave amog anotumat aya. Mu Areopagas apa keptete abnawa da Daionisius, vesin da iviwa Damaris ge iyayapan upeba.
Dividivi mame onanane, ivi Poru Asen kweg at Korint aine.
Asimeve Poru Ju apan iviwa Akuira yaune, me at Pontas apa yainewa. Me matai at Itari apa dauwag biviwa Prisira gaibu onamiya. Kuiyawa Kraudias me Romu ayapaneba me Ju igiyawa undag at Romu yankwetan oya dirumne. Poru mu gumbo aine.
Kuiyawa Poru me mina baram gumbe gwe sivi abnawa, meoya mu gaibu wakeg nau aya.
Sabat Kumiwa apa evedni me sinagogu danave toyau munne. Poru me imive gae meuma oyog oyog ape anone. Griisu igiyawa ge Ju igiyawa yan tope me noiwa aupe.
Sairas ge Timoti Masedonia apa onamiya. Meve Poru membovit gae toyau muntan oya nib danawa undag me apa wakene, sira me Ju igiyawa gumbo taibe dirumne Iesu me Keriso.
Megara mu Poru gae meume noiwa den auya gae gwambe waya. Meoya Poru wape meuma viyaviya ane mu gumbo wane, “Ye ganigani yeumawa kuieyap aikpe. Ne amat neuma ye guniyap onan. Gare mame apa ne Ju onan igiyawa gumbo anekna.”
Poru me apa yan kwek dauwag apan da gwe meuma aine. Me iviwa Taitias Jastas, God waiyaivi abnawa. Gwe meuma sinagogu megiyave.
Sinagogu namuyoiyoi abnawa Krispas ge vesin ud meuma undag anotumat Ayapan gumbe aya. Sira Korint igiyawa obiren mu anok anotumat aya babataito aya.
Aram da arampuna Ayapan irawa uyavi minawa gumbe Poru dine, “A den a. Gae waigima. Nogwa den iyagita.
Ne ge gungap. Da bira ge gungap divi da den ape. Da bira ge den towakpe. Kuiyawa ne iyayapan neuma obiren gwetoimu mame danave wakeya.”
Poru bairawan desirom ge dud 6 mina mapa wakene, God gaiyawa toyau munne.
Gario me at Akaia amaraivi abnawa kumive, Ju igiyawa danowa desirom aya Poru totan oya me keptete arawa aug amiya.
Mu waya, “Apan mame iyayapan Gwangwan gumbe ubeube ag God waiya atan oya ayag munivi.”
Poru noiwa watap gae watan aiviwa, Gario me Ju igiyawa gumbo wane, “Ye Ju igiyawa, me ugauga emewa go kukaeba kokavit emewa oya ipewa, ne ye guniyap naunanwa taig anotna.
Megara me gae, ge iviwa ge Gwangwan yeuma oya singui gumbe ipewa, ye yembovit ibnawa yeuma wasiwamiya. Ne dividivi mame gumbe den keptetna.”
Me keptete arawa apa mu atatai imne.
Meve mu undag sinagogu namuyoiyoi abnawa Sostene yumiya keptete arawa namive me toya. Megara Gario dividivi mame oya den anone.
Poru ande oiyat obiren Korint apa wakene, meve tatawaiwa gumbo wakeyo wane, wa gumbe Siria aine. Prisira ge Akuira gaibu amiya. Poru me God gumbe agi wane oya at Senkrea apa kuiyagumawa wadne.
Mu at Epesas uwaya. Poru asimeve Prisira ge Akuira kwemne me mekut sinagogu unigne Ju igiyawa gumbo garawano aya.
Mu me diya kum kusi yobe mu gumbo waketan oya waya. Megara me waketan den anone.
Me wak kwem agi wane, “God ano meuma ipewa ne matai sira taig onekna.” Meve me at Epesas apa wa gumbe dauwag aine.
Meve me at Sesariya uwag aigne sira dog aig Jerusarem siosi igiyawa yawamne meve at Antiok aig aine.
Poru asimeve kum upeba wakene. Sira me amdau amatog at Garatia ge Prigia danave undag aig aigowawa undag ano yusiwa gaiyawa dirmne.
Sira Ju apan iviwa Aporos me at Arekisandria apan me at Epesas onne. Me gae oraivit waivi abnawa sira me Baiboru anoano meuma yaug anone.
Apan mame Ayapan ebuwawa toyau waniya. Me Guwawa meuma igivi Iesu gumbe gae siwavit toyaumunivi, go me Jon babataito meuma mekut anone.
Apan mame sinagogu danave amatog gae taibe yusipamit waivi. Prisera ge Akuira me anoya. Mu gwe muma ontan oya me diya, God ebu meuma yaimoyai me diya.
Aporos me Akaia aitan anoivi. Tatawaiwa me yusiyusi atan gaiyawa me diya. Sira aigowawa asime wakeyawa gigirum munan teya. Me asime uwanewa, wait God oraiwa gumbe anotumat aya igiyawa gumbo waitawaita kokavit munne.
Me Baiboru gumbe Iesu me Keriso taibe ane, sira me Ju igiyawa gae muma yusipamit taibe, yan tene.
Aporos at Korint apa wakeiviwa, Poru amave at ebu me poeman visive onan aig Epesas uwane. Asimeve me aigowawa upeba yawamne.
Sira me singui munne, “Ye anotumat ayawa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama auyana?” Mu garawa waya, “Onan. Nu den di anotu Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama autan oya.”
Sira me wane, “Ye babataito dimbae auyana?” Mu waya, “Jon babataito meumawa nu autu.”
Poru wane, “Jon babataito meumawa me nonemagowa biroriyatan oya. Me iyayapan dirumne apan da me ivi ne amanap onivi, me Iesu. Me gumbe anotumat aya.”
Mu mame anoya, Iesu Keriso iviwa gumbe babataito aya.
Poru kuiyowo naniwa tenewa Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama egowo aigne. Sira mu gae pednowa ubeube waya, God oya gae waya.
Iyayapan undag 12 mina me apa wakeya.
Meve Poru sinagogu danave unig dud duwamdesi danave taibe yusipamit toyau munne, sira God toimuwawa oya gae yusipamit dirumne.
Megara iyayapan upeba danowa yaigiwane naunowa den taig anoya sira iyayapan obiren namuwa Ebu mame oya gae kukaeba waya, meoya Poru kwemne. Sira Poru aigowawa kwemtan oya dirumne. Sira Poru me Tairanas gigirum gweyawa danave evedni wag dirumne.
Toewanewan mame bairawan duwam danave meib di aine. Meoya Ju igiyawa ge Griisu igiyawa undag Esia danave vinemewa Ayapan gae meuma anoya.
God Poru naniwa gumbe irayauyau kokavit ane.
Poru me atop go wape kapet tuiviwa atan tam yuwat igiyawa gumbo tenewa, yuwat kwemne ge airapu kukaeba dauwag amiya.
Ju igiyawa mu airapu kukaeba danowo wakeyawa dauwag amtan oya nauwawa emewa mu ampa amdau amome. Mu upeba airapu kukaeba danowo wakeyawa gumbo Ayapan Iesu iviwa gumbe ageyau gumbe waya, “Poru opata waivi Iesu iviwa gumbe ne diruieni.”
Ju pirisi kokawa iviwa Seva usitainawa 7 mame meib aya.
Sira Airapu kukaeba garawa gumbo wane, “Ne Iesu yaug anona sira Poru gaibu yaug anona, go ye bira?”
Airapu kukaeba danave wakenewa pisiak egowo dauwane sira mu duwam yan emamne sira mu undag gudne. Meoya mu taibe aya siget boya gwe yan kweg kin tog dauwag amiya.
Mame Ju ge Griisu igiyawa undag at Epesas apa vinemewa yaug anoya. Sira mu a gaibu ake Ayapan Iesu iviwa enagasiya.
Sira anotumat aya igiyawa obiren uwak dividivi mu emewa taibe vesiya.
Kwasisim dum emewa obiren bukaeba tam uwaya iyayapan yangowo okeriya. Mu garawa basiyag toborayawa garawa 50,000 siruva koin mina.
Epin mamaib. Ayapan gaiyawa wateteyamiya koka ane sira me yusiwa kokavit aivi.
Dividivi mame undag matadne onananewa, Guwawa Poru toyau wanne. Me gumbe me Masedonia ge Akaia yapave gaveyag uwag Jerusarem aitan oya anone. Me wane, “Ne namu Jerusarem anekna ivi Romu gaibu yautna.”
Meoya me nauwawa emewa duwam Timoti ge Erastas tene Masedonia amiya. Poru me membo ande at Esia apa kusi pipi wakene.
Me kumiwa apa ebu mame gumbe wayug wayug koka yaig yoine.
Siruva gumbe warivi abnawa iviwa Demetrius wakene. Me siruva gumbe Arutemis god gweyawa kusikusiwa waramivi. Nanuwo wareme igiyawa anmaga kokavit munivi.
Sira me nanuwo wareme igiyawa ge nau desiroma igiyawa dirumne undagit desirom agoniyaya. Me wane, “Iyayapan undag. Ye anoyana nu nau mame gumbe anmaga kokavit tamete.
Ye yavene sira anoene. Apan mame Poru at Epesas danave mekut onan Koni Esia danave undag iyayapan obiren gae yusipam gumbe toyau munivi mu anopipanum aya. Me waivi, ‘God iyayapn nanuwo waremewa me god onan.’
Nu nau numawa waropiyatan ete sira iyayapan nau numawa oraimina sira den wape. Iyayapan god vesinawa kokawa Arutemis gweyawa matai den anope, sira Esia undag ge piyu undag god vesinawa eyawa meuma waiyeme, go eyawa meuma aiktan aivi.”
Mu mame anoya mu danowo piripiriwane sira amatog kwaruveme, “Epesas igiyawa muma Arutemis me kokawa.”
Sira gwetoimu undag wayug wayug aya, sira iyayapan mu Masedonia igiyawa Gaias ge Aristarukas yumamiya. Mu Poru gaibu gigemewa. Iyayapan undag kuiyowa desirom ane kae eme gweyawa danave igemat unigiya.
Poru imive iyayapan danowo uniktan anoivi, megara aigo meuma me toboriya.
Esia danave nau koka eme igiyawa mu Poru evebaiwa. Mu gae aug aiviwa menan barauk toborak waya, kae eme gweyawa danave den uniga.
Daiboru danave anopipanum. Iyayapan obiren den yaug anoya divi oya agoniyaya, me oya mu gae kuiyawa ubeube kwaruwaya.
Ju igiyawa mu apan me Arekisanda namuwo itaraya. Sira iyayapan upeba gae watan oya me diya. Meoya me naniwa viyane iyayapan namuwo wasiwamtan watan anoivi.
Megara mu yaug anoya me Ju abnawa, sira mu undag nouwa desirom ande kwaruveme kum koniwa duwam mina, “Epesas vesin goddeba numa me kokavitwa.”
Gwetoim koka gigirum tete abnawa me iyayapan undag nouwa tobot mun wane, “Iyayapan neuma Epesas igiyawa. Gwetoimu Epesas me god vesinawa kokavitwa Arutemis ge me guwawa me kwimin apa aig onnewa amaraivi. Bira da den yaug anone?
Mame natawa nu oma den ane topayata. Meoya ye noiwa iyaigisia, sira igemat den di aya.
Iyayapan mame ye tam oniyanawa, mu den aya temporu miyot ane, sira mu god vesinawa gae kukaeba den waya.
Meoya Demetrius ge me owawaiwa nau desiroma emewa mu gunat gumbo atan ape ipewa, keptetan kumiwa wakene, sira at amareme igiyawa wakeya, meoya desirom desirom pui yutan oya keptetan arawa ampe.
Ye gae guniyap obiren ipewa, gwangwan daiboru kokawa gumbe gae wag yugeyau ape.
Gare mame wayug wayug gaiyawa oya, asiwa apa natawa oraimina onan. Meoya wayug wayug mame oya, anten wakukam yempe go. Mame oya nu oma den ane ye waita yenta.” Meib wag daiboru onanane dauwag amiya.
Wayug wayug onanane, ivi Poru aigowawa oya auwane agoniyag yutuwa munne, sira dirumwane wakeyo, sira Masedonia oya kweg aine.
Sira at me gumbe uwag aine, tatawaiwa gumbo gae dadi wag yutuwa munne. Meve Griisu uwane.
Poru me apa dud duwamdesi wakene. Me wa gumbe Siria aitan aivi, megara me kumiwa apa Ju igiyawa me gumbe ano guwavewa eme, meoya anog namu Masedonia aikape meve sira taig aitan anone.
Berea apan Sopateru me Pairas usiwa, ge Tesaronika apan duwam Aristarukas ge Sekandas, ge Derube apan Gaias, ge Timoti, sira Esia apan Titikas ge Tropimas mu Poru aigo waniya.
Mu namu wait amiya, sira at Troas apa nunan amareme.
Iist Onan Bredi Buyunaeba onanane, sira nu wa gumbe at Piripi kwetune. Oiyat 5 onanane, meve at Troas apa undagit toboratune, sira oiyat 7 asime apa waketu.
Pura amatonewa apa, nu undagit agoniyatu bredi warensitan oya. Me kumiwa apa, Poru oiyat umae kwetan anone iyayapan gumbo gae waivi aram nub bagiwa uwane.
Gwe egadodot siyawa danave dun dadi, me apa nu agoniyag gae watune.
Apan mataiwa iviwa Yutikas gwe kwanogawa apa yan wakeivi. Me yangawa kub emne, sira Poru gae meuma yobutatae waivinewa, me kubvinne imiwa atataine, sira me gwe danawa egavewa duwamdesiyawa apa piyu egave uyug aigne. Wan auyawa, me wait boane.
Poru aig onne, me egave toketam vinne, sira me enagadne, wane, “Den a aya. Me inaivi.”
Me sira dog aine, bredi wasig nane, sira gae dirumivine wantene, meve kweg aine.
Iyayapan mu apan mataiwa me sira inainewa auwag gwe amiya, sira watmemeyam kokavit amunne.
Meve nu namu wa danave dauwatune, Asos oya antune. Nu Asos apa Poru wa danave dauwatan oya anotune, kuiyawa Poru imive amave aitan.
At Asos apa Poru nutusa nunne, meve me wa danave entu, sira Mitrene antune.
Meapa wa gumbe antune, wantene at Kiyosu poeman danave uwatune, sira oiyat dawa at Samos uwatune, sira oiyat dawa at Miretas uwatune.
Poru imive Epesas atan kweg yapave togomiyane at asime uwatan oya anone, kuiyawa at Esia danave me kum waropiyatan den anone. Me imive Pentekost kumiwa danave at Jerusarem apa waketan anone, meoya me tatevit aivi.
Poru me Miretas apa umum igiyawa tene Epesas amiya, sira Epesas siosi namuyoiyoi igiyawa munan auwane.
Mu agoniyayawa, Poru dirum wane. “Ne at Esia uwana. Me kumiwa apa onne gare mame ne aninin ye gaibu kum evedni vineniwa, ye yaug anoyana.
Ne mokona kokavit gumbe sira it gaibu, sira edawai obiren me Ju igiyawa amaorot mumawa negiyawa danave ne Ayapan numa nauwawa ana.
Dividivi undag me waita yeniyawa ne toyau yenna sira topai den ana. Iyayapan namuwa sira gwe gwe gumbe ne toyau yenna.
Ne Ju igiyawa ge Griisu igiyawa gumbo taibe wanawa, mu nonemagowa biroriyag God gumbe sira amtanit di sira Ayapan numawa Iesu gumbe anotumat atanit di.
Ne gare Guwanwa tunedne Jerusarem angeni. Ne den yaug anoeni divi ne gunap asimeve matatpe.
Toimu desirom desirom danave Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama taibe toyau nedne. Ne yaug anonawa, murap gumbe tunektan ge dawai autan nenan amareme.
Megara ne ebu angeniwa undag kintotna oma ape ipewa, sira nau neuma me Ayapan Iesu nednewa undag atna oma ape ipewa, ne inaiinai neuma oma ape waropiyatna. Nau neumawa me God ano oraiwa meuma gae oraiwa dirumpna taibe ape.
Yauya. Ye yapeyap aneg God toimuwawa oya opata yenna. Megara gare mame di ne yaug anona ginanganwa sira den yauya.
Meoya ne gare mapa wat kinieni. Iyayapan undag pui mumawa oya, me ne anoeniwa onan.
Kuiyawa ne God anoano meuma undag yenan wana onanane.
Ye yembovit ge iyayapan yeuma undag oya amat munigimiya. Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama me yenan iyayapan namuyoiyoi mumawa ane. Kuiyawa me ye God siosi meuma me God diyawa meuma gumbe gwiruwadnewa amaratan oya.
Ne anoeniwa ye kwe yempnawa, mae urup muripama ye guniyap matai wakukam yempe.
Ye yapeyap upeba matai gae ugauga gumbe aigowawa upeba tamepe mumawa ape.
Meoya yaukapa. Ne bairawan 3 danave oiyat ge aram evedni it gaibu ye desirom desirom toyau yeneni. Garawapa imug anoigimiya.
Sira gare, God ge ano oraiwa meuma gaiyawa yenan naniyap baraueni. Gae meumawa oma ane yenan amat yempe sira koka aya, sira me oma ane iyayapan undag mu iyakaisi ayawa danave ye kwan matai auya.
Ne iyayapan gooru ge siruva go wape mumawa den autan anona.
Ye yaug anoyana. Naninwa mame ne wakewake neuma oya sira ne gaibu wakeemewa muma oya nau wariya.
Ne dividivi undag ye toyau yeneni. Nu meib iyayapan mu yusiwa onanwa gumbo waita muntanit di. Sira nu imug anota Ayapan Iesu membovit wanewa gaiyawa, ‘Wantanwa me waribiya koka, sira autanwa me waribiya kusi.’”
Poru meib wane onanane, sira konive yug iyayapan undag gaibu nun waya.
Iyayapan undag iruwaya, sira Poru meyave yum obiren uwatoya.
Sira mu danadawai koka Poru gaiyawa gumbe auya, kuiyawa me wane, “Ye ginanganwa sira den di yauya.” Meve Poru wa autanwa oya mu me aigoyag amiya.
Nu mu kwemtu wa gumbe antu, sira at Kosu siwavit uwatu. Oiyat umae at Rodes uwatu, sira me apa at Patara antu.
Me apa nu wa me at Penisia aitan aivi yautune, meoya wa me gerave dauwag antune.
Koni pipi me apa Saipras yautu. Sira naniketaiwa apa me yaug, Siria oya sira yunat antune, sira at Taiya apa aigtune. Kuiyawa me apa wa numa tawara mumawa aiktanwa anoeme.
Nu aigowawa upeba yawamtu, me apa oiyat 7 waketu. Guwawa gumbe mu Poru dig waya at Jerusarem oya den di aipe.
Kum mame onananewa, nu at me apa kweg antune. Mu undag bivituiwa ge usitainawa gaibu agoniyag sira nu gaibu wemun antu gwetoimu daieve angek uwatu. Sira poeman visive uwag koninup yug nun watune.
Meve nu garawa watu aisiyo. Sira wa danave dauwag unigtu, mu gwe muma taig amiya.
Nu at Taiya apa amatog wa gumbe onantu, nu Ptoremais uwatune. Me apa nu tatanaiwa baigan muntu, sira oiyat desiroi mu gaibu waketune.
Oiyat umae me apa kwetu Sesariya uwatu. Me apa apan 7 gomiyamuniya mu danowo desirom me gae oraiwa opata veme igiyawa da Pirip wakene. Nu me gweyave waketu.
Apan mame gwaitowaiwa otau 4 gaibu mu God gaiyawa vemewa.
Nu oiyat upeba mepe waketunewa, propeta iviwa Agabas Judia apa aig uwane.
Me nu gunup uwane, sira Poru berip meuma aune. Me naniwa ge amawa berip gumbe tug wane, “Guwawa Iyakaisiyapama me waivinewa, ‘Ju igiyawa mu apan me berip mame gaibuwa mamaib Jerusarem apa tupe, sira mu me Ju onan igiyawa nanuwo baraupe.’”
Nu mame anotunewa, nu sira iyayapan upeba gaibu Poru gumbe nun watune Jerusarem den aipe.
Meve Poru garawa wane, “Ye mamaib nenan iruvene sira nonenmagawa toenguriyana. Divi oya meib ene? Ne tamibarip ana Ayapan Iesu iviwa oya, Jerusarem danave murap gumbe den tunekpe go tonekpe boatna, me meiba ne gunap bainda.”
Me nu gae numawa autan den anonewa, nu ditune, “Ayapan me anoiviwa ape,” meve nounuwa tobottu divi da den watu.
Kum mame onananewa, nu a atan oya tamibarip atune, sira Jerusarem dog antu.
Sesariya aigowawa upeba nu gaibu antune, sira Saipras apan Manason me aigowawa namuwa gumbe mu tam nuniya antune. Asimeve waketan anotune.
Jerusarem uwag tatanaiwa degadega gumbe baigan nuniya.
Oiyat umae, Poru nu tam nunne sira Jemus oya amdau antune. Asimeve namuyoiyoi igiyawa undagit agoniyag wakeya.
Poru mu baigan munne, sira me nauwawa gumbe God aninin Ju onan igiyawa danave anewa, desirom desirom amatog waivine.
Mu mame anoya sira God gumbe watdega aya, sira Poru gumbe mamaib waya, “Tatunwa, ge yaug anoana, Ju igiyawa danave anotumat emewa 10,000 egave animpo mina dadi wakeya. Mu undag anoemewa Gwangwan me yaigipamit yumnasiemewa me kokawa di.
Mu mamaib veme. Usitainawa gumbo kwapuwa den tuiyampe sira kuinui numa gumbe den wakeigimpe. Meib, ge Ju igiyawa mu Ju onan igiyawa danave wakeemewa Mosisi topai atan oya toyau munege.
Meve nu aninin aton? Mu anoeme di ge uwana.
Meoya nu dirutawa garawapa ge a. Nu gunup apan undag 4 mu God gumbe agi ayawa.
Mu tam aga, sira kwapugwa mu gaibu wat muina, sira kuiyowa gumawa tuipe oya garawa baraua. Ge meib a ipewa, iyayapan undag yaug anope mu genan oya anoemewa me natawa onan, ge gwangwan gumbe yaimoyai wakeegewa.
Ju onan igiyawa mu anotumat emewa gumbo nu wat kiniyatunewa mamaib. Mae puyowawa me god ugaugaeba gumbe waniyawa, sira diyawa, ge mae me meyakoniwa yuemewa, ge uinantaraki emewa mu topai atanit di. Nu munan wait gigirum tetune.”
Meoya Poru iyayapan mu tamne, sira oiyat umae undagit wat muinamne sira temporu arawa danave unigiya, sira muinnewa kumiwa onananewa, apan desirom desirom oya puyo wanigimtanwa kumiwa dirumne.
Megara oiyat 7 koni onanatan aiviwa, Ju igiyawa mu at Esia apa onamiyawa Poru temporu arawa danave wakene yauya, meoya mu iyayapan obiren dirum waya mu uwa danowa kwaiya. Mu nanuwo kwapive barauya,
sira kwaruwaya, “Isuraeru igiyawa, waita nuniya! Apan mame me at undag apa iyayapan undag toyau toyau munivi, iyayapan numawa, Gwangwan numawa ge at mame oya garadodot atan eme. Sira megiyave Griisu apan aug temporu arawa danave unig onne, sira at iyakaisiyapama mame miyot miyot ane.”
Watavit mu yauya Epesas apan Tropimas gaibu Poru me gwetoimu danave wakeya. Meoya mu gwambe anoya Poru me aug temporu arawa danave unig onamiya.
Sira meve gwetoimu undag ege aig waya, sira iyayapan Poru gumbe kintog amiya sira me yumiya, sira me aug temporu arawa daieve ororiyak amiya. Ankwin tatevit toboriya.
Sira mu me totanwa oya anog emewa, umum me mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa gumbe uwane. At undag Jerusarem danave wayug wayug eme.
Me tatevit mut igiyawa ge senturion tam munan amiya. Iyayapan mu mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa ge mut igiyawa yawamiyawa Poru toemewa yankweya.
Mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa me Poru gumbe uwag yumtune, sira aiyan murapeba sein duwam gumbe tutan dirum wane. Meve singui wanewa, Poru me bira sira me dimbae ane?
Megara iyayapan obiren danowo upeba dividivi muma oya kwaruwaya, sira upeba dividivi muma oya kwaruwaya, meoya wayug wayug oya me oma den ane natawa yaug anone. Meoya mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa me dirum wane Poru aug mut igiyawa gweyowa ampe.
Poru tet apa uwaiviwa, mut igiyawa Poru painau wan auya, kuiyawa iyayapan dadi me totanwa oya eme.
Kuiyawa iyayapan obiren amowo omome kwaruvemewa, “Me toya.”
Mu Poru aug mut igiyawa gweyowa danave unig amomewa, mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa gumbe Poru wane, “Ne oma ane gae ge dirukna?” Mut igiyawa namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa wane, “Ge gae Griik vege?
Ge Ejipt apan me wayug wayug namu aivi sira mut igiyawa 4,000 mina gaibu at inguiwa arawa a amiyawa?”
Poru garawa wane, “Ne Ju abnawa me Sirisia danave Tarusas apan, sira ne toimu me abnawa di. Garawapa ne kwenega iyayapan gae dirumpna.”
Mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa dig wane gae wape, meve Poru tet egave yoine, sira iyayapan gumbo naniwa viyane. Sira mu undag noi iyadmusiawa, me gae Ibru gumbe gae mamaib dirum wane.
“Tatangwanen ge mamanaiwa. Gare mame yenan paparavintan eniwa watna ye anoya.”
Poru gae Ibru gumbe waivinewa anoyawa, mu undagit di noi iyadmusia. Meoya Poru gae di yunad waivi.
“Ne Ju abnawa me Sirisia danave Tarusas apa yainawa. Ne toimu me danave koka ana, sira Gamarieru ankwatave wagonaiwa Gwangwan mumawa oya yaigipamit gigirumawa tena. Ye undag gare enewa mina ne God oya kokavit anona.
Ne ebu mame gumbe edawai munna, murap gumbe apan vesin tuwamna, nog danave emena, sira upeba boriruwaya.
Mame oya, pirisi painauvitwa ge iyayapan koukawa daiboru koka muma mu nenan taibe wape. Ne gigirum mumawa me iyayapan mame tatawaiwa oya teyawa auna, sira Damaskas oya kweg anedna. Kuiyawa nu me apa wakeyawa igiyawa tuwam, mu tam Jerusarem ongetan sira ibnawa muntan oya.
Meve angeniwa kum kuiyunup apa, ne Damaskas koni uwatan eniwa, tatevit eyawa kokavit gunap birorot yune esine.
Ne piyu egave aidnawa, noiwa anona nenan wane, ‘Sauru, Sauru, ge divi oya edawai negege?’
Meve ne garawa wana, ‘Ayapan, ge bira?’ Apan asime garawa wanewa, ‘Ne Nasaret apan Iesu me edawai negegewa.’
Iyayapan mu ne gunap wakeyawa eyawa asime yauya sira a aya, megara me noiwa me nenan waiviwa mu yaiyai den yaug anoya.
Ne singui wana, ‘Ayapan, ne divi atna?’ Ayapan nenan wane, ‘Wan yoiya, Damaskas aga. Asime apa divi ge atanwa matai ge dirukpe.’
Megara eyawa yusiwa meuma oya yanganwa oma den ane yangut ana. Iyayapan mu ne gaibuwa naninap aug Damaskas unigiya.
Me apa apan da iviwa Ananias wakene. Me Gwangwan numa gumbe anotumat oraiwa aiviwa abnawa, sira me me apa wakeemewa Ju igiyawa undag me apa wakeemewa danowo mu menan ebnotu eme.
Ananias uwag ne megiyanap yoig wane, ‘Tatan Sauru, oma ane ge yawa.’ Sira me koniwa apa ne oma ane apan me yauna.
Me mamaib wane, ‘Isimuranaiwa God mumawa me genan wat kiniyane, sira me ano meuma yaug anoa, sira Ayapan oraiwa yawa, sira gae meuma noive waiviwa anoa.
Ge yangagap yaug anoanawa a, sira iyayapan undag gumbo ge divi yawanawa sira anoanawa diruma anope.
Divi oya topai ege? Wan yoiya. Me iviwa gumbe babataito a, sira kukaeba geuma muina.’
Mamaib ne Jerusarem sira taig anedna, sira temporu arawa danave nun veniwa, ne uyavi mina vinna,
sira Ayapan yauna. Ayapan gae waivi, ‘Tate Jerusarem gare mame di kweg aga, kuiyawa nenan oya taibe wanawa mu den anog aupe.’
Meve ne garawa wana, ‘Ayapan, mu yaug anoya ne sinagogu dada dana anotumat genan eme igiyawa tam nog danave tena, sira murap gumbe gudna.
Sira Stepen me genan boinewa diyawa aignewa, ne me apa wakena, sira yutuwa munna, sira me toeme igiyawa wape muma amareni.’
Meve Ayapan ne didneg wane, ‘Aga, ne ge baraugentna aramawa Ju onan igiyawa gumbo.’”
Iyayapan Poru gae wag mame waiviwa anoeme, megara gare mame kwaruwaya, “Apan mame minawa piyu egave atan auya. Me tota di boipe.”
Meve iyayapan boboi ge kwaruwaya, wape muma painau emiya, sira atapupu owan kwiminau emiya.
Meoya mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa dirumnewa Poru aug mut igiyawa gweyowa unig ampe. Sira me yaug anotan anoivi divi oya iyayapan kwat Poru gumbe mamaib veme. Meoya me dirumne me murap gumbe tog singui ape.
Mu Poru murap gumbe me totanwa oya tuyawa, Poru senturion me asime yokeivinewa dig wane, “Keptete den baraune sira Romu sinsin apan murap gumbe tope, me bainda go?”
Senturion mame anonewa, me mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa menan aine umum dine, “Ge divi a? Apan asime me Romu sinsin apan.”
Mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa me Poru menan aine singui ane, “Ne didnega, ge Romu sinsin apan?” Poru wane, “E, ne meme.”
Meve mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa wane, “Ne sinsin apan atan oya anmaga koka barauna.” Meve Poru wane, “Ne Romu sinsin danave yoina.”
Meoya iyayapan mu Poru gumbe singui watan emewa, tatevit me gumbe atan siririyag amiya. Sira mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa yaug anone Poru me Romu sinsin apan, me a ane kuiyawa murap sein gumbe Poru tuya.
Oiyat umae, mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa me divi oya Ju igiyawa mu Poru gumbe keptete barautan oya anotan anoivi, meoya me dirum wane Poru aiyan murapeba sein gumbe tuyanawa atan vesiya. Sira me dirum wane pirisi koukawa ge Daiboru Painauvitwa igiyawa undag agoniyape, Poru aug amiya, sira namuwo yoine.
Meve Poru Daiboru Painauvitwa tem yawam dirum wane, “Owanaiwa, ne gare mame God namive anog vinan ongeniwa imug imug oraiwa gumbe.”
Sira pirisi painauvitwa Ananias me iyayapan mu Poru megiyave yoiemewa gumbo dirum wanewa, Poru noive toya.
Me kumiwa apa Poru me gumbe wane, “Ge bogigi me pupuyu wadnewa! God matai ge towakpe. Ge Gwangwan gumbe matai pui yunettan arawa apa wakeege, megara ge Gwangwan togomege sira mu ne tonektan oya dirumana?”
Meve iyayapan mu megiyave yoiemewa waya, “God pirisi painauvitwa gumbe ge gae gwambe vege?”
Meoya Poru garawa wane, “Owanaiwa, ne den yaug anona me pirisi painauvitwa. Baiboru tenewa, ‘Iyayapan namuyoiyoi abnawa muma gumbo gae gwambe den wa.’”
Megara Poru yaug anone iyayapan upeba mu Sadusi igiyawa upeba mu Parisi igiyawa, Daiboru Painauvitwa danave kwaruwane, “Owanaiwa, ne Parisi abnawa sira Parisi usiwa. Mu ne pui yunegeme boriruwayawa mu matai sira inaig yoipewa anoetewa oya.”
Me mame wanewa, Parisi igiyawa ge Sadusi igiyawa yapowo garadi aya. Sira Daiboru Painauvitwa me kuiya 2 togomiyaya.
Kuiyawa Sadusi igiyawa wayawa, sira inaig yoitanwa onan, aneya den wakene, sira guwawa den wakene. Megara Parisi igiyawa wayawa mame undag wakeya.
Wayug wayug koka aivi sira Gwangwan toewanewan upeba mu Parisi igiyawa muma wan yoiya sira gae yaigipam dirumeme waya, “Nu oma den ane yautune dividivi kukaeba da apan mame gumbe. Anten guwawa go aneya me gumbe wane go?”
Garadi kokavit emewa, mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa me Poru gumbe danadawai aune, kuiyawa mu Poru matai tog kesia kesia ape anoivi. Me mut igiyawa dirum wane aig Poru yutuwa gumbe aug mut igiyawa gweyowa ampe.
Aram me danave Ayapan Poru megiyave yoig wane, “Yusiyusi a. Ge Jerusarem apa nenan oya gae wana. Meib ge Romu danave gaibu gae wa.”
Wantenewa, Ju igiyawa agoniyaya sira agi wayawa, namu Poru tope boipe, ivi mu nakwai ge yoi nape.
Kigemuk mame wayawa me iyayapan 40 sira egave mina.
Mu pirisi koukawa ge iyayapan namu yoiyoi igiyawa gumbo amiya waya, “Nu agi yusipamit watunewa, namu nu Poru tota boipe ivi divi da nata.
Gare mame ye sira Daiboru Painauvitwa gaibu ugauga ag, mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa gumbe mamaib nun waya, nu Poru sira yautan anoete meoya Poru aug nunan onampe. Nu tamibarip atune Poru asime uwaigimpewa nu me tota boipe.”
Megara Poru yogiyawa usiwa kigemuk mame anonewa, me mut igiyawa gweyowa gumbe aig Poru dine.
Meve Poru me senturion da auwag wane, “Garawapa apan mataiwa mame mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa gumbe aug aga. Me umum da gaibu me ditan.”
Senturion me apan mame aug mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa gumbe aine sira wane, “Nog abnawa Poru nenan auwane sira nun wanewa, apan mataiwa mame umum geumawa me gumbe wakene, meoya me genan ompe.”
Mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa nanive aug atan aine sira singui ane, “Divi ge didnektan anoege?”
Me garawa wane, “Ju igiyawa mamaib ung waya. Mu Poru gumbe yaug anotan oya ugauga ape. Sira genan nun wapewa ge umae Poru aug Daiboru Painauvitwa gumbe onaga.
Garawapa gae muma den auwa. Kuiyawa iyayapan 40 egave mina agi wayawa, namu Poru tope boipe, ivi mu nakwai ge yoi nape. Mu menan amareme. Gare mame di mu tamibarip aya onanane, mu amareme ge nun muma autan oya.”
Meve mut namuyoiyoi abnawa kokawa dig wane, “Iyayapan da den diruma ge mame did neganawa,” sira apan mataiwa kwene aine.
